前中共中央政治局委员、中央军委副主席，在反腐运动中落马。
description.en: Former Vice Chairman of the Central Military Commission, who fell during the anti-corruption campaign.

description.zh-cn: 中国大陆企业家，阿里巴巴集团、淘宝网、支付宝的创始人，蚂蚁集团实际控制人
description.en: Chinese entrepreneur, founder of Alibaba Group.

description.zh-cn: 韩国第20任总统，于2024年12月3日宣布全国戒严，引发政治危机，最终导致其被弹劾下台及逮捕。
description.en: Then-President of the Republic of Korea, who declared martial law on December 3, 2024, sparking a political crisis that led to his impeachment and arrest.

description.zh-cn: 韩国第19任总统
菲律宾总统
中国传媒工作者、前中国中央电视台主持人，于2018年底曝光陕西千亿矿权案二审卷宗在最高人民法院丢失，引发舆论风暴。
description.en: A Chinese media worker and former host of China Central Television who, in late 2018, exposed the disappearance of the second-instance case files of the 'Shaanxi Hundred-Billion-Yuan Mining Rights Case' from the Supreme People's Court, sparking a public outcry.

description.zh-cn: 以色列总理
中华人民共和国女高音歌唱家、歌剧表演艺术家、国家一级歌唱演员，中共中央总书记习近平的妻子，曾任全国政协委员、解放军艺术学院院长。
description.en: Chinese folk singer, wife of Xi Jinping.

description.zh-cn: 中国前驻英国大使柯华之女，习近平的第一任妻子。
description.en: First wife of Xi Jinping.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党中央委员会总书记习近平与歌唱家彭丽媛的独生女。
description.en: Daughter of Xi Jinping and Peng Liyuan.

description.zh-cn: 曾任中共河北省委书记。
中国共产党、中华人民共和国政治人物，曾任中共中央组织部部长，原副国级党和国家领导人，习近平在清华大学的室友。

zh-cn: 小约瑟夫·罗比内特·拜登

description.zh-cn: 美国政治家，第46任美国总统。
description.en: 46th President of the United States.

description.zh-cn: 胡锦涛的夫人
前中共中央总书记胡锦涛之子，中华人民共和国政治人物，曾任中华人民共和国民政部副部长。
胡锦涛担任总书记和温家宝担任总理期间的中国政治时期
2008年5月12日发生于中国四川的特大地震，是中华人民共和国成立以来破坏力最大的地震，也是唐山大地震后伤亡最惨重的一次。此次地震对都江堰及二王庙造成了损害，并因大量校舍倒塌引发社会广泛质疑，促使艾未未发起了公民调查活动。
description.en: A catastrophic earthquake occurred in Sichuan, China, on May 12, 2008. It was the most destructive and casualty-ridden earthquake since the Tangshan earthquake and the founding of the People's Republic of China. The event caused damage to Dujiangyan and the Erwang Temple, and the collapse of numerous school buildings led to widespread public questioning, prompting Ai Weiwei to initiate a citizens' investigation.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国政治人物，亲民党创党主席、现任党主席，曾任台湾省省长。毕业于伯克利。
description.en: Republic of China politician, founding and current chairman of the People First Party, formerly governor of Taiwan Province, and an alumnus of Berkeley.

description.zh-cn: 指国家在非常时期采取的一种紧急措施。在1989年六四事件前夕，北京实施了戒严。
description.en: An emergency measure taken by a state in extraordinary times. Martial law was imposed in Beijing on the eve of the 1989 Tiananmen Square protests.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党内部主张并推动改革开放的政治派别，其主张包括深化市场化和政治体制改革。
中华人民共和国国务院前总理温家宝之子，中国商人和企业家，曾创立优创科技有限公司和新天域资本公司，并曾担任中国卫星通信集团董事长。
description.en: Son of Wen Jiabao, former Premier of the State Council of the People's Republic of China, a Chinese businessman and entrepreneur who founded Unihub Global Network and New Horizon Capital, and formerly served as the chairman of China Satcom.

description.zh-cn: 温家宝与张培莉之女，温云松之妹。曾在雷曼兄弟公司和瑞士信贷第一波士顿银行任职。
description.en: Daughter of Wen Jiabao and Zhang Peili, and sister of Wen Yunsong. She has worked at Lehman Brothers and Credit Suisse First Boston.

description.zh-cn: 时任重庆市副市长兼公安局局长王立军私自前往美国驻成都总领事馆滞留，引发了一系列政治事件，直接导致了薄熙来的倒台。
description.en: In February 2012, then Vice Mayor of Chongqing Wang Lijun entered and stayed at the U.S. Consulate General in Chengdu, triggering a series of political events that directly led to the downfall of Bo Xilai.

description.zh-cn: 俄罗斯政治家，曾任俄罗斯总理，现任俄罗斯总统。他于2022年2月24日下令对乌克兰发动入侵（亦称“特别军事行动”）。魏京生赞同其“为保护本民族不再遭受种族清洗”的说法。
description.en: President of Russia, who on February 24, 2022, ordered a "special military operation" against Ukraine, launching the invasion. Wei Jingsheng agreed with his justification of 'protecting his people from ethnic cleansing'.

description.zh-cn: 黄敬长子，俞正声的大哥，原中华人民共和国国家安全部北美情报司司长，1986年叛逃美国。

zh-cn: 中国人民解放军国防科技大学

description.zh-cn: 中央军事委员会直属的综合性大学，中国人民解放军的军事院校，是中国顶尖高校之一，正军级。该机构始建于1953年，早期曾位于哈尔滨市（1953年至1966年），是第一个五年计划国家156项重点工程之一。1970年，其主体由哈尔滨工程学院内迁长沙后更名。此外，该学院在哈尔滨的部分集体于1966年转业、退出军队序列后，曾更名为一所民用高校，并继续在该地办学至1970年。
前中华人民共和国铁道部部长。
德国总理
法国总统
蒋中正的母亲。
蒋中正的原配夫人，蒋经国之母。
蒋中正的妾，蒋纬国养母。

zh-cn: 富兰克林·德拉诺·罗斯福

description.zh-cn: 美国第32任总统，大萧条期间推行了罗斯福新政，二战期间同盟国的关键领导人。
description.en: The 32nd President of the United States, who led the country through the Great Depression and was a key leader of the Allies during World War II.

death_place.zh-cn: 沃姆斯普林斯 (佐治亚州)

description.zh-cn: 英国政治家、演说家、军官、历史学家、作家与画家，曾两度担任英国首相，领导英国赢得第二次世界大战。
description.en: British statesman, orator, officer, historian, writer, and artist who served as Prime Minister of the United Kingdom twice, leading Britain to victory in the Second World War.

description.zh-cn: 此条目整合了两个与李锐相关的个体信息：一位是李锐的前妻，享受副部级离休干部待遇；另一位是李锐的父亲，同盟会成员，中华民国第一届国会众议员。
description.en: This entry integrates information about two individuals related to Li Rui: one is Li Rui's former wife; the other is Li Rui's father, a member of the Tongmenghui and a member of the House of Representatives in the first National Assembly of the Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 周永康长子。
周永康次子。
指在中国共产党内，以江泽民为核心的非正式政治派系。其主要成员多从上海市的领导岗位提升至中央高层。据博讯新闻称，该派系曾与温家宝存在权力斗争。
description.en: An informal political faction within the Communist Party of China, with Jiang Zemin as its core. Its main members were often promoted to the central leadership from positions in Shanghai. According to Boxun News, it was engaged in a power struggle with Wen Jiabao.

description.zh-cn: 中国现代民族工商业者的杰出代表，曾任中华人民共和国副主席。
中国政治人物，孟凡利的前任广东省省长和深圳市委书记。
description.en: Chinese politician, Meng Fanli's predecessor as Governor of Guangdong and Party Secretary of Shenzhen.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，现任中共中央政策研究室主任
原中共河北省委书记。
中国顶尖高校之一，隶属于中华人民共和国工业和信息化部，为C9联盟成员。在1970年至1973年间，其部分专业与哈军工二系合并搬迁至重庆，建立了临时教学单位。
原陕西省省长、省委书记，被赵发琦实名举报深度介入陕西千亿矿权案，干预司法，后于2019年1月被查。
description.en: Former Governor and Party Secretary of Shaanxi Province. He was publicly reported by Zhao Faqi for deep involvement and judicial interference in the 'Shaanxi Hundred-Billion-Yuan Mining Rights Case' and was subsequently investigated in January 2019.

description.zh-cn: 原中共青海省委书记、中共云南省委书记，后被查处。
中华人民共和国高级警官和政治人物。曾任中华人民共和国司法部部长、公安部常务副部长、北京市公安局局长等职。后因参加孙力军政治团伙，并涉嫌严重违纪违法被查处，被判处死刑，缓期二年执行；并被指主导了对艾未未的迫害。
description.en: A senior police officer and politician of the People's Republic of China. He served as Minister of Justice, Executive Vice Minister of Public Security, and director of the Beijing Municipal Public Security Bureau. He was later investigated for participating in Sun Lijun's political clique and serious violations of discipline and law, and was sentenced to death with a two-year reprieve; he was also allegedly behind the persecution of Ai Weiwei.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国政治人物，新党的共同创始人之一，曾任新党主席。
description.en: A politician of the Republic of China, one of the co-founders of the New Party.

description.zh-cn: 前中华人民共和国国家安全部副部长。
中国移动通信运营商，联动优势科技有限公司的创始股东之一。
description.en: A Chinese mobile communications operator and one of the founding shareholders of UMPay.

description.zh-cn: 习仲勋外孙女，习近平外甥女。
中国人民解放军空军特级飞行员，原副国级领导人，曾任中共中央政治局委员、中共中央军事委员会副主席，与张又侠同任中央军委副主席。

zh-cn: 中央军事委员会办公厅
en: General Office of the Central Military Commission

description.zh-cn: 位于北京市的学校
位于英国伦敦的一所著名公学。
description.en: A famous public school in England.

death_place.zh-cn: 重庆南山丽景度假酒店

description.zh-cn: 英国商人，与薄熙来家庭关系密切。在海伍德死亡案中，他被薄谷开来与张晓军合谋毒杀。
description.en: A British businessman with close ties to the Bo Xilai family. He was poisoned by Bo Gu Kailai and Zhang Xiaojun in the Death of Neil Heywood case.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国政治人物，曾任重庆市副市长、公安局局长。作为王立军事件核心人物，其进入美国驻成都总领事馆事件是薄熙来事件的导火索。
description.en: A Chinese politician who served as Vice Mayor and Public Security Bureau Chief of Chongqing. His entry into the U.S. Consulate General in Chengdu triggered the Bo Xilai incident.

description.zh-cn: 陈云的孙女，陈元之女。

birth_place.zh-cn: 日治朝鲜庆尚南道巨济市
birth_place.en: Geoje, South Gyeongsang Province, Korea under Japanese rule

death_place.zh-cn: 韩国首尔特别市首尔大学校病院
death_place.en: Seoul National University Hospital, Seoul, South Korea

description.zh-cn: 韩国民主运动领袖、政治家，韩国第14任总统，也是韩国民主化后的首位文人总统。他曾是韩国国会历史上任期最长的议员之一，也是最年轻当选的议员。在执政期间致力于消除腐败，并将两位前总统推上法庭，但其任期后期因亚洲金融危机和亲属腐败丑聞而备受争议。
description.en: A leader of the South Korean democracy movement and politician, the 14th President of South Korea, and the first civilian president after democratization. He was one of the longest-serving members in the history of the National Assembly and the youngest member ever elected. During his tenure, he focused on eradicating corruption and brought two former presidents to justice, but his later term was marred by the Asian financial crisis and family corruption scandals.

zh-cn: 中国人民解放军北部战区海军

description.zh-cn: 艾未未曾于1978年入读的中国高等艺术教育院校。
description.en: An institution of higher art education in China where Ai Weiwei enrolled in 1978.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国军事及政治人物，北洋军阀奉系首领。曾任中华民国陆海军大元帅，北洋政府最后一任国家元首。其在任期间，曾与蒋介石协议共同驱逐共产国际势力，并在北京搜查苏联使馆，处决了李大钊等共产党人。他是张学良之父。后在皇姑屯事件中被刺杀。
description.en: A military and political figure of the Republic of China, a prominent leader of the Fengtian clique of the Beiyang Warlords, Grand Marshal of the Army and Navy of the Republic of China, and father of Zhang Xueliang. He notably agreed with Chiang Kai-shek to jointly expel Comintern influence, raided the Soviet embassy in Beijing, and executed Li Dazhao and other communists. He was assassinated in the Huanggutun Incident.

description.zh-cn: 中国富商于文斗之女，张学良的原配妻子。在张学良的人生中扮演了重要角色。
description.en: Daughter of Chinese businessman Yu Wendou and the original wife of Zhang Xueliang. She played a significant role in Zhang Xueliang's life.

description.zh-cn: 张学良的夫人之一。
张学良的四弟。
张学良与于凤至的次子。
description.en: The second son of Zhang Xueliang and Yu Fengzhi.

description.zh-cn: 奉系将领，张学良的恩师与挚友。因遭杨宇霆排挤等原因起兵反奉，兵败后被处死。
description.en: A general of the Fengtian clique and a mentor to Zhang Xueliang. He rebelled against the Fengtian clique due to being sidelined by Yang Yuting and other reasons, and was executed after his defeat.

description.zh-cn: 北洋军阀执政时期奉系军阀重要将领，有“智囊”、“小诸葛”之称，后被张学良处决。
description.en: An important general of the Fengtian clique during the Beiyang government era, known as the 'mastermind' and 'little Zhuge', later executed by Zhang Xueliang.

description.zh-cn: 作为大日本帝国陆军的组成部分，该部队驻扎在中国东北，策划并执行了皇姑屯事件、九一八事变，并建立了满洲国。
张学良领导的军事力量。
北洋军阀的主要派系之一，由张作霖领导，根据地在东北，并受日本支持。
description.en: One of the main factions of the Beiyang Warlords, led by Zhang Zuolin, based in Northeast China, and supported by Japan.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军上将，原二炮政委，张震之子。
香港传媒机构。
中华人民共和国企业家，大连万达集团股份有限公司的创始人兼董事长，中国大陆前首富。
description.en: Chinese entrepreneur, founder and chairman of Dalian Wanda Group, and former richest man in mainland China.

birth_place.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国四川省绵阳专区
birth_place.en: Mianyang Prefecture, Sichuan, People's Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 中国的跨国企业集团，总部位于北京，业务涵盖商业地产、文化、金融等多个领域。
description.en: A Chinese multinational conglomerate based in Beijing, with business interests in commercial property, culture, and finance.

description.zh-cn: 朝鲜民主主义人民共和国的第二代最高领导人，曾任朝鲜劳动党总书记，被追封为“朝鲜劳动党永远的总书记”。
联合国的专门机构，负责国际公共卫生事务，是国际公共卫生领域的领导者。
description.en: A specialized agency of the United Nations responsible for international public health.

location.zh-cn: 美国马萨诸塞州剑桥市

description.zh-cn: 美国私立研究型大学，常春藤盟校成员。
description.en: A private Ivy League research university in the United States.

zh-cn: 中国共产党第十七届中央委员会
en: 17th Central Committee of the Chinese Communist Party

zh-cn: 中国共产党第十九届中央委员会
en: 19th Central Committee of the Chinese Communist Party

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国成立后兴建的第一家汽车制造厂。

zh-cn: 东风汽车集团有限公司
中华人民共和国教育部

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国国务院主管教育事业和语言文字工作的组成部门，是华中科技大学、厦门大学的主管部门。
马来西亚第四任及第七任首相，被称为“马来西亚现代化之父”。他曾是安华的政治导师，后成为其主要政治对手，在1998年将其革职；两人后来在2018年结盟推翻国阵政府，但联盟因2020年政治危机而破裂。其对“一带一路”的态度从初期的批评和重新谈判转变为后期的支持。
description.en: Fourth and seventh Prime Minister of Malaysia, known as the "Father of Modernization of Malaysia". He was once Anwar's political mentor before becoming his main political rival, dismissing him in 1998; the two later allied in 2018 to overthrow the Barisan Nasional government, but the alliance collapsed during the 2020 political crisis. His stance on the 'Belt and Road' initiative evolved from initial criticism and renegotiation to later support.

description.zh-cn: 原中国人民解放军将领、海军上将，曾任中共中央军事委员会委员、中华人民共和国中央军事委员会委员、中央军委政治工作部主任。2024年起因涉嫌严重违纪违法被调查，后被开除党籍军籍。
description.en: Former general and admiral of the People's Liberation Army Navy, who served as a member of the Central Military Commission and Director of the Political Work Department of the Central Military Commission. He was investigated for suspected serious violations of discipline and law starting in 2024, and was later expelled from the Party and the military.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军高级将领。
中国人民解放军高级将领。

zh-cn: 中国人民解放军陆军第七十三集团军
中国人民解放军第三十一军

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党早期成员、高层领导人，俞强声之父，中华人民共和国首任天津市市长、第一任第一机械工业部部长，曾与江青同居。
中国教育部直属的综合性全国重点大学，是世界一流大学建设高校（A类）、985工程、211工程重点建设高校。该校历史悠久，可追溯至多个前身，且有机构于1951年与之合校。
潜伏于美国中央情报局的中华人民共和国间谍。
中国商人，习近平的姐夫，齐桥桥的第二任丈夫，习明泽的姑父。
description.en: Chinese businessman, second husband of Qi Qiaoqiao, brother-in-law of Xi Jinping, and uncle of Xi Mingze.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国福建省下辖的地级市，习明泽的出生地。
中国政治人物，现任上海市市长，中共上海市委副书记。曾任夏宝龙担任浙江省省长时的常务副省长；是刘鹤的妹夫。
description.en: Chinese politician, currently Mayor of Shanghai and Deputy Secretary of the CPC Shanghai Municipal Committee. He previously served as Executive Vice Governor when Xia Baolong was Governor of Zhejiang, and is the brother-in-law of Liu He.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，陈吉宁的继任北京市市长。
中国政治人物，曾任清华大学党委书记、中共中央宣传部常务副部长。
description.en: Chinese politician who previously served as the Executive Deputy Head of the Propaganda Department of the CCP Central Committee.

description.zh-cn: 由媒体人柴静于2015年推出的一部关于中国空气污染的调查纪录片，引发了社会巨大反响，但随后遭到中国官方全面封杀。
description.en: A 2015 documentary film by journalist Chai Jing concerning air pollution in China, which sparked widespread public discussion before being censored by Chinese authorities.

description.zh-cn: 中国记者、主持人、独立媒体人，也是《穹顶之下》纪录片的制作人、主讲人和调查记者。
description.en: Chinese journalist and media personality, who produced, hosted, and conducted the investigation for the documentary 'Under the Dome'.

zh-cn: 路易斯·伊纳西奥·卢拉·达席尔瓦

description.zh-cn: 巴西现任总统。
委内瑞拉总统。
美国国会参议院多数党领袖。
新加坡政治人物，现任新加坡国务资政，前任新加坡总理，是何晶的丈夫。
description.en: Singaporean politician, current Senior Minister of Singapore, former Prime Minister of Singapore, and husband of Ho Ching.

description.zh-cn: 陈水扁的儿子
中华民国的最高立法机关，由中华民国立法院的成员组成。
description.en: The unicameral legislature of the Republic of China (Taiwan).

description.zh-cn: 中华民国政治人物、媒体人，新党的共同创始人之一。
description.en: A politician and media person of the Republic of China, one of the co-founders of the New Party.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国军事将领、政治人物，曾任中国国民党副主席、行政院院长、国防部部长、中华民国陆军一级上将。
台湾革命家、政治家和作家，曾任民主进步党主席，被誉为“台湾曼德拉”。2001年曾与访问台湾的魏京生会晤。
description.en: A Taiwanese revolutionary, politician, and writer, former chairman of the Democratic Progressive Party, known as 'Taiwan's Mandela'. He met with Wei Jingsheng during his visit to Taiwan in 2001.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国政治人物，曾任中国国民党主席、立法院副院长
中华人民共和国外交官。
中华人民共和国直辖市，夏宝龙的出生地。
description.en: A municipality directly under the Central Government of the People's Republic of China, and the birthplace of Xia Baolong.

description.zh-cn: 香港凤凰卫视记者、制片人，曾担任「风云对话」节目主持人。
马英九的妻子。
位于美国纽约市的私立研究型大学。
description.en: A private research university in New York City, United States.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国政治人物、法学学者、教授与律师。曾任中华民国总统（第14－15任）、行政院大陆委员会主任委员、民主进步党主席等职务。
description.en: A politician in the Republic of China (Taiwan), former Minister of the Mainland Affairs Council and former President of the Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国政治人物，中国国民党籍。曾任立法院院长、副院长、立法委员、中国国民党副主席等职，是中华民国宪政史上最资深的立法委员，也是国会全面改选后任期最长的立法院院长。
description.en: A Taiwanese politician and member of the Kuomintang. He served as President of the Legislative Yuan, Vice President, Legislator, and Vice Chairman of the Kuomintang. He is the most senior legislator in the constitutional history of the Republic of China and the longest-serving President of the Legislative Yuan since its full reelection.

description.zh-cn: 清朝末期政治人物，光绪帝异母弟，宣统帝溥仪生父。宣统年间，他担任监国摄政王，此职位是清朝末年为辅佐幼帝宣统帝而设立的。他也是清朝最后的实际统治者之一。
description.en: A political figure in the late Qing dynasty, half-brother of the Guangxu Emperor, and father of the Xuantong Emperor (Puyi). During the Xuantong era, he served as the Prince-Regent, a position established in the late Qing dynasty to assist the young Xuantong Emperor. He was also one of the last de facto rulers of the Qing dynasty.

en: Reorganized National Government of the Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 由日本在中国扶植的傀儡政权，系汪精卫在中国抗日战争期间成立的亲日政府，曾力邀梅兰芳演出但遭拒绝。
description.en: A pro-Japanese puppet government established by Wang Jingwei, fostered by Japan during the Second Sino-Japanese War, which invited Mei Lanfang to perform but was refused.

description.zh-cn: 指代抗日战争（第二次中日战争）时期的日本政府及军队，也是中国抗日战争的主要参战方之一，对中国发动侵略，并作为1932年至1945年间满洲国的宗主国。其军队对毛福梅的死亡负有直接责任。在第二次世界大战期间，它还占领了新加坡。此外，它也是日俄战争的参战国之一，最终取得胜利。
description.en: One of the combatants in the Russo-Japanese War, ultimately emerging victorious. It also occupied Singapore during World War II.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国的最高行政机关。
description.en: The executive branch of the government of the Republic of China (Taiwan).

description.zh-cn: 《世界经济导报》总编辑。曾因纪念胡耀邦文章事件被江泽民解除职务。

en: Death and state funeral of Mao Zedong

description.zh-cn: 毛泽东于1976年9月9日逝世，导致中共党内出现权力真空，是粉碎四人帮事件的直接导火索之一。
位于东南亚中南半岛东端的社会主义国家，由越南共产党一党专政。于2025年成为金砖伙伴国。
description.en: A socialist state at the eastern edge of the Indochinese Peninsula in Southeast Asia, under the single-party rule of the Communist Party of Vietnam. It became a BRICS partner in 2025.

description.zh-cn: 时任越共中央总书记、中央军委书记
越南唯一的执政党，对越南行政、立法、司法各个部门的机构直接掌控。
description.en: The sole ruling party of Vietnam, directly controlling the executive, legislative, and judicial branches of government.

description.zh-cn: 日本第124代天皇。他不仅是大日本帝国在二战期间的国家元首与军队最高统帅，也是田中角荣担任首相时的在位天皇。
description.en: The 124th Emperor of Japan, who reigned as the head of state and supreme commander of the military of the Empire of Japan during World War II, and also during Kakuei Tanaka's tenure as Prime Minister.

description.zh-cn: 标志着中国全面抗日战争的开始。
日本在中国东北地区建立的傀儡政权。
description.en: A puppet state established by Japan in Northeast China.

description.zh-cn: 清朝及中国历史上最后一位皇帝。由慈禧太后临终前指定继位，后任满洲国执政与皇帝，也是满洲国的唯一一位君主。
description.en: The last emperor of the Qing dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 一场1939年至1945年爆发的全球军事冲突，主要由轴心国与同盟国之间进行。罗斯福领导美国加入同盟国参战，艾森豪威尔在此期间担任盟军在欧洲的最高指挥官。在此期间，伯克利的实验室承包了原子弹研发计划。
description.en: A global military conflict mainly between the Axis powers and the Allies, in which Roosevelt led the United States as part of the Allied powers. Eisenhower served as the Supreme Commander of the Allied Expeditionary Force in Europe during this period. Berkeley's laboratory also undertook the atomic bomb development project during this time.

description.zh-cn: 中国抗日战争中首场大型会战，也是规模最大、战斗最激烈的战役之一。
日本中国派遣军总司令官，代表日本在中国战区投降。
标志着第二次世界大战和中国抗日战争的结束。此后，梅兰芳得以重返舞台。
description.en: The event that marked the end of World War II, after which Mei Lanfang was able to return to the stage.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国军事将领，国民革命军陆军二级上将。在枣宜会战中阵亡，是二战中同盟国牺牲的最高级别将领之一。

location.zh-cn: 美国加利福尼亚州山景城

description.zh-cn: 总部位于美国加利福尼亚州山景城的跨国科技公司，为Alphabet的子公司，专注于互联网相关服务和产品，业务范围涵盖互联网广告、互联网搜索、云计算等领域。
description.en: An American multinational technology company, a subsidiary of Alphabet Inc., specializing in Internet-related services and products, which include online advertising technologies, a search engine, cloud computing, software, and hardware.

description.zh-cn: Google公司在中华人民共和国的运营实体，曾运营google.cn。其搜索服务于2010年停止运营并转至香港。
description.en: The operating entity of Google in the People's Republic of China. Its search services ceased operations and were redirected to Hong Kong in 2010.

description.zh-cn: Google联合创始人，曾在斯坦福大学攻读博士学位。他坚决反对内容审查，支持退出中国市场。
description.en: Co-founder of Google, who was a Ph.D. student at Stanford University. He firmly opposed content censorship and supported withdrawing from the Chinese market.

description.zh-cn: 中国主要的搜索引擎公司和科技公司，Google在中国的主要竞争对手。其搜索引擎曾将“温云松”设为敏感词并限制搜索结果。
description.en: A Chinese technology company whose search engine once designated 'Wen Yunsong' as a sensitive term and restricted search results.

en: Federal government of the United States

description.zh-cn: 美国的国家政府，由美国宪法建立，负责管辖美国。
description.en: The national government of the United States, established by the U.S. Constitution, which governs the country.

description.zh-cn: 美国的互联网服务公司，是Google的竞争对手，也曾有过合作关系。
description.en: An American web services provider, a competitor and former partner of Google.

description.zh-cn: 中国跨国科技公司。是无界传媒的投资方之一，并在事件后提出将无界传媒清盘。
description.en: One of the investors in Wujie Media, which proposed to liquidate the company after the incident.

location.zh-cn: 中国大陆、台湾海峡、中缅边境
location.en: Mainland China, Taiwan Strait, China–Burma border

description.zh-cn: 20世纪中国爆发的规模最大、影响最深远的内战，分为两个阶段，是中国现代史的重大转折点。
description.en: The largest and most influential civil war in 20th century China, divided into two stages, marking a major turning point in modern Chinese history.

description.zh-cn: 美国国会的两院之一。

en: Supreme Court of the United States

description.zh-cn: 美国联邦司法机构的最高级别法院。
美国两大主要政党之一，罗斯福所属政党。
description.en: One of the two major contemporary political parties in the United States, to which Roosevelt belonged.

description.zh-cn: 由英国统治的全球帝国，在1921年达到巅峰。它在鸦片战争中作为主要西方列强，与清朝进行了两次战争，其中是发动第二次鸦片战争的主要国家之一。此外，它也是新加坡在1824年至1963年间的宗主国。
description.en: A global empire ruled by the United Kingdom, which reached its peak in 1921. It was the main Western power in the Opium Wars, fighting against the Qing dynasty in both conflicts, and was one of the main countries that initiated the Second Opium War. It also served as the sovereign state of Singapore from 1824 to 1963.

description.zh-cn: 第二次世界大战后，以美国为首的西方阵营与以苏联为首的东方阵营（及其各自盟友）之间，围绕地缘政治展开的紧张对峙和政治对抗。美国总统艾森豪威尔的任期是冷战的关键时期。
description.en: A period of geopolitical tension and political confrontation after World War II, primarily between the Western Bloc, led by the United States, and the Eastern Bloc, led by the Soviet Union and their respective allies. Eisenhower's presidency was a key period of the Cold War.

description.zh-cn: 2001年9月11日发生在美国本土的一系列自杀式恐怖袭击事件，由基地组织策划。
description.en: A series of four coordinated suicide terrorist attacks by the Islamic terrorist group al-Qaeda against the United States on September 11, 2001.

description.zh-cn: 美国政治人物，第16任美国总统。
美国历史上规模最大、最惨烈的内战。
美国牧师、社会运动家、民权运动领袖。
俄罗斯共产主义革命家、政治家、政治理论家和思想家，苏维埃俄国和苏联的主要缔造者和首任政府首脑，共产国际的创始人。其思想影响了中国共产党早期的民族政策。
description.en: Russian communist revolutionary, politician, and political theorist, the main founder of Soviet Russia and the Soviet Union, and founder of the Communist International.

zh-cn: 俄罗斯苏维埃联邦社会主义共和国

description.zh-cn: 苏联的创始成员国和最大加盟共和国。

zh-cn: 乌克兰苏维埃社会主义共和国

description.zh-cn: 苏联的创始成员国。
苏维埃社会主义共和国联盟解体事件，指苏联于20世纪90年代初停止存在并分裂为多个主权国家的过程，此后列宁主义的影响力在一些国家下降。
苏联政治家，勃列日涅夫之后的苏联最高领导人。
苏联政治家，安德罗波夫之后的苏联最高领导人。
英国政治家，曾任英国首相。她曾与邓小平就香港前途问题进行谈判；马尔康·芮夫金曾在其内阁中担任苏格兰事务大臣。
description.en: British stateswoman who served as Prime Minister of the United Kingdom. She negotiated with Deng Xiaoping on the future of Hong Kong; Malcolm Rifkind served as Secretary of State for Scotland in her cabinet.

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国商务部

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国国务院主管商业经济和贸易的组成部门。
description.en: A constituent department of the State Council of the People's Republic of China responsible for commercial economy and trade.

location.zh-cn: 重庆南山丽景度假酒店

description.zh-cn: 英国商人尼尔·海伍德于2011年11月13日在重庆南山丽景度假酒店被杀害。尸体于11月14日被发现。后经调查，此为他杀刑事案件，嫌疑人为薄谷开来及薄熙来家庭佣工张晓军（男性）。张晓军系薄家勤务人员，且是谷开来谋杀尼尔·海伍德的同案犯。此案随后进行了对谷开来、张晓军故意杀害尼尔·伍德的司法审判。
description.en: An orderly of the Bo family and an accomplice in Gu Kailai's murder of Neil Heywood.

zh-cn: 朝鲜民主主义人民共和国

description.zh-cn: 位于东亚朝鲜半岛北部的国家，由朝鲜劳动党实行一党专政。被指控向俄罗斯提供武器及派遣士兵参与战争。
description.en: Accused of supplying weapons and sending soldiers to participate in the war on Russia's side.

description.zh-cn: 位于东亚朝鲜半岛南部的共和制国家。
在朝鲜战争中与中国人民志愿军作战的多国部队。
description.en: The multinational military force that fought against the Chinese People's Volunteer Army during the Korean War.

description.zh-cn: 韩国独立运动家、政治家，大韩民国首任总统、首任国会议长。
description.en: A Korean independence activist and politician, the first President of the Republic of Korea and the first Speaker of the National Assembly.

description.zh-cn: 美国第33任总统，罗斯福的最后一任副总统，在其逝世后接任总统。
description.en: 33rd President of the United States, Roosevelt's final Vice President who succeeded him as President upon his death.

description.zh-cn: 美国陆军五星上将，军事家、政治家，曾任第34任美国总统。第二次世界大战期间，他担任盟军在欧洲的最高指挥官。
description.en: An American military officer and statesman who served as the 34th president of the United States. He was a five-star general in the United States Army and served as Supreme Commander of the Allied Expeditionary Force in Europe during World War II.

description.zh-cn: 朝鲜民主主义人民共和国的武装力量。
第二次世界大战的战区之一，地理范围包括东亚、东南亚、太平洋、印度洋和大洋洲。它是二战地理上规模最大的战场。
description.en: One of the theaters of World War II, with a geographical scope including East Asia, Southeast Asia, the Pacific Ocean, the Indian Ocean, and Oceania. It was the largest theater of war geographically in WWII.

description.zh-cn: 同盟国对日本发出的最后通牒，要求其无条件投降。
中、美、英三国元首发表，要求日本归还窃取于中国的领土。
林立果及其“联合舰队”成员制定的武装起义计划草稿。
负责中共中央领导人警卫工作的部队，代号为中共中央警卫团。
解放军南京军区空军政委，林立果“联合舰队”成员。

zh-cn: 江油未成年人欺凌事件

location.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国四川省绵阳市江油市

description.zh-cn: 一宗因未成年人欺凌案及后续警方处理引发大规模警民冲突的群体性事件。
中华人民共和国西南地区的一个省份。
description.en: A province in Southwest China.

zh-cn: 中国人民武装警察部队

description.zh-cn: 中国的微博客网站，曾完全封锁与“温云松”相关的微博。
description.en: A Chinese microblogging website that once completely blocked posts related to 'Wen Yunsong'.

description.zh-cn: 中国记者，曾获世界新闻自由奖
中国维权律师、美国天主教大学访问学者

zh-cn: 2025年陕西蒲城职校学生坠楼事件

en: Armed Forces of the People's Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的武装力量，包括中国人民解放军、中国人民武装警察部队和民兵。
戴笠的继任者，先后掌管军统局、保密局、情报局。
指台湾作家刘宜良在美国遭枪杀的政治谋杀事件，因其笔名为“江南”而得名。此案牵涉到台湾的情报机构，并对蒋氏家族的声誉造成重创。
description.en: Refers to the political assassination of Taiwanese writer Henry Liu in the United States. The case implicated Taiwan's intelligence agencies and severely damaged the reputation of the Chiang family.

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国国家元首列表
en: List of state representatives of the People's Republic of China

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国国家机构

description.zh-cn: 法轮功的创始人、精神领袖。其出生日期存在争议，中国政府称其出生于1952年7月7日，李洪志本人称该日期为文革期间的错误登记，其实际生日为1951年5月13日。
description.en: Founder and spiritual leader of Falun Gong.

description.zh-cn: 中国官方媒体报导的事件，法轮功方面指其为政府导演的伪案，是镇压宣传战的转折点。
由法轮功学员创办的媒体机构。
由大纪元时报发表的系列社论，批判共产主义和中国共产党。
美国的立法机构。
description.en: The legislature of the United States.

description.zh-cn: 一家总部位于美国的中国古典舞和传统音乐艺术团。
description.en: A US-based performing arts and entertainment company known for classical Chinese dance and traditional music.

description.zh-cn: 中国维权律师
日本现任天皇
日本现任内阁总理大臣
日本国会的下议院
传说中日本的初代天皇
镰仓幕府首任征夷大将军
由成吉思汗建立的横跨欧亚大陆的帝国，元朝的前身，后灭亡金朝与南宋。蒙哥是其第四位大汗。
description.en: An empire founded by Genghis Khan, of which Möngke was the fourth Great Khan.

description.zh-cn: 江户幕府首任征夷大将军
日本历史上的最后一个武家政权，也是最后一个封建军事政府。它在戊辰战争后被推翻。福泽谕吉曾受雇于幕府从事翻译工作，并随其使节团出访欧美。
description.en: The last feudal military government of Japan, which was overthrown after the Boshin War. Fukuzawa Yukichi was employed by the shogunate as a translator and accompanied its missions to the United States and Europe.

description.zh-cn: 指日本在19世纪后期、幕末至明治时代初期间推行的一系列政治、经济和社会近代化改革运动，旨在使日本现代化并摆脱封建主义。福泽谕吉是该运动重要的思想推动者。
description.en: A series of political, economic, and social modernization reforms implemented in Japan in the late 19th century, from the end of the Edo period to the beginning of the Meiji period, aimed at modernizing the country and abolishing feudalism. Fukuzawa Yukichi was a key intellectual promoter of this movement.

location.zh-cn: 朝鲜半岛、辽东半岛、山东、威海、黄海、澎湖

description.zh-cn: 1894年至1895年间清朝与大日本帝国之间因朝鲜问题爆发的一场大规模战争，以清朝惨败告终。福泽谕吉曾将其描述为“文野之战”并支持日本开战。战争赔款被用作建立京都帝国大学（京都大学前身）的资金来源之一。
description.en: A war between the Qing dynasty and Japan. Fukuzawa Yukichi described it as a 'war between civilization and barbarism' and supported Japan's engagement in it. The indemnity from this war was used as one of the funding sources for the establishment of Kyoto Imperial University (the predecessor of Kyoto University).

description.zh-cn: 第二次世界大战时的军事同盟，由德国、意大利、日本等国组成。
大日本帝国对美国海军基地的突然袭击，导致美国加入第二次世界大战。
description.en: A surprise military strike by the Empire of Japan against the United States naval base, which led to the U.S. entry into World War II.

description.zh-cn: 前日本内阁总理大臣
日本国立研究型综合大学
位于日本京都的国立综合性研究型大学，前身是1897年成立的日本第二所旧制帝国大学——京都帝国大学。作为日本最高学府之一，京大以‘自由的学风’著称，是京都学派的发祥地，被誉为‘科学家的摇篮’。
description.en: A national comprehensive research university located in Kyoto, Japan. Its predecessor was Kyoto Imperial University, established in 1897 as the second Imperial University in Japan. As one of Japan's top academic institutions, it is known for its 'spirit of freedom', is the birthplace of the Kyoto School, and is regarded as a 'cradle of scientists'.

description.zh-cn: 阿富汗难民救助者，拉蒙·麦格塞塞奖得主

zh-cn: 国务院国有资产监督管理委员会
en: State-owned Assets Supervision and Administration Commission of the State Council

description.zh-cn: 代表中华人民共和国国务院对中国移动通信集团有限公司履行出资人职责
中国移动通信集团有限公司由其部分资产分拆组建，是中国电信运营商，曾与电讯盈科成立合资公司。
description.en: A Chinese telecommunications operator that formed a joint venture with PCCW.

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国工业和信息化部
en: Ministry of Industry and Information Technology

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国电信业监管机构
位于东欧的国家，自2022年2月24日起遭受俄罗斯的全面入侵。欧盟候选国。北约伙伴国，寻求加入北约。
description.en: A country in Eastern Europe that has been subjected to a full-scale invasion by Russia since February 24, 2022.

zh-cn: 俄罗斯对乌克兰的侵略

description.zh-cn: 2022年2月24日，俄罗斯对乌克兰发动的全面入侵，标志着始于2014年起俄乌战争的重大升级。此次入侵为自第二次世界大战以来发生在欧洲大陆的最大规模的战争之一。魏京生曾对此发表观点，赞同俄罗斯方面的部分说法。
description.en: On 24 February 2022, Russia launched a full-scale invasion of Ukraine, marking a major escalation of the Russo-Ukrainian War that began in 2014. The invasion is one of the largest-scale wars on the European continent since World War II. Wei Jingsheng expressed his views on it, agreeing with some of Russia's justifications.

description.zh-cn: 俄罗斯政治家，曾任俄罗斯总统、前俄罗斯总理。
description.en: Russian politician, former President of Russia.

description.zh-cn: 由东斯拉夫人建立的第一个东斯拉夫国家
存在于1721年至1917年的历史国家。林则徐在新疆期间对其日益增长的威胁保持警惕，并认为其为中国未来的长远隐患。在第二次鸦片战争中，它扮演调停者角色，并借机迫使清政府签订不平等条约，通过《北京条约》从清朝攫取了外东北及中国北方大片领土。它也是日俄战争的参战国之一，但最终战败。
description.en: A historical state that existed from 1721 to 1917. During his exile in Xinjiang, Lin Zexu became wary of its growing threat and considered it a long-term danger to China. During the Second Opium War, it acted as a mediator and took the opportunity to force the Qing government to sign unequal treaties, thereby acquiring Outer Manchuria and other large territories in northern China through the Convention of Peking. It was also one of the combatants in the Russo-Japanese War, but was ultimately defeated.

description.zh-cn: 俄罗斯沙皇国沙皇，俄罗斯帝国皇帝
1904年至1905年间大日本帝国与俄罗斯帝国为争夺中国东北地区和朝鲜的控制权而爆发的战争。
description.en: A war fought between the Empire of Japan and the Russian Empire from 1904 to 1905 over rival imperial ambitions in Manchuria and Korea.

location.zh-cn: 中国东北地区、朝鲜、黄海、日本海
location.en: Northeast China, Korea, Yellow Sea, Sea of Japan

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国最高人民检察院检察长。曾任中共上海市委副书记。
中央军事委员会办公厅原主任。
中国政治家，曾任司法部部长（傅政华的继任），后任江西省政协主席。2024年因严重违纪违法被查处。
description.en: Chinese politician, who served as Minister of Justice (succeeding Fu Zhenghua) and later as Chairman of the Jiangxi Provincial CPPCC. He was investigated in 2024 for severe disciplinary violations.

description.zh-cn: 袁世凯的长子，曾积极推动其父称帝。
description.en: Yuan Shikai's eldest son, who actively encouraged his father to become emperor.

description.zh-cn: 清末民初政治家，袁世凯的盟友。
晚清重臣、政治家和军事家，满洲正白旗人，慈禧太后的心腹。他是载沣的岳父，也是溥仪的外祖父。
description.en: A prominent minister, statesman, and military leader in the late Qing dynasty, a confidant of Empress Dowager Cixi, and the father-in-law of Zaifeng.

description.zh-cn: 晚清维新派领袖、清末民初的政治家和思想家。他是戊戌变法的主要策划者之一，并曾试图将儒家改造为国教（孔教）。
description.en: Leader of the late Qing reformists, a politician and thinker active during the late Qing and early Republican eras. He was one of the main planners of the Hundred Days' Reform and attempted to establish Confucianism as the state religion (the Confucian Church).

description.zh-cn: 晚清维新派政治家，戊戌六君子之一。
description.en: A reformist politician in the late Qing dynasty, one of the 'Six Gentlemen of the Wuxu Reform'.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国政治家。曾任军政府鄂军都督、大元帅，以及中华民国临时副总统、第一任副总统；后继任第二、三任大总统。
description.en: A Chinese politician who served as the first Vice President and the second and third President of the Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国政治家，北洋军阀皖系首领，曾是袁世凯手下重要将领。历任参谋总长、国务总理、临时执政等职。因在要求清帝退位、抵制洪宪帝制和讨伐张勋复辟中的作用，有“三造共和”之美誉。
description.en: A Chinese politician and warlord, leader of the Anhui clique. He served as Premier and Provisional Chief Executive of the Republic of China. He is known for his role in forcing the Qing emperor's abdication, resisting the Hongxian Monarchy, and suppressing the Manchu Restoration, earning him the moniker 'the three-time creator of the Republic'.

description.zh-cn: 中国近代政治活动家，筹安会发起人，积极推动袁世凯称帝。
description.en: A Chinese politician active in the late Qing and early Republican periods, founder of the Chou'anhui, who actively promoted Yuan Shikai's monarchical ambitions.

description.zh-cn: 光绪帝的皇后，宣统帝（溥仪）的嗣母。她是清朝最后一位实际掌权者，宣统年间与载沣共同作为最高统治者，拥有重大事件的最终决定权。在宣统帝逊位时垂帘听政，并代表其颁布退位诏书。
description.en: The empress consort of the Guangxu Emperor and adoptive mother of the Xuantong Emperor. She was the last de facto ruler of the Qing dynasty. During the Xuantong era, she served as co-supreme ruler with Zaifeng, holding the final decision-making power on major events. She also issued the abdication edict on behalf of the emperor.

description.zh-cn: 中国金融科技公司

zh-cn: 中国证券监督管理委员会

location.zh-cn: 北京市西城区金融大街19号富凯大厦A座

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国国务院直属事业单位，作为金融监管机构，负责证券、期货市场的监督管理。
description.en: A direct institution under the State Council of the People's Republic of China, responsible for the supervision and management of the securities and futures markets.

description.zh-cn: 动作演员、功夫明星、佛教徒、慈善家、企业家
中国电子商务公司
中国浙江省省会；曾是南宋都城，亦是岳飞遇害及安葬地。

zh-cn: 加利福尼亚大学伯克利分校

description.zh-cn: 位于美国加利福尼亚州伯克利市的世界著名公立研究型大学，是加利福尼亚大学系统的创始大学。
description.en: A world-renowned public research university located in Berkeley, California, USA, and the founding campus of the University of California system.

description.zh-cn: 中国声乐家，钱学森夫人。
香港武侠小说作家、《明报》创办人，与倪匡、黄沾、蔡澜并列为“香港四大才子”。在其封笔后，曾亲自为旗下的《明报》向古龙邀稿《陆小凤系列》。
description.en: A Hong Kong wuxia novelist and founder of Ming Pao. He is known as one of the 'Four Great Talents of Hong Kong' along with Ni Kuang, James Wong and Chua Lam. After he stopped writing novels, he personally invited Gu Long to write the 'Lu Xiaofeng Series' for his newspaper, Ming Pao.

description.zh-cn: 鲁迅的伴侣，鲁迅的学生。
位于日本仙台的一所国立大学
中国近代思想家、学者，鲁迅的老师。
中华民国大陆时期的直辖市，也是四一二事件的主要发生地。
description.en: A direct-administered municipality during the Republic of China period on the mainland, and the primary location of the April 12th Incident.

description.zh-cn: 胡锦涛的女儿。
企业家，曾任新浪网CEO。
中国大陆的一家网络公司。

zh-cn: 胡锦涛中共二十大离场事件

description.zh-cn: 指中共二十大闭幕会上，前总书记胡锦涛被工作人员带离会场的事件。
中国历史上继元朝之后的大一统王朝，也是最后一个由汉族统治的帝制王朝。其间改行中书省为承宣布政使司，俗称“行省”。
由忽必烈建立的中国历史上由蒙古族建立的大一统王朝，追尊蒙哥为宪宗桓肃皇帝。其设立行中书省作为一级地方行政区划，官场上使用空印文书的习惯做法被明朝沿用，并最终引发了空印案。
description.en: A Chinese dynasty founded by Kublai Khan, and established by the Mongols, which posthumously honored Möngke as Emperor Xianzong Huansu. The bureaucratic practice of using empty-sealed documents, inherited from the Yuan, led to the Empty Seal Case in the Ming dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 明太祖朱元璋的皇后，郭子兴的养女，朱高煦之祖母。
description.en: The empress of the Hongwu Emperor Zhu Yuanzhang, and the grandmother of Zhu Gaoxu.

description.zh-cn: 元末明初的群雄之一，汉政权建立者
明朝开国军事将领，郑国公
明朝开国功臣、政治家、文学家
明朝最后一任中书省丞相，胡惟庸案的核心人物。
description.en: The last Chancellor of the Ming Dynasty and the central figure in the Case of Hu Weiyong.

description.zh-cn: 明太祖朱元璋嫡长子，建文帝朱允炆之父，明朝开国皇太子。
description.en: The eldest son and heir apparent of Zhu Yuanzhang, the first crown prince of the Ming dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 明朝第二位皇帝，明惠宗朱允炆，朱元璋之孙，年号“建文”。在靖难之役中被其叔朱棣击败。
description.en: The second emperor of the Ming dynasty, a grandson of Zhu Yuanzhang.

description.zh-cn: 明太祖朱元璋第四子，明朝第三位皇帝，明成祖。原为燕王，通过靖难之役从其侄建文帝手中夺取皇位，年号永乐。他是朱高煦之父。
description.en: The third Emperor of the Ming Dynasty, the fourth son of the Hongwu Emperor. He seized the throne from his nephew, the Jianwen Emperor, through the Jingnan Campaign, and was the father of Zhu Gaoxu.

description.zh-cn: 元末红巾军领袖，小明王

zh-cn: 中央外事工作委员会办公室
en: Office of the Central Foreign Affairs Commission

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党中央外事工作委员会的办事机构。
description.en: The administrative office of the Central Foreign Affairs Commission of the Communist Party of China.

zh-cn: 中共中央台湾工作办公室

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国负责处理台湾事务的机构，与中共中央台湾工作办公室为“一个机构两块牌子”。
description.en: An administrative agency under the State Council of the People's Republic of China responsible for Taiwan-related affairs. It shares the same office with the Taiwan Work Office of the CCP Central Committee.

description.zh-cn: 中国外交官，曾任中华人民共和国外交部部长。
description.en: Chinese diplomat who served as the Minister of Foreign Affairs of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国前外交官。
位于西亚阿拉伯半岛的君主专制国家，政教合一，以石油经济为支柱。曾被邀请加入金砖国家，后暂缓申请。
位于西亚的政教合一伊斯兰共和国，于2024年加入金砖国家的成员国。该国被指控向俄罗斯提供无人机和弹道导弹。
description.en: Accused of supplying drones and ballistic missiles to Russia.

description.zh-cn: 欧盟外交与安全政策高级代表。
中华民国时期新疆省的统治者，下令处决了毛泽民、陈潭秋、林基路等人。
description.en: Ruler of Xinjiang Province during the Republic of China era, who ordered the execution of Mao Zemin, Chen Tanqiu, Lin Jilu, and others.

description.zh-cn: 令计划的妻子。
神秘政商联盟组织
唐朝第9任皇帝，亦是在位时间最长的皇帝。在位前期开创开元盛世，后期因怠政导致安史之乱爆发。他曾征召李白入京任翰林供奉，并追封庄周为南华真人。其与杨贵妃的爱情故事是《长恨歌》的主题。
description.en: The 9th and longest-reigning emperor of the Tang Dynasty. He posthumously honored Zhuang Zhou as Nanhua Zhenren, and his love story with Yang Guifei is the subject of the 'Song of Everlasting Regret'.

description.zh-cn: 唐朝诗人，李白的好友与敬慕对象。
唐朝著名宦官，本名冯元一。他深得唐玄宗宠信，官至骠骑大将军，封齐国公。一生对玄宗忠心耿耿，但据说也曾因被李白冒犯而排挤他。
唐玄宗的贵妃，中国古代四大美女之一，《长恨歌》的主角之一。据说因高力士中伤而排斥李白。
description.en: A consort of Emperor Xuanzong of Tang, one of the Four Beauties of ancient China, and a main character in the 'Song of Everlasting Regret'.

description.zh-cn: 唐朝名将，传说曾受李白救助，后为获罪的李白求情。
东晋政治家，李白终身仰慕的历史人物之一。
唐朝的宫廷机构，李白曾在此担任翰林供奉。
起源于中国的本土民族宗教，以“道”为最高信仰，深受道家思想影响，后将庄周尊为南华真人。李白笃信道教，热切向往神仙不死。
description.en: An indigenous Chinese religion, deeply influenced by Taoist philosophy, which later revered Zhuang Zhou as Nanhua Zhenren.

description.zh-cn: 中国商人。
美国军事家、政治家、外交家，曾任美国陆军参谋长，并曾作为美国特使调停国共冲突。
description.en: An American soldier, statesman, and diplomat, who served as Chief of Staff of the United States Army, and also as an American envoy who mediated the KMT-CCP conflict.

description.zh-cn: 由首批入选985工程的九所高校组成的高校联盟。
中华人民共和国教育部直属综合性全国重点研究型大学，慎海雄的母校之一。
中华人民共和国工业和信息化部所属的高等院校，'双一流A类'、原'985工程'、原'211工程'重点建设大学。
位于中国北京市的大学，温云松在此获得工科学位。
description.en: A university in Beijing, China, where Wen Yunsong obtained his engineering degree.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国教育部直属的全国重点大学，是“双一流A类”、“985工程”、“211工程”重点建设大学。也是北京师范大学的前身之一，徐旭生曾任校长。
description.en: One of the predecessors of Beijing Normal University, where Xu Xusheng served as chancellor.

description.zh-cn: 位于中国辽宁省沈阳市的著名高等学府，一所以工科为主的综合性大学，阎明复曾就读于此。
description.en: A university that Yan Mingfu attended.

description.zh-cn: 作为东南大学的前身，其电讯工程相关专业于1956年并入组建电子科技大学。现为中央直管、教育部直属的研究型综合性大学。
位于中国湖北省武汉市的中国副部级研究型综合大学，“双一流A类”、“985工程”、“211工程”重点建设大学。
description.en: A comprehensive research university located in Wuhan, Hubei, China.

en: Huazhong University of Science and Technology

location.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国湖北省武汉市

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国教育部直属的综合性重点大学，双一流A类、985工程、211工程重点建设大学。

location.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国广东省广州市

description.zh-cn: 华南理工大学的前身，直属中华人民共和国教育部的公立综合性研究型大学。其电讯工程相关专业于1956年并入组建电子科技大学。此外，在1958年至1962年间，曾有一个机构自华南工学院分出，后又重新并入该学院。

en: University of Electronic Science and Technology of China

location.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国四川省成都市

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国教育部直属重点大学，双一流A类、985工程、211工程重点建设大学。
中国顶尖高校之一，隶属于中华人民共和国工业和信息化部，以发展航空、航天、航海（三航）为特色，是“双一流A类”、“985工程”、“211工程”重点建设大学，国防七子之一。其历史可追溯至1952年，当时由南京大学、交通大学、浙江大学的航空工程系在南京组建，并于1956年迁至西安，更名为西安航空学院，是西北工业大学的前身之一。
由SARS-CoV-2病毒引起的疾病。

location.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国湖北省

description.zh-cn: 世界卫生组织总干事。
一场1929年至1933年之间开始的全球性经济大衰退，是第二次世界大战前最严重的全球经济衰退，也是罗斯福新政的背景。
description.en: A severe worldwide economic depression that was the context for Roosevelt's New Deal.

description.zh-cn: 美国联邦政府的主要情报机构之一。张纯如在遗书中声称自己被该组织盯上。
description.en: One of the principal intelligence agencies of the United States federal government. Iris Chang claimed in her suicide note that she was being targeted by this organization.

description.zh-cn: 企业家和商业巨头，SpaceX、特斯拉公司CEO及首席设计师，PayPal创始人，Solarcity主席，美国政府效率部负责人。宾夕法尼亚大学校友。
description.en: Entrepreneur and business magnate, CEO and Chief Designer of SpaceX, CEO and Product Architect of Tesla, Inc., founder of PayPal, chairman of SolarCity, and Head of the US Government Efficiency Department. An alumnus of the University of Pennsylvania.

description.zh-cn: 中国工程院院士，呼吸病学专家。
时任中国人民解放军第38集团军军长，因拒绝执行戒严命令而被撤职查办。
六四事件受害者，在六部口被坦克碾压致双腿截肢。

zh-cn: 中国人民解放军陆军第八十二集团军

description.zh-cn: 隶属北京军区，是参与戒严和清场行动的精锐部队之一。

zh-cn: 北京高校学生自治联合会

description.zh-cn: 六四事件期间由北京各高校学生成立的独立学生组织。
社会运动人士、历史学者，中国1989年六四事件（八九民运）学生领袖之一。后流亡美国，他曾称呼魏京生为“民主斗士”。
description.en: One of the student leaders of the 1989 Tiananmen Square protests in China, who later went into exile in the United States. He once called Wei Jingsheng a 'democracy fighter'.

description.zh-cn: 中国1989年六四事件学生运动领袖之一，天安门广场绝食行动发起人之一，人权活动家，企业高管，封从德前妻。
description.en: A student leader in the 1989 Tiananmen Square protests, human rights activist, business executive, and the ex-wife of Feng Congde.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国作家、社会活动家、文艺评论家、人权活动家、持不同政见者，曾参与六四事件，是《零八宪章》的主要起草人之一，并于2010年获得诺贝尔和平奖。对此，魏京生曾批评将诺贝尔奖授予他的决定。
description.en: A Chinese writer, human rights activist, and the 2010 Nobel Peace Prize laureate. Wei Jingsheng criticized the decision to award him the Nobel Prize.

description.zh-cn: 文革期间响应毛泽东号召向当权派夺权的群众组织派别。
文革期间支持各地原有党政军领导的群众组织派别。
时任中共中央办公厅副主任兼秘书局局长，被认为是习近平的贴身秘书。

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国公务员
en: Civil service of the People's Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 中国的国家公务员制度，是指依法履行公职、纳入国家行政编制、由国家财政负担工资福利的工作人员。规范中华人民共和国公务员管理的主要法律是其重要依据。
位于中国北京天安门广场东侧的综合性博物馆，收藏有神舟五号返回舱。它是文化和旅游部直属事业单位，首长高配副部长级。
description.en: A comprehensive museum located on the east side of Tiananmen Square in Beijing, China, which houses the Shenzhou 5 return capsule. It is a directly affiliated institution of the Ministry of Culture and Tourism, with its head ranked as a Vice Minister.

description.zh-cn: 位于中国上海的证券交易所，由中国证监会管理的事业单位，理事长高配副部长级。
description.en: A stock exchange located in Shanghai, China.

description.zh-cn: 与中国烟草总公司一个机构两块牌子，属于中央行政企业。
中央行政企业，享受副部级政治经济待遇。

中央金融企业，享受副部级政治经济待遇。
民国时期的主要商业银行之一，后被国民政府增资控股。在成为中央金融企业后，享受副部级政治经济待遇。
description.en: One of the major commercial banks during the Republic of China period, later controlled by the Nationalist Government through increased capital. After becoming a central financial enterprise, it enjoys vice-ministerial political and economic treatment.

description.zh-cn: 中央金融企业，享受副部级政治经济待遇。

description.en: A major state-owned oil and gas corporation in China, which was criticized by name in 'Under the Dome'. Its senior engineer later wrote an article refuting the film's claims.

description.zh-cn: 国有重要骨干企业（副部级央企）。

description.en: Zhang Yimou's birthplace

中国政治人物，曾任中华人民共和国司法部部长（傅政华的前任）、最高人民检察院检察长，现任中华人民共和国最高人民法院院长、中华人民共和国首席大法官。
description.en: Chinese political figure, formerly Minister of Justice (predecessor to Fu Zhenghua) and Procurator-General of the Supreme People's Procuratorate, currently President of the Supreme People's Court and Chief Justice of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 陈希的前任中共中央组织部常务副部长。
中国政治人物，时任最高人民法院院长，被指涉嫌干预陕西千亿矿权案的审理。
description.en: Chinese politician, then-President of the Supreme People's Court, accused of interfering in the trial of the 'Shaanxi Hundred-Billion-Yuan Mining Rights Case'.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国政治人物、国家级副职领导人、香港特别行政区第四任行政长官、中国人民政治协商会议全国委员会副主席。
description.en: The fourth Chief Executive of Hong Kong and current Vice Chairman of the National Committee of the CPPCC

description.zh-cn: 时任中国人民解放军总装备部部长、中国载人航天工程总指挥，宣布了神舟五号的发射成功与任务圆满成功。
description.en: Then Director of the PLA General Armaments Department and Commander-in-Chief of the China Manned Space Program, who announced the successful launch and completion of the Shenzhou 5 mission.

description.zh-cn: 中国军事人物
中国军事人物
后金开国之君，清朝奠基者。他统一了女真各部，并在与明朝的战争中取得了多次胜利，但在宁远之战中被袁崇焕击败并负伤，不久后去世。
description.en: The founder of the Later Jin, who unified the Jurchen tribes. He achieved numerous victories in wars against the Ming Dynasty but was defeated and wounded by Yuan Chonghuan at the Battle of Ningyuan, dying shortly thereafter.

description.zh-cn: 由女真首领努尔哈赤建立的政权，是清朝的前身。在其存续期间，与明朝在辽东地区展开了长期的军事对抗。
description.en: A regime established by the Jurchen leader Nurhaci, and the predecessor to the Qing Dynasty. During its existence, it engaged in long-term military conflict with the Ming Dynasty in the Liaodong region.

description.zh-cn: 明末清初军事家、政治家，吴周开国皇帝，三藩之一。
description.en: A military general and politician in the late Ming and early Qing dynasties, founding emperor of the Wu Zhou dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 清朝第四位皇帝，清朝入关后的第二位皇帝，年号康熙，庙号清圣祖。在位61年，是中国历史上在位时间最长的皇帝。雍正帝之父，隆科多的表兄。
description.en: The fourth emperor of the Qing dynasty, posthumously known as Emperor Shengzu. His 61-year reign makes him the longest-reigning emperor in Chinese history. He was also the cousin of Longkodo and father of the Yongzheng Emperor.

description.zh-cn: 中国清朝第五位皇帝，清世宗，年号雍正。康熙帝第四子，乾隆帝之父，孝圣宪皇后的丈夫。
description.en: The fifth emperor of the Qing dynasty, the fourth son of the Kangxi Emperor.

description.zh-cn: 中国清朝第六位皇帝，年号乾隆，清高宗，雍正帝第四子，孝圣宪皇后之子。他实际掌握中国最高权力长达六十三年零四个月，是中国历史上实际执掌国家最高权力时间最长的皇帝。
description.en: The sixth emperor of the Qing dynasty, who held supreme power in China for 63 years and four months, making him the longest-reigning de facto ruler in Chinese history.

description.zh-cn: 第一次鸦片战争后清政府与英国签订的条约，是中国近代史上第一个不平等条约。条约内容包括割让香港岛、开放五个通商口岸及赔款。
description.en: The treaty signed between the Qing government and Great Britain after the First Opium War, and the first of the unequal treaties in modern Chinese history. Its terms included the cession of Hong Kong Island, the opening of five treaty ports, and payment of reparations.

description.zh-cn: 清末宗教组织拜上帝会创始人、太平天国运动的民变领袖以及太平天国的建立者。
清朝晚期由洪秀全建立的，与清朝对峙的政权，并以此发起了反清运动。
晚清中兴四大名臣之一，湘军的创立者和统帅。
中国清朝晚期女性皇室成员、政治人物，同治、光绪年间的实际最高统治者，光绪帝名义上的母亲。她指定溥仪继位并任命载沣为摄政王。
description.en: The de facto ruler of the late Qing dynasty who appointed Puyi as the successor to the throne and Zaifeng as the Prince-Regent.

zh-cn: 中央网络安全和信息化委员会办公室

description.zh-cn: 中共中央委员会的办事机构，与国家互联网信息办公室一个机构两块牌子。

zh-cn: 中央人民政府驻香港特别行政区维护国家安全公署

description.zh-cn: 中共中央委员会的派出机关。

en: Hong Kong and Macao Affairs Office

description.en: The working body of the State Council of the People's Republic of China responsible for Hong Kong and Macao affairs, operating concurrently as the Hong Kong and Macao Work Office of the CPC Central Committee.

description.zh-cn: 公务员行政级别。
中国人民解放军和武警部队的军衔等级，包括将官军衔。

中华人民共和国公务员体系中第四级别的干部。

民军议和全权总代表
政治家、外交家，官立山东大学堂首任校长。

death_place.en: Peking Union Medical College Hospital, Beiping

description.zh-cn: 中国近代思想家、政治家、教育家、史学家、文学家，戊戌变法领袖之一，清华国学研究院四大导师之一，梁思成之父。
description.en: Chinese thinker, politician, educator, historian, and writer; a leader of the Hundred Days' Reform; one of the four great tutors at the Tsinghua Institute of Chinese Studies.

description.zh-cn: 因台风暴雨导致的严重水库溃坝灾难，其根本原因与大跃进时期水利工程质量问题有关。
台湾第一位哲学博士，国立台湾大学教授及《民报》社长，在二二八事件后被带走失踪。

death_place.zh-cn: 直隶省顺天府白米斜街
death_place.en: Baimi Xiejie, Shuntian Fu, Zhili Province

description.zh-cn: 晚清重臣，洋务派和清流派的主要代表人物。历任山西巡抚、两广总督、湖广总督、军机大臣等职，官至体仁阁大学士。他倡导“中学为体，西学为用”，创办了汉阳铁厂等一系列近代工业和教育机构，并曾建议慈禧太后给予载沣“摄政王”的封号。与曾国藩、李鸿章、左宗棠并称“晚清四大名臣”。
description.en: A prominent official in the late Qing dynasty, a key representative of the Westernization Movement and the Qingliu school. He held various high-ranking positions including Governor of Shanxi, Viceroy of Liangguang, Viceroy of Huguang, and Grand Councilor, eventually rising to the rank of Grand Secretary of the Tiren Cabinet. He advocated for 'Chinese learning as the essence, Western learning for practical use' and founded a series of modern industrial and educational institutions, such as the Hanyang Ironworks. He also suggested to Empress Dowager Cixi that Zaifeng be given the title of 'Prince-Regent'. He is known as one of the 'Four Great Officials of the Late Qing' along with Zeng Guofan, Li Hongzhang, and Zuo Zongtang.

description.zh-cn: 中国企业家、软件工程师、天使投资人，小米集团创始人、董事长兼首席执行官，金山软件董事长。
description.en: Chinese entrepreneur, software engineer, angel investor, founder, chairman and CEO of Xiaomi Inc., and chairman of Kingsoft.

description.zh-cn: 中国诗人、学者。
中华人民共和国职业外交官，现任中华人民共和国外交部副部长。曾任外交部新闻司司长。
description.en: Chinese diplomat, currently serving as Vice Minister of Foreign Affairs of the People's Republic of China.

中华人民共和国外交官。
中华人民共和国外交官。

description.zh-cn: 张纯如毕业并获得新闻学位的大学。
description.en: The university where Iris Chang graduated with a degree in journalism.

description.zh-cn: 美国情报机构，据报道曾对西北工业大学发起网络攻击。
美国国家安全局下属机构，被指控负责入侵西北工业大学。
清朝第十一位皇帝，也是清朝入关后的第九位皇帝。他是奕𫍽第二子，载沣的异母兄，孝钦显皇后的侄子兼继子，由慈禧太后指定继承咸丰帝之位。其在位期间施行新政，批准创办山东大学堂，并主导戊戌变法，后被软禁。
description.en: The eleventh emperor of the Qing dynasty, also the ninth emperor after the Qing dynasty entered Shanhai Pass. He was the second son of Yixuan, the half-brother of Zaifeng, and the nephew and adopted son of Empress Dowager Cixi, appointed by her to succeed Emperor Xianfeng. During his reign, he implemented reforms (the New Policies), approved the establishment of Shandong University, and led the Hundred Days' Reform, after which he was placed under house arrest.

description.zh-cn: 中国作家，2012年诺贝尔文学奖得主。
description.en: Chinese novelist, winner of the 2012 Nobel Prize in Literature

birth_place.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国山东省胶州专区高密县

description.zh-cn: 电子科技大学校友，山西省省长。
中华人民共和国的省级行政区及其政府。
电子科技大学校友，歌手。
20世纪初在北京开办的著名教会大学，1952年院系调整时部分社会科学并入中国人民大学。
19世纪末发生于中国清朝的一场以“扶清灭洋”为口号的农民运动，亦指随后导致的八国联军侵华事件。这场武装冲突对孔祥熙的早年生活造成了冲击。事变后，清廷派载沣赴德国为德国公使被杀一事道歉。
description.en: An armed conflict and peasant movement that occurred in late 19th century Qing China, commonly known by the slogan 'Support the Qing, exterminate the foreigners.' It also refers to the subsequent invasion by the Eight-Nation Alliance. This conflict significantly impacted H. H. Kung's early life. Following the incident, Zaifeng was dispatched to Germany to apologize for the killing of the German minister.

description.zh-cn: 书画家、国学家
儒家创始人兼主要代表人物，春秋末期鲁国的思想家、教育家、哲学家。庄子曾借盗跖之口对其进行批评。
description.en: The founder of the Confucian school of thought, who was criticized by Zhuangzi through the voice of the character Robber Zhi.

description.zh-cn: 教育部党组书记、部长
华裔物理学家，1957年诺贝尔物理学奖得主。
中国天体物理学家，时任中国科学技术大学副校长。他的民主思想和演讲对学生产生了重要影响，被认为是八六学潮的精神领袖之一。后因此被撤职并开除党籍。
description.en: A Chinese astrophysicist and then-Vice President of the University of Science and Technology of China. His democratic ideas and speeches had a significant influence on students, and he was considered one of the spiritual leaders of the 1986 student demonstrations. He was subsequently dismissed from his post and expelled from the party.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军陆军现任司令员，陆军上将军衔。

zh-cn: 中国人民解放军北京卫戍区
中国人民解放军东部战区陆军
中国人民解放军陆军第七十一集团军
中国人民解放军陆军第七十二集团军

description.zh-cn: 抗日战争期间由南开大学、北京大学、清华大学联合组建的大学。
中国现代剧作家。
华裔数学家，被誉为“微分几何之父”，曾在伯克利任教，并发起了美国国家数学科学研究所的建立。
description.en: Chinese-American mathematician who taught at Berkeley and initiated the establishment of the Mathematical Sciences Research Institute.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军上将，现任中国人民解放军火箭军司令员。
一系列涉及中国人民解放军火箭军多名高级将领的腐败及泄密调查，以及中央军委装备发展部、相关军工企业和高校的腐败案件。
中国人民解放军上将，曾任中国人民解放军火箭军司令员。
晚清重臣、湘军将领、清末甘陕总督、政治家、军事家、外交家、实业家、改革家、诗人。他曾在林则徐退休返乡途中与其彻夜长谈，深受其关于新疆及俄国威胁的见解影响，后来领导收复新疆。
description.en: A prominent statesman, general, and national hero of the late Qing dynasty. He had a lengthy discussion with Lin Zexu during Lin's retirement journey and was deeply influenced by Lin's views on Xinjiang and the Russian threat, which later guided his campaign to recover Xinjiang.

description.zh-cn: 清华大学教师，著名知识分子

description.en: A Chinese Miao female singer, former head of the Song and Dance Troupe of the Political Work Department of the People's Liberation Army Navy, and former vice-chairman of the Chinese Musicians' Association.

description.zh-cn: 演员
中华民国立法委员、台湾政治人物、前艺人
欧洲联盟，欧洲多国共同建立的政治、经济及司法的超主权实体，总部设在布鲁塞尔。该组织与北约有紧密合作关系。
中世纪欧洲的王国，其国王丕平献土创立了教宗国。
一个曾存在于962年至1806年的欧洲国家，以德意志民族为主体民族，版图横跨中欧与南欧地区。
法国波旁王朝国王，在法国大革命中被处决。
法国的一段社会激进与社会动荡的时期，对法国历史以及全欧洲都留下了深远影响。
法兰西第一帝国的缔造者，法国大革命中崛起的军事家、政治家，后成为法兰西第一帝国皇帝，其军事行动和政治决策直接导致神圣罗马帝国解体。
法兰西第二共和国的唯一一位总统和法兰西第二帝国的唯一一位皇帝。他曾以“教会的保护者”名义派兵保护罗马，阻止意大利王国占领（即教宗国）。
description.en: The only president of the French Second Republic and the only emperor of the Second French Empire. He protected Rome with French troops in his capacity as 'protector of the Church', preventing its capture by the Kingdom of Italy (i.e., the Papal States).

description.zh-cn: 1870年至1940年间的法国共和政府。在第二次世界大战中被纳粹德国击败后解体。
description.en: The republican government of France from 1870 to 1940. It collapsed after the defeat by Nazi Germany in World War II.

location.zh-cn: 欧洲、亚洲、非洲、大西洋、太平洋

description.zh-cn: 一场1914年至1918年发生的全球性军事冲突，始于欧洲，萨拉热窝事件是其直接导火索。美国在伍德罗·威尔逊总统的领导下于1917年参战。
description.en: A global war originating in Europe, directly triggered by the Sarajevo incident. Woodrow Wilson led the United States to enter the war in 1917.

description.zh-cn: 欧盟创始成员国之一。其国家主导的工业发展模式和强权政策成为明治日本效仿的对象。
description.en: Its state-led industrial development model and strong-arm policies became a model for Meiji Japan.

description.zh-cn: 法国军事将领、政治家及法国元帅。第一次世界大战中因凡尔登战役的胜利而成为民族英雄，但在第二次世界大战期间领导与纳粹德国合作的维希法国政府，战后被判叛国罪。
description.en: A French general, politician, and Marshal of France. He became a national hero for his victory at the Battle of Verdun in World War I, but led the collaborationist Vichy France regime with Nazi Germany during World War II, for which he was convicted of treason.

description.zh-cn: 第二次世界大战期间，在法国未被德军占领的南部地区成立的政府，由菲利普·贝当担任国家元首，与纳粹德国合作。
description.en: The government established in the southern, unoccupied zone of France during World War II, headed by Philippe Pétain, which collaborated with Nazi Germany.

description.zh-cn: 由2个北美国家及30个欧洲国家组成的国际军事联盟。俄罗斯对其东扩的担忧是发动战争的宣称理由之一。
description.en: A military alliance between European and North American countries. Russia's concerns about its eastward expansion were one of the stated reasons for the war.

description.zh-cn: 法国前总统，任内推动法国重返北约军事指挥结构。
美国及其盟友以伊拉克拥有大规模杀伤性武器为由发动的军事行动，推翻了萨达姆政权。
description.en: A military operation launched by the United States and its allies, citing Iraq's possession of weapons of mass destruction, which overthrew the regime of Saddam Hussein.

description.zh-cn: 中国历史学家、教育家，曾在国民参政会上揭发孔祥熙贪腐。
description.en: Chinese historian and educator who exposed H. H. Kung's corruption at the People's Political Council.

description.zh-cn: 中国诗人
中国儒家经典之一。
儒家学派的经典著作之一。
中国男子短跑运动员，暨南大学体育学院院长。
美国圣公会主教，圣约翰大学创办人。
中国田径运动员，奥运会冠军，华东师范大学校友。
中国企业家，华为技术有限公司创始人、集团总裁。
原北京大学哲学系党总支书记，因贴出“全国第一张马列主义的大字报”而成为文革时期的风云人物。
中国药物化学家，中国中医科学院终身研究员兼首席研究员，青蒿素和双氢青蒿素的发现者，北京大学医学院校友。因其在抗疟药方面的贡献，于2015年获得诺贝尔生理学或医学奖。
description.en: A Chinese pharmaceutical chemist, lifetime researcher and chief researcher at the China Academy of Chinese Medical Sciences, and the discoverer of artemisinin and dihydroartemisinin. An alumna of Peking University Medical School. She was awarded the Nobel Prize in Physiology or Medicine in 2015 for her contributions to antimalarial drugs.

description.zh-cn: 华裔物理学家，1957年诺贝尔物理学奖得主，国立西南联合大学校友，中国科学院院士。
中国企业家，百度公司创始人、董事长兼首席执行官，北京大学校友。
description.en: Chinese entrepreneur, co-founder, chairman, and CEO of Baidu.

description.zh-cn: 华裔物理学家，被誉为“物理学第一夫人”，毕业于伯克利。
description.en: Chinese-American physicist, an alumna of Berkeley.

description.zh-cn: 音乐家、美术教育家、书法家、戏剧活动家。
位于美国马里兰州巴尔的摩的私立研究型大学。伍德罗·威尔逊在此获得哲学博士学位，张纯如在此获得文学硕士学位。
description.en: A private research university in Baltimore, Maryland, where Woodrow Wilson earned his Ph.D. and Iris Chang obtained her Master of Arts degree.

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国农业部

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国主管农业与农村经济发展的国务院组成部门，现为中华人民共和国农业农村部。
文学家、小说家、散文家和考古学专家。
散文家、学者、文学批评家、翻译家。
德国哲学家、政治经济学家、社会学家、政治学家、革命理论家、历史学者、经济学家、新闻从业员、革命社会主义者，马克思主义的创始人之一。
description.en: Philosopher, economist, historian, and political theorist, founder of Marxism.

description.zh-cn: 德国哲学家、社会科学家、记者、商人和政治思想家，与马克思共同发展出共产主义理论。
一种联系人与神祇或超自然、神圣存在的文化体系，或以热情和坚定地信念而坚持信仰的原则或理论体系。
description.en: A cultural system that connects humanity to supernatural or sacred entities, or a system of principles or theories held with ardor and faith.

description.zh-cn: 梵蒂冈城是位于意大利首都罗马市区内的内陆城邦，由天主教会最高权力机构圣座（即罗马教廷）直接统治，为世界领土面积最小的国家。
description.en: An independent city-state and enclave located within Rome, Italy. The Vatican City State is ruled by the Pope, the bishop of Rome and head of the Catholic Church.

description.zh-cn: 一种社会经济体系，列宁主义的目标是通过暴力革命和无产阶级专政来实现。
一种以生产资料私有制为基础的社会经济体系，是列宁主义革命和马克思异化论所批判的对象。
description.en: A socioeconomic system based on private ownership of the means of production, which is the object of Leninist revolution and critique in Marx's theory of alienation.

zh-cn: 国际主义共产主义倾向

description.zh-cn: 左翼共产主义组织
俄国马克思主义革命家、政治理论家，共产国际的创始人之一，“不断革命论”的主要倡导者。
description.en: Russian Marxist revolutionary and theorist, one of the founders of the Communist International.

zh-cn: 南斯拉夫社会主义联邦共和国

description.zh-cn: 古巴革命家和共产主义领导人。
奥地利裔英国哲学家。
奥地利裔英国经济学家、政治哲学家，奥地利经济学派的代表人物。
朝鲜民主主义人民共和国的官方意识形态，由金日成创立。
description.en: The official state ideology of North Korea, developed by Kim Il-sung.

description.zh-cn: 于2025年成为金砖伙伴国。
位于美国纽约州伊萨卡的私立研究型大学。
description.en: A private research university in Ithaca, New York, USA.

description.zh-cn: 蒙哥的弟弟，蒙古帝国第五代大汗，元朝的创建者、开国皇帝（元世祖）。曾下令焚毁《道藏》。
description.en: Möngke's younger brother, the fifth Great Khan of the Mongol Empire and the founder of the Yuan Dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 位于北京西北郊的清代大型皇家园林，被誉为“万园之园”，咸丰帝出生地，在第二次鸦片战争中被英法联军抢掠并焚毁。
description.en: A large imperial garden complex of the Qing Dynasty in the northwestern suburbs of Beijing, known as the 'Garden of Gardens,' the birthplace of the Xianfeng Emperor, which was looted and burned down by Anglo-French forces during the Second Opium War.

description.zh-cn: 梁启超之子，林徽因的丈夫，中国著名建筑学家、建筑史学家和教育家，宾夕法尼亚大学校友。
description.en: Chinese architect, architectural historian, and educator, an alumnus of the University of Pennsylvania.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国省级行政区
天主教会的主要男修会之一。
战国四公子之一。
中华人民共和国第一家完全由企业法人持股的股份制商业银行。
description.en: The first joint-stock commercial bank in the People's Republic of China wholly owned by corporate legal entities.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国第一家由企业创办的商业保险机构，也是中国第一家股份制保险企业，同时也是一个中国综合金融服务集团。郑建源曾通过其控股公司持有该公司大量股份。
description.en: The first commercial insurance institution in the People's Republic of China established by an enterprise, and also the first joint-stock insurance company in China. It is an integrated financial services group, in which Zheng Jianyuan once held a large number of shares through his holding companies.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国政治人物。现任中共广东省委副书记，广东省人民政府省长、中共深圳市委书记。中共第二十届中央委员。
description.en: A political figure in the People's Republic of China. He is currently the Deputy Secretary of the Guangdong Provincial Committee of the CCP, Governor of Guangdong Province, and Secretary of the Shenzhen Municipal Committee of the CCP. He is a member of the 20th Central Committee of the CCP.

description.zh-cn: 由杨坚建立的中国朝代，历史上承南北朝、下启唐朝，结束了长期的分裂局面，重新统一了中国。该朝代开始将“省”用于中央政府的一级行政机关。
description.en: A Chinese dynasty founded by Yang Jian, succeeding the Northern and Southern dynasties and preceding the Tang dynasty. It ended a long period of division, reunifying China, and notably began using 'province' as a first-level administrative division of the central government.

description.zh-cn: 清朝第六位皇帝清高宗弘历。其在位期间，“省”作为行政区划名称获得官方认可，年号是清朝使用时间最长的年号，并曾下诏为袁崇焕平反，肯定其作为明朝忠臣的功绩。
description.en: The Qianlong Emperor, the sixth emperor of the Qing dynasty. During his reign, 'province' was officially recognized as an administrative division, his era name was the longest-used in the Qing dynasty, and an imperial edict was issued to posthumously rehabilitate Yuan Chonghuan, affirming his merits as a loyal official of the Ming Dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 商朝帝王
晋公子
中国战国时代的诸侯国，战国七雄之一。
description.en: A vassal state during the Warring States period in China, one of the Seven Warring States.

description.zh-cn: 秦朝将军
中国古代北方的游牧民族政权，与新朝关系恶化。
中国历史上的一个重要朝代，承五代十国、下启元朝，分为北宋与南宋。
description.en: An important era in Chinese history that followed the Five Dynasties and Ten Kingdoms period, preceded the Yuan dynasty, and was divided into Northern Song and Southern Song.

description.zh-cn: 与北宋同时期由党项族建立的政权，是宋神宗时期北宋在西部的主要军事对手。该政权后被蒙古所灭。
description.en: A state established by the Tangut people, coexisting with the Northern Song dynasty. It was the primary military adversary of the Northern Song in the west during Emperor Shenzong's reign.

description.zh-cn: 宋代名臣
中国远古传说中的部落首领，被道教认为是最早的思想源头。
香港政治人物，现任第六届香港特别行政区行政长官。
description.en: The current Chief Executive of the Hong Kong Special Administrative Region.

description.zh-cn: 最后一任香港总督。

zh-cn: 大不列颠及爱尔兰联合王国
en: United Kingdom of Great Britain and Ireland

description.zh-cn: 前香港的宗主国。
中华人民共和国的省级行政区。
description.en: A province of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 已故一代资深女艺人。
演员。
中华民国国民政府行政院长兼财政部长，亦是银行家及富商，孔子第75代孙。
description.en: A Chinese banker and politician in the Republic of China, he served as Premier and Minister of Finance of the Executive Yuan. He was the 75th generation descendant of Confucius.

description.zh-cn: 美国黑石集团董事长
华人计算机科学家，2000年图灵奖得主，现任清华大学人工智能学院院长、交叉信息研究院院长。
description.en: A Chinese computer scientist, winner of the 2000 Turing Award, and the current Dean of the Institute for Artificial Intelligence and Dean of the Institute for Interdisciplinary Information Sciences at Tsinghua University.

description.zh-cn: 中国汉朝第六位皇帝，汉武帝之父。
中国汉朝（西汉）第七位皇帝，庙号“世宗”，谥号“孝武皇帝”。
明末民变首领之一，大西皇帝。

zh-cn: 中国共产党中央特别行动科

description.zh-cn: 汉武帝嫡长子，卫子夫所生，在巫蛊之祸中被迫起兵，兵败自杀。
汉武帝的第二任皇后。
汉武帝幼子，后继位为汉昭帝。
西汉权臣，汉武帝的托孤大臣。
西汉儒家学者，建议“罢黜百家，表彰六经”。
西汉将领，兵败投降匈奴。
中国古代朝代，王莽曾在此担任要职，后被其所篡。
中国清朝第三位皇帝，康熙帝之父
顺治帝妃，康熙帝生母。
清朝初年权臣，康熙帝辅政大臣之一。
德国耶稣会传教士，与顺治帝建立了私人友谊。
清朝将领
由孔子创立的学术派别，其思想体系源于孔子。它也是中国古代的一个思想流派，庄子对其部分主张持批评态度。
description.en: An academic school founded by Confucius, whose ideological system originated from Confucius. It is also an ancient Chinese school of thought, some of whose tenets were criticized by Zhuangzi.

description.zh-cn: 康熙帝的嫡次子，曾两度被立为皇太子，后被废黜。
description.en: The second son of the Kangxi Emperor, he was twice appointed as Crown Prince and later deposed.

description.zh-cn: 康熙帝皇贵妃，雍正帝生母。
description.en: An Imperial Noble Consort of the Kangxi Emperor and the birth mother of the Yongzheng Emperor.

zh-cn: 中国人民解放军国防大学
en: People's Liberation Army National Defense University

description.zh-cn: 原中国人民解放军总后勤部副部长。
中国社会活动家及政治犯，因在西单民主墙发表大字报批评邓小平独裁而长期入狱，后流亡美国。
description.en: A Chinese social activist and political prisoner, imprisoned for a long time for criticizing Deng Xiaoping's dictatorship on the Xidan Democracy Wall, and later exiled to the United States.

description.zh-cn: 杨振宁的原配妻子，杜聿明长女。
杨振宁的第二任妻子。
美国理论物理学家，曾任普林斯顿高等研究院院长，并在伯克利任教期间领导了曼哈顿计划。
description.en: American theoretical physicist who led the Manhattan Project while a professor at Berkeley.

description.zh-cn: 由杨振宁和李政道提出的关于弱相互作用中宇称不守恒的理论。
核物理学家，中国原子弹研制的关键人物。
明朝第四位皇帝，明成祖朱棣长子，明宣宗之父，朱高煦之兄。
description.en: The fourth Emperor of the Ming dynasty, eldest son of the Yongle Emperor, and elder brother of Zhu Gaoxu.

description.zh-cn: 明朝初年燕王朱棣与建文帝之间的一场因削藩引发的内战，最终燕王朱棣获胜并即位为明成祖。
description.en: A civil war in the early years of the Ming dynasty, resulting in the victory of Zhu Di, the Prince of Yan, who became the Yongle Emperor.

description.zh-cn: 明成祖时期编修的大型类书。
明朝航海家、外交家、宦官，受宣宗命令进行第七次下西洋。
明朝的特务与秘密警察机构，由宦官掌管。魏忠贤在天启年间总督东厂，大肆缉捕迫害异己。
description.en: A spy agency of the Ming dynasty, controlled by eunuchs. Wei Zhongxian commanded the Eastern Depot during the Tianqi era, using it to arrest and persecute his opponents.

description.zh-cn: 明代学者、官员，建文帝时期翰林院侍讲、文学家。在其著作《叶郑传》和《先府君行状》中记载了空印案的相关情况。靖难之变后因拒绝为朱棣草拟即位诏书而被杀。
description.en: A Ming dynasty scholar, official, and literary figure, who served as a Hanlin Academy lecturer during the Jianwen Emperor's reign. He recorded details about the Empty Seal Case in his works 'Biography of Ye and Zheng' and 'Conduct of My Late Father'. After the Jingnan Campaign, he was executed for refusing to draft the enthronement edict for Zhu Di.

description.zh-cn: 明朝开国功臣李文忠之子，袭封曹国公。明初将领，在靖难之役中初期任建文帝方主帅，屡战屡败，后开金川门投降燕王朱棣。永乐年间被削爵圈禁。
description.en: Li Jinglong, son of the Ming dynasty's founding Duke Li Wenzhong, inherited his father's title as Duke of Cao. He was a Ming general who initially served as the chief commander of the Jianwen Emperor's forces during the Jingnan campaign. Despite his position, he suffered repeated defeats and eventually opened the Jinchuan Gate to surrender to Zhu Di, the Prince of Yan. In the Yongle era, he was stripped of his title and placed under house arrest.

description.zh-cn: 明成祖朱棣第二子，明仁宗朱高炽之弟。初封高阳王，后晋封汉王。因发动“高煦之乱”谋反失败，被明宣宗废为庶人并以炮烙之刑处死。
description.en: The second son of the Yongle Emperor Zhu Di of the Ming Dynasty, and brother of the Hongxi Emperor. He was first enfeoffed as the Prince of Gaoyang, and later as the Prince of Han. He was executed by the Xuande Emperor after his failed rebellion.

description.zh-cn: 明成祖朱棣三子，明仁宗朱高炽之弟，封赵简王。
description.en: Third son of the Yongle Emperor, brother of the Hongxi Emperor.

description.zh-cn: 奉系军阀将领，张作霖的结拜兄弟，满洲国第二任国务总理大臣。
奉系军阀将领，张作霖的结拜兄弟。
中国政治人物。
中国1989年六四事件学生运动领袖之一。事件后遭通缉并流亡海外，先后在法国、美国求学和居住。现为网络“六四档案”、“孙文学校”创办人，柴玲前夫。
description.en: One of the student leaders of the 1989 Tiananmen Square protests in China. He became a wanted fugitive after the event and went into exile, studying and residing in France and the United States. He is the founder of the 'June 4th Archive' website and the 'Sun Yat-sen School' online, and the ex-husband of Chai Ling.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国政治人物，曾任深圳市市长。

zh-cn: 卡瑟姆若马尔特·托卡耶夫

description.zh-cn: 哈萨克斯坦总统。

zh-cn: 2022年新疆乌鲁木齐高层住宅楼火灾

description.zh-cn: 一起引发公众对防疫政策不满的火灾事件。
于2025年成为金砖伙伴国。
孝钦显皇后之母。
清朝第十位皇帝，孝钦显皇后与咸丰帝的独子，光绪帝的堂兄。
咸丰帝皇后，与慈禧太后一同垂帘听政。
清朝宗室，康熙帝第八子，雍正帝异母弟，也是其政治对手。因参与九子夺嫡，被雍正帝圈禁，改名阿其那，后在禁所病故。人称“八贤王”。他曾获清朝亲王爵位。
description.en: An imperial prince of the Qing dynasty, the eighth son of the Kangxi Emperor and a half-brother of the Yongzheng Emperor. Due to his involvement in the nine sons' succession struggle, he was imprisoned by the Yongzheng Emperor, forced to change his name to Akina, and later died in confinement. He was known as the 'Eighth Virtuous Prince'. He once held a princely title of the Qing dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 康熙帝第九子，雍正帝的政治对手。
description.en: The ninth son of the Kangxi Emperor and a political rival of the Yongzheng Emperor.

description.zh-cn: 康熙帝第十四子，雍正帝同母弟。
description.en: The fourteenth son of the Kangxi Emperor, a full brother of the Yongzheng Emperor.

description.zh-cn: 清朝宗室，康熙帝第十三子，雍正帝异母弟、得力助手。清朝有史以来第九位铁帽子王，也是第一位因功受封的铁帽子王。雍正帝即位后，改名允祥，逝世后获准改回原名。谥号“贤”。
description.en: An imperial prince of the Qing dynasty, the 13th son of the Kangxi Emperor and a half-brother of the Yongzheng Emperor, and a key assistant to him. He was the 9th iron-cap prince in Qing history and the first to be granted the title for merit. He changed his name to Yunxiang after the Yongzheng Emperor's accession, and was allowed to revert to his original name posthumously. His posthumous name was 'Xian'.

description.zh-cn: 康熙帝第三子。
康熙帝第十子。
清朝将领，雍正时期重臣，后被雍正帝赐死。
description.en: An important official during the Yongzheng era of the Qing Dynasty, later forced to commit suicide by the Yongzheng Emperor.

description.zh-cn: 清朝康熙、雍正两朝重臣，佟国维之子，康熙帝表弟，孝懿仁皇后之弟，雍正帝舅舅。
description.en: An important official during the Kangxi and Yongzheng eras of the Qing Dynasty, son of Tung-gowei, cousin of the Kangxi Emperor, younger brother of Empress Xiaoyiren, and uncle of the Yongzheng Emperor.

description.zh-cn: 清朝康熙末年，九位皇子争夺皇位的历史事件。
description.en: A historical event during the late Kangxi era of the Qing dynasty where nine of his sons vied for the throne.

location.en: Shuntian Prefecture, North Zhili, Ming Dynasty

description.zh-cn: 中国明清两代的皇家宫殿，位于北京中轴线的中心。
description.en: The imperial palace complex at the heart of Beijing, China, which served as the home of emperors and their households for almost 500 years from the Ming dynasty to the end of the Qing dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 唐朝皇帝，唐高宗李治和武则天幼子，唐玄宗李隆基之父，李显之弟，曾两次登基、两次禅位，是唐朝第五位和第九位皇帝。
description.en: The fifth and ninth emperor of the Tang dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 武周皇帝，唐玄宗的祖母，中国历史上唯一获正史承认的女性皇帝。
description.en: Empress of the Wu Zhou dynasty, the only female emperor in Chinese history.

description.zh-cn: 唐玄宗时期的宰相，杨贵妃的堂兄。
唐高宗李治与武则天的小女儿，唐玄宗的姑姑，曾与李隆基发生政治斗争。
唐玄宗时期宰相，以“口蜜腹剑”著称。
中国历史上的一个重要朝代，由李渊建立。白居易在此期间生活并担任官职。
description.en: An important dynasty in Chinese history, founded by Li Yuan. During this period, Bai Juyi lived and served as an official.

description.zh-cn: 唐朝都城。
卡尔·马克思的政治经济学批判著作。
description.en: A foundational theoretical text in materialist philosophy, economics and politics by Karl Marx.

zh-cn: 格奥尔格·威廉·弗里德里希·黑格尔

description.zh-cn: 德国哲学家，德国古典哲学的集大成者。
description.en: A German philosopher and a major figure in German idealism.

description.zh-cn: 共产主义者同盟的前身。
苏格兰古典政治经济学家和哲学家，被誉为“经济学之父”，其自由市场经济理论影响了福泽谕吉。
description.en: A Scottish classical political economist and philosopher, known as 'The Father of Economics', whose theories on free-market economy influenced Fukuzawa Yukichi.

description.zh-cn: 张献忠养子。
明朝阁部。
清朝肃亲王，皇太极长子，曾与多尔衮争夺皇位。
明朝灭亡后，由明朝宗室在南方建立的政权。
曾任香港政务司司长，2012年行政长官选举候选人。
苏联的武装力量。
清朝末代皇帝溥仪的皇后，亦是满洲国皇后。
溥仪的淑妃。
溥仪的福贵人。
溥仪的堂侄与嗣子。

en: International Military Tribunal for the Far East

description.zh-cn: 二战后审判日本甲级战犯的国际法庭。

en: United States Department of Foreign Affairs

location.zh-cn: 美国华盛顿特区哈里·S·杜鲁门大楼
location.en: Harry S. Truman Building, Washington, D.C., United States

description.zh-cn: 美国联邦政府负责外交事务的行政部门，等同于世界各国的“外交部”。其前身是美国第一个联邦外交机构，成立于1789年7月21日，至同年9月15日被国务院取代。
description.en: The federal executive department of the United States responsible for foreign policy and international relations, equivalent to the foreign ministry of other countries. Its predecessor was the first federal foreign affairs agency of the United States, established on July 21, 1789, and superseded by the Department of State on September 15, 1789.

description.zh-cn: 香港作家、编剧、评论家、演员，与金庸、黄沾、蔡澜并列为“香港四大才子”。他还是亦舒的胞兄，也是古龙的莫逆之交，曾为《明报》邀请古龙撰写《绝代双骄》，并在古龙去世后，在其棺材里放入XO酒陪葬。
description.en: Hong Kong writer, screenwriter, critic, and actor, known as one of the 'Four Great Talents of Hong Kong'. He is also the elder brother of Yi Shu and a very close friend of Gu Long, having invited him to write 'Juedai Shuangjiao' for Ming Pao daily and placed bottles of XO cognac in Gu Long's coffin for his burial.

description.zh-cn: 李连杰的前妻
李连杰的妻子
香港电影导演、编剧、监制及演员，香港电影新浪潮的重要人物之一。
民国时期的桂系军阀派系
中国现代画家、美术教育家
中国周朝时期位于今山东省的一个重要诸侯国。
description.en: A major vassal state during the Zhou dynasty of ancient China, located in modern-day Shandong province.

description.zh-cn: 道家学派的创始人，被道教奉为道祖、教主，其思想对庄周产生了深远影响。
description.en: Founder of the Taoist school of thought, whose ideas profoundly influenced Zhuang Zhou.

description.zh-cn: 齐国相国。
春秋时期鲁国人，孔子最得意的弟子，位列孔门十哲和七十二贤之首，后世尊称为“复圣”。
description.en: A native of the State of Lu during the Spring and Autumn period, he was Confucius's most favored disciple, ranked first among the Ten Wise Ones of Confucianism and the Seventy-two Disciples. He is posthumously honored as the 'Continuator Sage'.

description.zh-cn: 孔子著名弟子，孔门十哲之一。
description.en: A famous disciple of Confucius, one of the Ten Wise Ones of Confucianism.

description.zh-cn: 李锐之女，传记作家、机械工程师，斯坦福大学胡佛研究所客座研究员。
description.en: Daughter of Li Rui, a biographer, mechanical engineer, and visiting fellow at the Hoover Institution, Stanford University.

description.zh-cn: 源自美国的全球最大视频分享网站，于2006年被Google收购，现为Google子公司。
description.en: The world's largest video-sharing website, acquired by Google in 2006.

description.zh-cn: 欧洲联盟的立法机构，同时是其下议院和唯一直接民选机构。该机构曾于1996年授予魏京生萨哈罗夫奖。
description.en: The legislative body of the European Union, also its lower house and the only directly elected institution. It awarded the Sakharov Prize to Wei Jingsheng in 1996.

description.zh-cn: 泰国总理
中华人民共和国的国家电视台，2018年并入新组建的中央广播电视总台。崔永元和芮成钢都曾在此工作，该台也播出了王林清的电视认罪画面。
description.en: China's national television broadcaster. In 2018, it was merged into the newly established China Media Group. Cui Yongyuan and Rui Chenggang formerly worked here, and the station also broadcasted Wang Linqing's televised confession.

description.zh-cn: 俄罗斯国防部长。
清朝皇帝，乾隆帝第十五子。他是中国清朝的第七位皇帝，也是清军入关后的第五位皇帝。
description.en: The seventh emperor of the Qing dynasty, the 15th son of the Qianlong Emperor.

description.zh-cn: 中国清朝乾隆帝第二任皇后
大学士，雍正帝遗命的辅政大臣之一。
清朝中期名将、重臣。
乾隆帝皇长子。
中华人民共和国政治人物，时任中共重庆市委副书记、重庆市市长。
美国推行的贸易保护主义法案，提高了关税，被认为加剧了全球贸易崩溃和大萧条。
一种在德国兴起的极权主义意识形态。
位于北美洲的国家。
description.en: A country in North America.

description.zh-cn: 其联邦政府于2021年废除了维多利亚州与中国签订的“一带一路”协议。
美国的中央银行系统，在威尔逊总统任内通过《联邦储备法案》而建立。
description.en: The central banking system of the United States, created during the presidency of Woodrow Wilson with the enactment of the Federal Reserve Act.

description.zh-cn: 美国第31任总统，在大萧条开始时就任，并在1932年选举中被罗斯福击败。
description.en: 31st President of the United States, defeated by Roosevelt in the 1932 election.

description.zh-cn: 英国经济学家，凯恩斯主义的创始人。
奥地利裔德国政治人物，纳粹党领袖，1933年至1945年间担任德国总理和元首。他是第二次世界大战的发动者，其崛起与大萧条密切相关，并是墨索里尼在二战中的主要盟友。
description.en: Austrian-born German politician, leader of the Nazi Party, who was Chancellor and Führer of Germany from 1933 to 1945. He was the initiator of World War II and Mussolini's main ally during the war.

description.zh-cn: 路易十六的王后，奥地利皇帝的妹妹。
统治法国的君主王朝，在法国大革命中被推翻。
中国共产党内部对改革开放持保留或反对态度的政治派别。在八六学潮后，该派系将学潮归咎于胡耀邦的纵容，并成功施压使其下台。
description.en: A political faction within the Communist Party of China. After the 1986 student demonstrations, this faction blamed the protests on Hu Yaobang's leniency and successfully pressured him into resigning.

description.zh-cn: 意大利政治家、记者，国家法西斯党领袖，法西斯主义创始人。他于1922年至1943年担任意大利王国首相，期间代表意大利王国签署了《拉特兰条约》，并于1943年至1945年担任意大利社会共和国的国家元首。
description.en: Italian politician and journalist who founded and led the National Fascist Party. He was Prime Minister of Italy from 1922 to 1943, during which he signed the Lateran Treaty on behalf of Italy, and Duce of the Italian Social Republic from 1943 to 1945.

description.zh-cn: 由协约国与德国签订，正式结束第一次世界大战的和平条约。条约内容不仅包含建立国际联盟和对德国施加的严厉条款，其中关于山东问题的条款也引发了中国的五四运动。
description.en: The most important peace treaty signed between the Allied Powers and Germany that officially brought World War I to an end. It included the covenant for the League of Nations, and its clauses concerning the Shandong Problem also triggered the May Fourth Movement in China.

description.zh-cn: 西班牙国民军领袖，后成为西班牙独裁者。
因中巴经济走廊穿越其主权争议地区而多次反对“一带一路”倡议，并且是金砖国家创始成员国。
欧洲国家，欧盟创始成员国之一，梵蒂冈城邦位于其首都罗马市内。曾是七国集团中首个加入“一带一路”倡议的国家，但于2023年宣布退出。
description.en: A European country and an EU founding member, within whose capital, Rome, Vatican City is located. It was the first G7 country to join the 'Belt and Road Initiative', but announced its withdrawal in 2023.

description.zh-cn: 于2023年10月宣布退出“一带一路”倡议。
微软公司创始人，曾任董事长，“一带一路”计划的明确支持者，并将屠呦呦获得诺贝尔奖列为2015年的好消息之一。
description.en: Founder and former chairman of Microsoft Corporation, a clear supporter of the 'Belt and Road' initiative, who listed Tu Youyou's Nobel Prize win as one of the good news stories of 2015.

description.zh-cn: 四川总督
一个存在于1867年至1918年间的中欧二元君主国。弗朗茨·斐迪南是其皇储。
description.en: A dual monarchy in Central Europe from 1867 to 1918. Franz Ferdinand was its heir presumptive.

description.zh-cn: 奥匈帝国皇储
青年波斯尼亚成员、塞尔维亚民族主义者，在萨拉热窝刺杀了弗朗茨·斐迪南大公及其妻子苏菲，引发了萨拉热窝事件。
description.en: A Serbian nationalist who assassinated Archduke Franz Ferdinand and his wife Sophie in Sarajevo, triggering the Sarajevo incident.

description.zh-cn: 前苏联加盟共和国，于1990年3月11日率先宣布独立。

zh-cn: 中国人民解放军陆军第八十三集团军

description.zh-cn: 1962年冷战时期在美国、苏联与古巴之间爆发的一场极其严重的政治、军事危机。肯尼迪总统曾就此咨询艾森豪威尔。
description.en: A major confrontation in 1962 that brought the United States and the Soviet Union close to war over the presence of Soviet nuclear-armed missiles in Cuba. President Kennedy consulted Eisenhower during the crisis.

description.zh-cn: 美国第35任总统。
description.en: 35th President of the United States.

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国国家安全部

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国国务院主管国家安全的组成部门。
中国大陆艺术家、社会活动家及异见人士，诗人艾青之子，活跃于建筑、艺术、影像和社会文化评论领域。他曾因调查川震遇难学生名单，其志愿者屡受地方政府扣留。
description.en: A Chinese contemporary artist, activist, and dissident. He is the son of poet Ai Qing and is active in the fields of architecture, art, film, and social and cultural criticism. He is notable for his investigation into the student casualties of the Sichuan earthquake, a process during which his volunteers were repeatedly detained by local authorities.

description.zh-cn: 朝鲜半岛历史上的一个王朝，当时朝鲜半岛的统治政权，名义上为清朝的藩属国，是战争爆发的核心争端地区。在福泽谕吉的《脱亚论》中被视为应与之“绝交”的“恶友”。
description.en: A Korean dynastic kingdom, the ruling power on the Korean peninsula at that time, nominally a vassal state of the Qing dynasty, and a core disputed area for the outbreak of war. It was also regarded by Fukuzawa Yukichi in 'Datsu-A Ron' as a 'bad friend' with whom Japan should break ties.

description.zh-cn: 甲午战争后清朝与日本签订的不平等条约，导致中国割地赔款并丧失多项主权。
description.en: An unequal treaty signed between the Qing dynasty and Japan after the First Sino-Japanese War.

description.zh-cn: 北洋水师提督，在威海卫之战后自杀殉国。
日本第122代天皇，大日本帝国第一代大元帅。作为国家元首，他在甲午战争和日俄战争期间积极推动军事扩张，并见证了日本从孤立的封建国家向工业化世界强国的转变。
description.en: The 122nd Emperor of Japan and the first Grand Marshal of the Empire of Japan. As head of state, he actively promoted military expansion during the First Sino-Japanese War and the Russo-Japanese War, and witnessed Japan's transformation from an isolated feudal state into an industrialized world power.

description.zh-cn: 日本近代政治家，明治维新元老，曾四次担任日本内阁总理大臣（亦是首任），甲午战争期间曾任日本首相，并任首任统监府统监。
description.en: Japanese politician, Meiji Restoration elder, served four terms as Prime Minister of Japan, and was the first Resident-General of Korea.

description.zh-cn: 清朝户部尚书，曾奏准暂停海军购买外洋枪炮船只。
蔡英文政府首任行政院院长，其内阁上任后撤回对126名占领行政院行动者的刑事告诉。
太平天国早期核心领袖、东王，掌握军政实权，后在天京事变中被杀。
太平天国早期核心领袖，被封为翼王。因天京事变及洪秀全猜忌而出走。

en: Provisional Government of the Republic of Korea

description.zh-cn: 1919年至1948年间在朝鲜日治时期于中国上海成立的流亡政府。
description.en: An exile government established in Shanghai, China during the Japanese colonial period, active from 1919 to 1948.

description.zh-cn: 大韩民国前总统，韩国民主运动领袖，金泳三的继任总统。他曾推行“阳光政策”，并与金泳三、金钟泌并称为“三金”，在韩国政坛上既是竞争对手也是合作伙伴。其三个儿子也曾担任国会议员。
description.en: A leader of the South Korean democracy movement and Kim Young-sam's successor as president of the Republic of Korea. He implemented the 'Sunshine Policy'. Along with Kim Young-sam and Kim Jong-pil, he was one of the 'Three Kims,' who were both rivals and partners in South Korean politics. His three sons also served as members of the National Assembly.

description.zh-cn: 韩国史上首位女性总统，后遭弹劾下台。
韩国共同民主党党代表，强烈反对2024年戒严令，并呼吁民众保护国会。他本人也在尹锡悦的计划逮捕名单上。
description.en: Leader of the Democratic Party of Korea, who strongly opposed the 2024 martial law, called on citizens to protect the National Assembly, and was on Yoon Suk Yeol's planned arrest list.

description.zh-cn: 朝鲜民主主义人民共和国的第三代最高领导人，现任朝鲜劳动党总书记和国务委员会委员长。
大韩民国的立法机关，是韩国三权分立宪政体制中的重要组成部分。在2024年戒严期间，国会议员集会并通过决议，成功废除了戒严令。
