description.en: In his youth, Mao Zedong expressed his admiration solely for Zeng Guofan, and in his later years, he called him the most formidable figure of the landlord class.

description.zh-cn: 1992年与刘德华、黎明、郭富城被香港媒体获封为“四大天王”。
description.en: In 1992, he was named one of the "Four Heavenly Kings" by the Hong Kong media, along with Andy Lau, Leon Lai, and Aaron Kwok.

description.zh-cn: 张学友凭借在电影《旺角卡门》中的表演获得第8届香港电影金像奖最佳男配角，其演技开始受到瞩目。
description.en: Jacky Cheung's performance in "As Tears Go By" earned him the Best Supporting Actor award at the 8th Hong Kong Film Awards, bringing his acting skills to prominence.

description.zh-cn: 王家卫执导的《旺角卡门》让张学友的演技受到瞩目，此后张学友成为王家卫的御用演员之一。
description.en: Wong Kar-wai's direction in "As Tears Go By" brought attention to Jacky Cheung's acting, and he subsequently became one of Wong's regular actors.

description.zh-cn: 张学友曾资助好友柯受良完成飞跃黄河的壮举。
description.en: Jacky Cheung funded his friend Blacky Ko to complete the stunt of jumping over the Yellow River.

description.zh-cn: 与兄长邵仁枚共同创立邵氏公司，并于1957年在香港成立邵氏兄弟（香港）有限公司。
description.en: Co-founded the Shaw Organisation with his brother Shaw Vee Meng, and established Shaw Brothers (Hong Kong) Limited in Hong Kong in 1957.

description.zh-cn: 邵逸夫因认为李小龙片酬要求过高而拒绝合作，导致李小龙转投竞争对手嘉禾。
description.en: Run Run Shaw rejected a collaboration with Bruce Lee due to his high salary demands, leading Lee to join rival Golden Harvest.

description.zh-cn: 战争波及东南亚，邵氏兄弟的电影事业大受打击。
description.en: The war spread to Southeast Asia, and the Shaw brothers' film business was severely impacted.

description.zh-cn: 册封邵逸夫为下级勋位爵士。
description.en: Knighted Run Run Shaw as a Knight Bachelor.

description.zh-cn: 961年至971年称唐国主，971年后去唐国号，改称江南国主。
因李煜所作《虞美人》词中有“故国不堪回首月明中”之句，用牵机毒将其毒杀。
多次逼迫小周后侍寝。
笃信佛教，酷好浮屠，崇塔庙，度僧尼，以致颇废政事。
戚夫人是汉高祖刘邦的宠妃。
为吕后出谋划策，帮助她保住了其子刘盈的太子之位。
接替胡锦涛担任中共中央总书记和中共中央军委主席。
description.en: Succeeded Hu Jintao as General Secretary of the CCP Central Committee and Chairman of the CCP Central Military Commission.

description.zh-cn: 李锐对习近平学历的真实性持怀疑态度，并批评其刚愎自用。
description.en: Li Rui was skeptical of the authenticity of Xi Jinping's academic qualifications and criticized him for being obstinate.

description.zh-cn: 因批评习近平的言论而被开除党籍，并公开批评他。
description.en: Was expelled from the party for her criticism of Xi Jinping and has openly criticized him.

description.zh-cn: 中美贸易战对习近平任内的中美关系和经济造成冲击。
description.en: The China-U.S. trade war impacted Sino-U.S. relations and the economy during Xi Jinping's term.

description.zh-cn: 江泽民在文化大革命期间受到冲击，停职并在五七干校劳动。
“杨家将事件”中，杨尚昆、杨白冰兄弟被指一度架空江泽民的军权。
“杨家将事件”中，杨尚昆、杨白冰兄弟被指一度架空江泽民的军权。
两人在上海和中央共事期间相处融洽，建立了密切的合作关系。
吴三桂从缅甸获得永历帝，并于昆明将其绞杀。
吴三桂为清朝剿灭南明政权，并杀害其末代皇帝永历帝。
狄仁杰在唐高宗时期担任官员。
description.en: Di Renjie served as an official during the reign of Emperor Gaozong of Tang.

description.zh-cn: 狄仁杰在武则天时期担任宰相。
description.en: Di Renjie served as chancellor during the reign of Wu Zetian.

description.zh-cn: 劝说武则天顺应民心，还政于庐陵王李显，使李唐得以维系。
description.en: Persuaded Wu Zetian to follow the will of the people and restore power to Li Xian, Prince of Luling, thus preserving the Tang lineage.

description.zh-cn: 追封狄仁杰为梁国公。
description.en: Posthumously ennobled Di Renjie as the Duke of Liang.

description.zh-cn: 上谏劝阻武则天停止建造耗资巨大的浮屠大像。
description.en: Advised Wu Zetian to stop the costly construction of a giant Buddha statue.

description.zh-cn: 曹操率军攻破袁绍的根据地邺城。
即位后追尊其母为文昭皇后，并为其改葬、立庙祭祀。
写信以“武王伐纣，以妲己赐周公”的故事讽刺曹操将甄氏赐予其子曹丕的行为。
在一次空袭中，被日本军机炸死于蒋家老宅丰镐房外。
文化大革命期间，毛福梅的墓被掘开，遗骸被毁。
文化大革命期间，王采玉的墓被掘开，遗骸被毁。
庄子的思想继承和发展了老子的思想，其学说要本归于老子之言。
description.en: Zhuangzi's thought inherited and developed Laozi's thought; his doctrine is fundamentally based on Laozi's words.

description.zh-cn: 庄周与孟子是同时代的人物。
description.en: Zhuangzi and Mencius were contemporaries.

description.zh-cn: 庄子为宋国蒙人。
description.en: Zhuangzi was a native of Meng in the state of Song.

description.zh-cn: 于天宝初年下诏，追封庄周为南华真人。
description.en: In the early Tianbao era, he issued an edict to posthumously honor Zhuang Zhou as Nanhua Zhenren.

description.zh-cn: 追封庄周为“微妙元通真君”。
description.en: Posthumously honored Zhuang Zhou as 'Weimiao Yuantong Zhenjun'.

description.zh-cn: 批评儒家的“仁义”违背人性，反对其等级观念和礼法治国。
description.en: Criticized Confucian concepts of 'benevolence and righteousness' as being against human nature, and opposed its hierarchical concepts and rule by rites.

description.zh-cn: 反对法家以法律治国的主张。
description.en: Opposed the Legalist proposition of governing by law.

description.zh-cn: 借盗跖之口批评孔子是“鲁之巧伪人”。
description.en: Through the voice of the character Robber Zhi, criticized Confucius as a 'cunning and hypocritical man of Lu'.

description.zh-cn: 因拍摄《红高粱》相识相恋，于1995年分手。
description.en: Met and fell in love during the filming of 'Red Sorghum', and broke up in 1995.

description.zh-cn: 因拍摄《千里走单骑》结下友谊。
description.en: Became friends during the filming of 'Riding Alone for Thousands of Miles'.

description.zh-cn: 跟随毛泽东参加秋收起义。
在长征途中举荐起用张宗逊。
在大同集宁战役中，张宗逊率部与傅作义部交战后惨败。
在西北野战军和第一野战军期间，担任司令员彭德怀的副手。
张宗逊在文化大革命期间遭受迫害，被冠以“罗瑞卿的同伙、彭德怀的黑干将、贺龙的心腹”等罪名。
毛泽东向黄永胜询问张宗逊去向，促使其被任命为济南军区副司令员。
介绍张宗逊与杜芳结婚。
长期兼任中央警卫局局长，负责党主席毛泽东的警卫安全，是毛泽东的亲信。
汪东兴在文化大革命开始后逐步受到重用，权力在文革中后期快速提升。
作为主要决策和执行者之一，参与并领导了抓捕四人帮的行动。
邓小平等中共元老在权力斗争中获胜，导致坚持“两个凡是”的汪东兴失势并被迫辞去领导职务。
邓小平等中共元老在权力斗争中获胜，导致坚持“两个凡是”的汪东兴失势并被迫辞去领导职务。
作为“凡是派”的主要领导人之一，支持“两个凡是”的主张。
联合陈云、胡耀邦等人指责“两个凡是”是“极左路线错误”，并推动“实践是检验真理的唯一标准”的讨论，最终取代了“凡是派”的领导地位。
在1971年毛泽东南巡期间负责安保工作，挫败了林彪集团的暗杀毛泽东计划。
汪东兴接替杨尚昆担任中共中央办公厅主任。
姚依林接替汪东兴担任中共中央办公厅主任。
吕布袭取下邳，与刘备、张飞交战。
在长坂坡之战中，张飞率二十骑据水断桥，阻挡了曹操的追兵。
在下辨之战中，张飞所部被曹洪击败。
在汉中之战期间，刘备分遣张飞、马超、吴兰等攻取武都。
毕业于其前身爱德华七世医药学院。
description.en: Graduated from its predecessor, the King Edward VII College of Medicine.

description.zh-cn: 因在五一三事件后公开批评时任首相东姑阿都拉曼而被巫统开除。
description.en: Expelled from UMNO for openly criticizing then-Prime Minister Tunku Abdul Rahman after the 13 May incident.

description.zh-cn: 1998年亚洲金融危机期间，马哈迪因政策分歧革除了安华的副首相职务，两人关系破裂并成为长期的政治对手。他们曾在2018年短暂结盟，但在2020年政治危机后关系再度破裂。
description.en: During the 1998 Asian financial crisis, Mahathir dismissed Anwar as Deputy Prime Minister over policy differences, leading to a breakdown in their relationship and making them long-term political rivals. They formed a brief alliance in 2018 but their relationship broke down again after the 2020 political crisis.

description.zh-cn: 马哈迪退休后，开始批评他亲自挑选的继任者阿都拉·巴达威的政策。
description.en: After retiring, Mahathir began to criticize the policies of his handpicked successor, Abdullah Ahmad Badawi.

description.zh-cn: 因一个马来西亚发展有限公司丑闻（1MDB）而成为纳吉的激烈批评者，并领导反对派推翻其政府。
description.en: Became a fierce critic of Najib over the 1MDB scandal and led the opposition to overthrow his government.

description.zh-cn: 两人在担任首相期间多次会面解决双边问题，关系复杂，既有合作也有纠纷。
description.en: The two met multiple times during their premierships to resolve bilateral issues; their relationship was complex, involving both cooperation and disputes.

description.zh-cn: 习近平与马哈迪通话，马哈迪对新冠肺炎疫情表示慰问，习近平称马哈迪为“中国人民的老朋友”。
description.en: Xi Jinping and Mahathir had a phone call where Mahathir expressed sympathy regarding the COVID-19 pandemic, and Xi referred to Mahathir as an "old friend of the Chinese people".

description.zh-cn: 朱祐杬是明孝宗的异母弟，明世宗是明孝宗之侄。
description.en: Zhu Youyuan was the half-brother of the Hongzhi Emperor, making the Jiajing Emperor the nephew of the Hongzhi Emperor.

description.zh-cn: 笃信道教，好长生不老之术，每年不断修设斋醮，并在西苑修仙。
description.en: He was a devout believer in Taoism, sought immortality, held numerous Taoist ceremonies annually, and practiced self-cultivation in the West Park.

description.zh-cn: 明世宗深居西苑后，将政令皆交由严嵩父子打理，使其专权近二十年。
description.en: After retreating to the West Park, the Jiajing Emperor delegated all government affairs to Yan Song and his son, allowing them to monopolize power for nearly 20 years.

description.zh-cn: 嘉靖年间侵扰中国东南沿海，造成严重破坏。
description.en: Raided the southeastern coast of China during the Jiajing era, causing severe destruction.

description.zh-cn: 率领军队肃清倭寇，保卫了东南沿海地区。
description.en: Led troops to eliminate the Wokou pirates, defending the southeastern coastal regions.

description.zh-cn: 莫言获得2012年诺贝尔文学奖。
因文化大革命在小学五年级时辍学。
张艺谋导演了多部由莫言小说改编的电影。
发文为莫言辩护，认为起诉莫言是一场闹剧。
联邦调查局指控钱学森在入籍申请中隐瞒其共产党外围组织活动，导致其机密工作许可被吊销。
description.en: The FBI accused Qian Xuesen of concealing his activities in communist front organizations on his naturalization application, leading to the revocation of his security clearance.

description.zh-cn: 钱学森为中华人民共和国的火箭、导弹和航天计划做出了重大贡献。
description.en: Qian Xuesen made significant contributions to the People's Republic of China's rocket, missile, and space programs.

description.zh-cn: 钱学森是加州理工学院喷气推进实验室的主要创建者之一，为美国的火箭和航天计划做出了重大贡献。
description.en: Qian Xuesen was one of the main founders of the Jet Propulsion Laboratory at Caltech and made significant contributions to the U.S. rocket and space programs.

description.zh-cn: 在文化大革命期间保护了钱学森，使其免受冲击。
description.en: Protected Qian Xuesen from persecution during the Cultural Revolution.

description.zh-cn: 在“批邓反击右倾翻案风”运动中，发表大字报批判上司张爱萍。
description.en: During the 'Counterattack the Right-Deviationist Reversal-of-Verdicts Trend' campaign, published a big-character poster criticizing his superior Zhang Aiping.

description.zh-cn: 钱学森的传记作者张纯如对考克斯报告中称其为“间谍”的指控予以驳斥。
description.en: Qian Xuesen's biographer, Iris Chang, refuted the Cox Report's accusation that he was a 'spy'.

description.zh-cn: 宋高宗是宋徽宗第九子。
宋孝宗为宋高宗的养子。
宋高宗在位初期重用主战派将领岳飞。
宋高宗为与金人缔结和约而重用主和派秦桧。
金朝与南宋长期处于军事对峙状态。
因北宋皇室被俘，赵构成为仅存的希望，得以南下建立南宋。
宋高宗禅让皇位于养子赵昚（宋孝宗）。
与吾尔开希等人共同创立“民主中国阵线”。
description.en: Co-founded the Federation for a Democratic China with Wu'erkaixi and others.

description.zh-cn: 陪同曾庆红参观上海韩天衡美术馆。
description.en: Accompanied Zeng Qinghong on a visit to the Han Tianheng Art Museum in Shanghai.

description.zh-cn: 与韩正一同陪同曾庆红参观上海韩天衡美术馆。
description.en: Together with Han Zheng, accompanied Zeng Qinghong on a visit to the Han Tianheng Art Museum in Shanghai.

description.zh-cn: 陪同吴邦国视察上海工博会中国科学院展区。
description.en: Accompanied Wu Bangguo to inspect the Chinese Academy of Sciences exhibition area at the Shanghai Industry Fair.

description.zh-cn: 陈晓丹是陈元之女。
在帕米拉咨询公司之后任职。
因硕士学位遭撤销而辞职。

position.zh-cn: 竞选办公室核心幕僚、市长办公室主任
position.en: Core campaign staff, Director of the Mayor's Office

description.zh-cn: 被视为柯文哲的“第一心腹”和贯彻“柯氏管理精神”的关键人物。
被外界视为柯文哲的“第一心腹”。
在2024年中华民国立法委员选举中，于台中市第一选举区竞争立法委员席位。
作为中共中央政治局委员和地方主要领导，在以习近平为核心的党中央领导下工作。多次公开表态拥护“习核心”。
description.en: As a member of the Politburo and a key regional leader, he works under the party central committee with Xi Jinping at its core. He has publicly expressed support for 'Xi Core' on multiple occasions.

description.zh-cn: 在李铁映任中共辽宁省委书记和电子工业部部长期间担任其秘书。
description.en: Served as secretary to Li Tieying when he was Party Secretary of Liaoning Province and Minister of Electronics Industry.

description.zh-cn: 在电子工业部任职时，李鸿忠为黄丽满的直接下属。
description.en: When working in the Ministry of Electronics Industry, Li Hongzhong was a direct subordinate of Huang Liman.

description.zh-cn: 据信为李鸿忠的主要提拔者。
description.en: Believed to be the main promoter of Li Hongzhong.

description.zh-cn: 在李鸿忠担任深圳市委书记期间，张德江是时任广东省委书记。
description.en: While Li Hongzhong was the Party Secretary of Shenzhen, Zhang Dejiang was the then Party Secretary of Guangdong Province.

description.zh-cn: 时任总理温家宝批评李鸿忠在防汛工作汇报中“信口开河”。
description.en: Then-Premier Wen Jiabao criticized Li Hongzhong for 'making irresponsible remarks' in a flood control work report.

description.zh-cn: 是甲午中日战争的主要策划和发动者。
description.en: Was a main planner and instigator of the First Sino-Japanese War.

description.zh-cn: 与久坂玄瑞、高杉晋作等人一同烧毁了建设中的英国公使馆。
description.en: Along with Kusaka Genzui, Takasugi Shinsaku, and others, burned down the under-construction British legation.

description.zh-cn: 明治维新成功后，在木户孝允的领导下负责处理外交事务。
description.en: After the success of the Meiji Restoration, he was responsible for foreign affairs under the leadership of Kido Takayoshi.

description.zh-cn: 明治维新成功后，在大久保利通的领导下负责处理外交事务。
description.en: After the success of the Meiji Restoration, he was responsible for foreign affairs under the leadership of Ōkubo Toshimichi.

description.zh-cn: 在清廷戊戌变法时前往北京访问，面见光绪皇帝和康有为，提供改革方针。
description.en: Visited Beijing during the Qing court's Hundred Days' Reform, met with the Guangxu Emperor and Kang Youwei, and provided reform guidelines.

description.zh-cn: 在戊戌政变后协助康有为逃往日本。
description.en: Assisted Kang Youwei in escaping to Japan after the 1898 Coup.

description.zh-cn: 在戊戌政变后协助梁启超逃往日本。
description.en: Assisted Liang Qichao in escaping to Japan after the 1898 Coup.

description.zh-cn: 李斯师从荀子学习帝王之术。
韩非与李斯一同师从荀子。韩非的思想深受老师荀子影响，尤其是在尊君思想方面。
description.en: Han Fei, along with Li Si, studied under Xunzi. Han Fei's thought was deeply influenced by his teacher Xunzi, especially regarding the concept of revering the monarch.

description.zh-cn: 李斯初到秦国时，担任吕不韦的舍人。
在拥立胡亥为帝后，李斯继续担任丞相。
上《谏逐客书》成功说服秦王政废除驱逐客卿的命令。
李斯因嫉妒韩非的才华，向秦王政进谗言，导致韩非下狱，并最终在狱中将其毒死。
description.en: Out of jealousy of Han Fei's talent, Li Si slandered him to King Zheng of Qin, leading to Han Fei's imprisonment and eventual death by poison in jail.

description.zh-cn: 在秦始皇死后，赵高威逼利诱李斯参与伪造遗诏的沙丘之变。
李斯与赵高合谋，伪造秦始皇遗诏，拥立胡亥为帝。
赵高与李斯合谋，伪造秦始皇遗诏，拥立胡亥为帝。
李斯与赵高合谋，伪造遗诏，以不孝罪名赐死扶苏。
赵高与李斯合谋，伪造遗诏，以不孝罪名赐死扶苏。
赵高在独揽朝政后，进谗言诬陷李斯谋反，并主导了对李斯的审判和处决。
秦二世胡亥听信赵高谗言，下令将李斯处以五刑并腰斩，诛灭三族。
李斯在秦统一后担任丞相。
赵少康为侯友宜参选2024年总统选举的副手搭档。
金溥聪出任侯友宜2024总统竞选办公室执行长。
秦国于公元前230年灭亡韩国。
为替韩国复仇，在博浪沙伏击行刺秦始皇，但未成功。
在鸿门宴事件中，通过项伯斡旋并召来樊哙，帮助刘邦化解了被项羽攻击的危机；此外，建议刘邦首先封赏其最痛恨的雍齿，以此安定群臣之心，化解了潜在的造反危机；并与陈平一同主张撕毁鸿沟条约，立即攻击项羽，最终取得楚汉相争的胜利。
为加强自身力量以铲除宦官，下令调动董卓部进军洛阳。
在董卓军进洛阳前，处死了何进。
为躲避关东联军的锋芒，胁迫汉献帝迁都至长安。
设计并联合吕布诛杀了董卓。
起兵追击董卓，但在荥阳被徐荣击败。
在讨董之战中斩杀了董卓的都督华雄。
董卓掌控朝政后自封的最高官职。
李渊于晋阳起兵反隋，最终取代隋朝。

position.zh-cn: 尚书令、丞相、太原郡留守

description.zh-cn: 在起兵前，李渊曾担任隋朝的多个重要官职。
玄武门之变后，李渊被迫将皇位禅让给李世民，退居太上皇。
在玄武门之变中诛杀太子李建成。
在玄武门之变中诛杀齐王李元吉。
与太子李建成在继承权问题上明争暗斗。
表兄弟关系
宇文化及在江都发动兵变，弑杀隋炀帝杨广。
description.en: Yuwen Huaji launched a coup in Jiangdu and assassinated Emperor Yang of Sui, Yang Guang.

description.zh-cn: 禅位给李世民后，退位为太上皇。

position.zh-cn: 中共中央政治局委员、中央政法委书记

description.zh-cn: 在以习近平为总书记的中共中央领导集体中担任职务。
在李克强担任总理的国务院中担任国家安全部部长。
被视为习近平的亲信之一。
接替郭声琨出任中共中央政法委书记。
国家安全部部长职务由陈一新接任。
中国纪检监察学院院长职务由杨晓渡接任。
菩提达摩至金陵与梁武帝谈法，但双方话不投机。
description.en: Bodhidharma went to Jinling to discuss the Dharma with Emperor Wu of Liang, but they did not agree.

description.zh-cn: 菩提达摩在嵩山少林寺面壁九年，被称为“壁观婆罗门”。
description.en: Bodhidharma faced a wall in meditation for nine years at the Shaolin Temple on Mount Song, and was called the 'Wall-gazing Brahmin'.

description.zh-cn: 梁武帝是南朝梁的开国皇帝。
description.en: Emperor Wu of Liang was the founding emperor of the Liang dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 菩提达摩乘船初到中国时，在南越地区（今广州）登陆。
description.en: When Bodhidharma first arrived in China by boat, he landed in the Nanyue region (present-day Guangzhou).

description.zh-cn: 接替李鸿忠出任中共天津市委书记。
接替孙政才担任重庆市委书记。
接替陈敏尔担任重庆市委书记。
孙志刚在陈敏尔担任贵州省委书记期间任副书记兼省长。
接替赵克志出任中共贵州省委书记。
陈敏尔担任贵州省省长期间，赵克志为省委书记。
陈敏尔担任常务副省长时，夏宝龙为省长。
陈敏尔担任浙江省委宣传部长时，张德江为省委书记。
陈敏尔任贵州省委副书记时，栗战书为省委书记。
应用心理学硕士
根据其维基百科页面分类“清华大学校友”推断。
晋升少将军衔。
方永祥接替钟绍军出任中央军事委员会办公厅主任。
自1973年当选为中共中央政治局委员起，成为副国级领导人。
毛泽东对陈永贵的肯定和支持是其进入中共中央领导层的关键。
陈永贵在文化大革命期间进一步得到毛泽东的肯定，政治地位迅速提升。
周恩来在接见陈永贵时授意他可以组织自己的红卫兵。
改革开放政策与陈永贵的政治路线相抵触，导致其下台。
邓小平主导的改革开放导致陈永贵被迫辞去国务院副总理职务。
陈永贵力劝华国锋不要让邓小平复出，并当面质问邓小平的路线，被邓小平驳斥。
1977年9月，波尔布特访华期间参观大寨；同年12月，陈永贵回访柬埔寨。
因胡耀邦的批评而辱骂其为“胡乱邦”。
袁世凯在天津小站练兵时，段祺瑞主管砲兵。
description.en: When Yuan Shikai was training the New Army at Xiaozhan, Tianjin, Duan Qirui was in charge of the artillery.

description.zh-cn: 段祺瑞联名发布《共和之电》并以武力威胁，向隆裕太后逼宫，促使其下诏清帝退位。
description.en: Duan Qirui co-signed the 'Telegram for the Republic' and used military threats to pressure Empress Dowager Longyu into issuing the abdication edict for the Qing emperor.

description.zh-cn: 冯玉祥发动甲子政变后，邀请段祺瑞出山，出任中华民国临时政府的临时执政。
description.en: After launching the Beijing Coup, Feng Yuxiang invited Duan Qirui to come out of retirement and serve as the Provisional Chief Executive of the Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 1902年，徐树铮投奔段祺瑞并担任其记室，后成为其重要幕僚和亲信。
description.en: In 1902, Xu Shuzheng joined Duan Qirui as his secretary and later became his key advisor and confidant.

degree.en: Junior and Senior High School graduate

description.zh-cn: 王金平毕业于台湾省立台南第一中学（今国立台南第一高级中学）初中部及高中部。
description.en: Wang Jin-pyng graduated from the junior and senior high school departments of Taiwan Provincial Tainan First Senior High School (now National Tainan First Senior High School).

description.zh-cn: 与元稹订交，成为终身的好友，二人齐名，号“元白”。
description.en: Became friends with Yuan Zhen, forming a lifelong friendship. They were equally famous and known as 'Yuan-Bai'.

description.zh-cn: 晚年与刘禹锡唱和甚多，人称为“刘白”。
description.en: In his later years, he frequently exchanged poems with Liu Yuxi, and they were known as 'Liu-Bai'.

description.zh-cn: 在武元衡遇刺案后，因白居易越职言事及被诽谤，唐宪宗将其贬为江州司马。
description.en: After the assassination of Wu Yuanheng, Emperor Xianzong demoted Bai Juyi to Sima of Jiangzhou because he overstepped his authority and was slandered.

description.zh-cn: 曾褒白居易为“诗仙”，并在其去世后作吊唁诗，评价其一生。
description.en: He praised Bai Juyi as the 'Poet Immortal' and wrote a eulogy poem after his death, summarizing his life.

description.zh-cn: 倪匡代表香港《明报》向古龙邀稿，促成了小说《绝代双骄》的诞生。
description.en: Representing Hong Kong's Ming Pao newspaper, Ni Kuang commissioned a manuscript from Gu Long, which led to the creation of the novel 'Juedai Shuangjiao'.

description.zh-cn: 金庸在自己封笔后，于1972年亲自为旗下的《明报》向古龙邀稿，促成了《陆小凤》系列的创作，此举有世代传承的意味。
description.en: After retiring from writing, Jin Yong personally invited Gu Long in 1972 to write for his newspaper Ming Pao, which led to the creation of the 'Lu Xiaofeng Series'. This act was seen as a passing of the torch between generations.

description.zh-cn: 香港邵氏公司于1976年将古龙的小说改编成电影，大获成功，开创了古龙的电影时代，使其作品声名鹊起。
description.en: In 1976, Hong Kong's Shaw Brothers Studio successfully adapted Gu Long's novels into films, initiating the Gu Long movie era and skyrocketing the popularity of his works.

description.zh-cn: 在1980年的吟松阁事件中，因古龙不愿向柯俊雄敬酒，柯的友人叶庆辉等人用刀刺伤古龙，导致其身受重伤。
description.en: During the 1980 Yinsong Pavilion incident, Gu Long was unwilling to offer a toast to Ko Chun-hsiung. As a result, Ko's associate Ye Qinghui and others stabbed and severely injured Gu Long.

description.zh-cn: 古龙于1938年6月7日出生于香港。
description.en: Gu Long was born in Hong Kong on June 7, 1938.

description.zh-cn: 王健林是王思聪的父亲。
description.en: Wang Jianlin is the father of Wang Sicong.

description.zh-cn: 王健林是中国共产党党员。
description.en: Wang Jianlin is a member of the Communist Party of China.

description.zh-cn: 王健林是大连万达集团股份有限公司的董事长。
description.en: Wang Jianlin is the Chairman of Dalian Wanda Group.

description.zh-cn: 由于冠状病毒大流行，王健林的房地产和影视事业都急剧下降，导致其财富缩水并跌出富豪榜前列。
description.en: Due to the COVID-19 pandemic, Wang Jianlin's real estate and film businesses declined sharply, causing his wealth to shrink and drop him from the top ranks of the rich list.

description.zh-cn: 中国工农红军进行了长征军事转移。
description.en: The Chinese Workers' and Peasants' Red Army undertook the Long March military retreat.

description.zh-cn: 允禩是康熙帝的第八子。
description.en: Yinsi was the eighth son of the Kangxi Emperor.

description.zh-cn: 雍正帝即位后，将允禩革去爵位、开除宗籍、勒令改名，并将其圈禁于宗人府，允禩最终在拘禁中病故。
description.en: After ascending the throne, the Yongzheng Emperor stripped Yinsi of his titles, expelled him from the imperial clan, forced him to change his name, and imprisoned him in the Imperial Clan Court, where Yinsi eventually died.

description.zh-cn: 允禩是雍正帝的异母弟。
description.en: Yinsi was the younger half-brother of the Yongzheng Emperor.

description.zh-cn: 允禩在九子夺嫡中失败，未能继承皇位，并为其后来的悲惨结局埋下伏笔。
description.en: Yinsi failed in the nine sons' succession struggle, did not inherit the throne, which foreshadowed his later tragic end.

description.zh-cn: 在九子夺嫡期间，允禩是争夺储君之位的主要人物之一，与时为皇太子的胤礽形成政治对立。
description.en: During the nine sons' succession struggle, Yinsi was one of the main contenders for the position of crown prince, forming a political opposition to the then Crown Prince Yinreng.

description.zh-cn: 在争储后期，允禩转而支持皇十四子胤禵继承大统，二人结成政治同盟。
description.en: In the later stages of the succession struggle, Yinsi shifted his support to the 14th prince, Yinti, to inherit the throne, forming a political alliance.

description.zh-cn: 乾隆四十三年，乾隆帝下旨恢复允禩的原名，并将其及其子孙重新录入玉牒，恢复宗籍。
description.en: In 1778, the Qianlong Emperor issued an edict to restore Yinsi's original name and re-admit him and his descendants into the imperial genealogy, restoring their clan status.

description.zh-cn: 雍正帝即位后，命允禩与允祥、马齐、隆科多四人总理事务。
description.en: After the Yongzheng Emperor's accession, he appointed Yinsi, Yunxiang, Maci, and Longkodo to jointly manage state affairs.

description.zh-cn: 雍正帝即位后，命允禩与允祥、马齐、隆科多四人总理事务。
description.en: After the Yongzheng Emperor's accession, he appointed Yinsi, Yunxiang, Maci, and Longkodo to jointly manage state affairs.

description.zh-cn: 作为中央政治局委员，接受中共中央总书记习近平的领导。
description.en: As a member of the Politburo, he is under the leadership of CPC General Secretary Xi Jinping.

description.zh-cn: 在担任天津市市长期间，市委书记是李鸿忠。
description.en: During his tenure as Mayor of Tianjin, the Municipal Party Secretary was Li Hongzhong.

description.zh-cn: 在担任中共重庆市委副书记和重庆市市长期间，市委书记是孙政才。
description.en: During his tenure as Deputy Party Secretary and Mayor of Chongqing, the Municipal Party Secretary was Sun Zhengcai.

description.zh-cn: 在担任重庆市市长期间，孙政才被免职后，市委书记是陈敏尔。
description.en: During his tenure as Mayor of Chongqing, after Sun Zhengcai was removed from office, the Municipal Party Secretary was Chen Min'er.

position.zh-cn: 副总裁，党委书记，总裁；总经理、党组副书记
position.en: Vice President, Party Secretary, President; General Manager, Deputy Party Secretary

description.zh-cn: 1996年晋升公司副总裁；1998年起兼任党委书记；2004年4月任北方工业公司总裁。2008年10月至2013年4月任总经理、党组副书记。
description.en: Promoted to Vice President in 1996; served concurrently as Party Secretary from 1998; appointed President of Norinco in April 2004. From October 2008 to April 2013, served as General Manager and Deputy Party Secretary.

description.zh-cn: 共同担任中华人民共和国国务院副总理。
description.en: Serve together as Vice Premiers of the State Council of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 共同担任中华人民共和国国务院副总理。
description.en: Serve together as Vice Premiers of the State Council of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 共同担任中华人民共和国国务院副总理。
description.en: Serve together as Vice Premiers of the State Council of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 张国清接替黄奇帆担任重庆市市长。
description.en: Zhang Guoqing succeeded Huang Qifan as Mayor of Chongqing.

description.zh-cn: 作为国家主席习近平特别代表出席在德黑兰举行的伊朗已故总统莱希吊唁活动。
description.en: As the special representative of President Xi Jinping, attended the memorial service for the late Iranian President Ebrahim Raisi in Tehran.

description.zh-cn: 薄熙来是薄一波的次子。
description.en: Bo Xilai is the second son of Bo Yibo.

description.zh-cn: 李望知是薄熙来与前妻李丹宇所生的长子。
description.en: Li Wangzhi is the eldest son of Bo Xilai and his ex-wife Li Danyu.

description.zh-cn: 薄瓜瓜是薄熙来与妻子薄谷开来所生的幼子。
description.en: Bo Guagua is the youngest son of Bo Xilai and his wife Bo Gu Kailai.

description.zh-cn: 对海伍德死亡案的复查揭示了薄熙来家庭的犯罪行为，成为其被立案调查的关键原因之一。
description.en: The re-investigation of the Neil Heywood death case exposed the criminal activities of Bo Xilai's family, becoming a key reason for the official investigation against him.

description.zh-cn: 王立军与薄熙来决裂后，进入美国领事馆，揭露了薄家的内幕，成为薄熙来的主要政治对手。
description.en: After breaking with Bo Xilai, Wang Lijun entered the U.S. consulate and exposed the Bo family's secrets, becoming Bo's primary political adversary.

description.zh-cn: 据报道，时任总理温家宝反对薄熙来晋升为副总理，并在2012年两会记者会上公开批评重庆市委，对薄熙来的倒台起到了关键作用。
description.en: Then-Premier Wen Jiabao reportedly opposed Bo Xilai's promotion to Vice Premier and played a key role in his downfall by publicly criticizing the Chongqing Municipal Committee at a 2012 press conference.

description.zh-cn: 据报道，薄熙来在重庆发起窃听行动，其监控对象包括时任中共中央总书记胡锦涛。
description.en: Bo Xilai reportedly initiated an eavesdropping operation in Chongqing, with targets including then-General Secretary of the CCP Central Committee, Hu Jintao.

description.zh-cn: 在文化大革命期间，薄熙来被关押在北京市立水桥北苑少管所，并参加劳动。
description.en: During the Cultural Revolution, Bo Xilai was detained at the Lishuiqiao Beiyuan Juvenile Detention Center in Beijing and participated in labor.

description.zh-cn: 载沣是光绪帝（载湉）的异母弟。
description.en: Zaifeng was the younger half-brother of the Guangxu Emperor (Zaitian).

description.zh-cn: 溥任是载沣的第四子。
description.en: Puren was the fourth son of Zaifeng.

description.zh-cn: 慈禧太后在临终前发布懿旨，授载沣为摄政王，监国辅佐幼帝。
description.en: Before her death, Empress Dowager Cixi issued an edict appointing Zaifeng as the Prince-Regent to govern and assist the young emperor.

description.zh-cn: 在决定权力交接时，张之洞建议给予载沣摄政王的封号，并被慈禧太后采纳。
description.en: During the power transition, Zhang Zhidong suggested giving Zaifeng the title of Prince-Regent, which was adopted by Empress Dowager Cixi.

description.zh-cn: 根据慈禧太后的安排，载沣作为摄政王在遇到重大事件时，需请示隆裕太后懿旨施行。
description.en: According to Empress Dowager Cixi's arrangements, Zaifeng, as the Prince-Regent, was required to seek instructions from Empress Dowager Longyu for implementation when encountering major events.

description.zh-cn: 武昌起义的爆发动摇了清朝的统治，导致载沣的摄政权力迅速瓦解。
description.en: The outbreak of the Wuchang Uprising shook the rule of the Qing dynasty, leading to the rapid collapse of Zaifeng's regency power.

description.zh-cn: 在袁世凯的劝说下，隆裕太后命令载沣辞去监国摄政王职位。
description.en: Persuaded by Yuan Shikai, Empress Dowager Longyu ordered Zaifeng to resign from his position as Prince-Regent.

description.zh-cn: 在辛亥革命的浪潮中，载沣被迫辞去监国摄政王的职务。
description.en: In the tide of the Xinhai Revolution, Zaifeng was forced to resign from his position as Prince-Regent.

description.zh-cn: 庚子事变后，载沣被授为头等专使，赴德国为德国公使被杀一事道歉。
description.en: After the Boxer Rebellion, Zaifeng was appointed as a first-class special envoy to Germany to apologize for the killing of the German minister.

description.zh-cn: 载沣是清朝皇族成员，并担任过军机大臣、监国摄政王等要职。
description.en: Zaifeng was a member of the Qing imperial family and held important positions such as Grand Councilor and Prince-Regent.

description.zh-cn: 载沣在北京病故，并葬于北京西郊福田公墓。
description.en: Zaifeng died of illness in Beijing and was buried in the Futian Cemetery in the western suburbs of Beijing.

description.zh-cn: 作为中共一大代表，是中国共产党的创始人之一。
description.en: As a delegate to the First National Congress of the CCP, he was one of the founders of the Chinese Communist Party.

description.zh-cn: 因张国焘投靠中国国民党而被开除党籍。
description.en: Expelled from the party after defecting to the Kuomintang.

description.zh-cn: 在长征途中，因坚持南下和反对中共中央北上决定而与毛泽东等人产生严重分歧，并另立“中央”，导致党内分裂。1937年3月遭到毛泽东等人的批判斗争。
description.en: During the Long March, he had serious disagreements with Mao Zedong and others over his insistence on going south and opposing the Central Committee's decision to go north. He established a rival 'Central Committee', leading to a split in the party. He was criticized and struggled against by Mao Zedong and others in March 1937.

description.zh-cn: 向毛泽东报告了张国焘要求武力解决分歧的密电，促使毛泽东率领中央纵队先行北上。
description.en: Reported to Mao Zedong about Zhang Guotao's secret cable demanding a forceful resolution of their differences, which prompted Mao to lead the central column north ahead of schedule.

description.zh-cn: 吕不韦在秦庄襄王元年（前249年）被任命为相邦，至秦王政十年（前237年）被罢免。
description.en: Lü Buwei was appointed Chancellor in the first year of King Zhuangxiang of Qin (-249) and was dismissed in the tenth year of King Zheng of Qin's reign (-237).

description.zh-cn: 秦王政十年（前237年），秦始皇下令调查并平定了嫪毐发动的叛乱，并将其诛杀。
description.en: In the tenth year of his reign (-237), Qin Shi Huang ordered an investigation and suppressed the rebellion launched by Lao Ai, subsequently having him executed.

description.zh-cn: 在平定嫪毐之乱后，秦始皇将母亲赵姬软禁，并毒杀了她与嫪毐的两个私生子。
description.en: After suppressing the Lao Ai rebellion, Qin Shi Huang placed his mother, Queen Dowager Zhao, under house arrest and poisoned her two illegitimate sons with Lao Ai.

description.zh-cn: 嫪毐集团发动叛乱，此事牵连了吕不韦，导致其被秦王政免除相邦职务。
description.en: The rebellion launched by Lao Ai's faction implicated Lü Buwei, leading to his dismissal from the post of Chancellor by King Zheng of Qin.

description.zh-cn: 根据该页面的信息框，老子是影响吕不韦的人物之一。
description.en: According to the infobox on this page, Laozi was one of the figures who influenced Lü Buwei.

description.zh-cn: 根据该页面的信息框，诸子百家是影响吕不韦的因素之一。
description.en: According to the infobox on this page, the Hundred Schools of Thought were one of the factors that influenced Lü Buwei.

description.zh-cn: 屠呦呦于1981年加入中国共产党。
description.en: Tu Youyou joined the Communist Party of China in 1981.

description.zh-cn: 屠呦呦领导的科研小组在523项目中首次从黄花蒿中成功提取并分离出高效抗疟的青蒿素。
description.en: The research group led by Tu Youyou, as part of Project 523, was the first to successfully extract and isolate the highly effective antimalarial compound artemisinin from Artemisia annua.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国国务院于2017年1月9日将2016年度国家最高科学技术奖授予屠呦呦。
description.en: The State Council of the People's Republic of China awarded the 2016 State Preeminent Science and Technology Award to Tu Youyou on January 9, 2017.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国主席习近平于2019年9月17日授予屠呦呦共和国勋章。
description.en: On September 17, 2019, President of the People's Republic of China Xi Jinping awarded Tu Youyou the Medal of the Republic.

description.zh-cn: 在屠呦呦获得诺贝尔奖后，时任国务院总理李克强致函表示祝贺，推动了对她的认可。
description.en: After Tu Youyou won the Nobel Prize, then-Premier Li Keqiang sent a congratulatory letter, promoting her recognition.

description.zh-cn: 微软创始人比尔·盖茨将屠呦呦获得诺贝尔奖列为“2015年6大好消息”之一，提升了其国际声誉。
description.en: Microsoft founder Bill Gates listed Tu Youyou's Nobel Prize win as one of 'The Top 6 Good-News Stories of 2015', enhancing her international reputation.

description.zh-cn: 乾隆帝是清朝的第六位皇帝，于1735年即位。1796年禅位后作为太上皇继续执政至1799年驾崩。
description.en: The Qianlong Emperor was the sixth emperor of the Qing Dynasty, ascending the throne in 1735. After abdicating in 1796, he continued to rule as Emperor Emeritus until his death in 1799.

description.zh-cn: 乾隆六十年九月三日，乾隆帝立十五子永琰（即嘉庆帝）为皇太子，并宣布次年禅让皇位。
description.en: On the third day of the ninth month of the 60th year of the Qianlong reign, the Qianlong Emperor appointed his 15th son, Yongyan (the future Jiaqing Emperor), as Crown Prince and announced his abdication for the following year.

description.zh-cn: 乾隆帝禅位后，全国改用嘉庆年号，但北京紫禁城内为表示尊崇，仍继续使用乾隆年号，直至乾隆帝驾崩。
description.en: After the Qianlong Emperor's abdication, the Jiaqing era name was adopted nationwide. However, out of respect, the Qianlong era name continued to be used within the Forbidden City in Beijing until the former emperor's death.

description.zh-cn: 乾隆帝（弘历）是雍正帝的庶子。
description.en: The Qianlong Emperor (Hongli) was a son of the Yongzheng Emperor by a concubine.

description.zh-cn: 乾隆帝在宣布禅位的同时，下诏次年改元为嘉庆。
description.en: While announcing his abdication, the Qianlong Emperor decreed that the era name would be changed to 'Jiaqing' the following year.

description.zh-cn: 道光帝下定决心禁烟后，多次召见林则徐，并任命其为钦差大臣，前往广东主持禁烟事宜，对其高度信任和倚重。
description.en: After deciding to ban opium, the Daoguang Emperor summoned Lin Zexu multiple times and appointed him as the Imperial Commissioner to oversee the prohibition in Guangdong, placing great trust and reliance on him.

description.zh-cn: 林则徐在新疆期间，对俄罗斯帝国的扩张保持高度警惕，并预言其将是中国的长远祸患。
description.en: During his exile in Xinjiang, Lin Zexu was highly vigilant about the expansion of the Russian Empire and predicted it would become a long-term threat to China.

description.zh-cn: 孔令俊是孔祥熙的次女。
description.en: Kong Lingjun was the second daughter of H. H. Kung.

description.zh-cn: 宋祖英于1999年加入中国共产党。
description.en: Song Zuying joined the Communist Party of China in 1999.

description.zh-cn: 宋祖英曾任第十届、十一届、十二届全国政协委员。
description.en: Song Zuying served as a member of the 10th, 11th, and 12th National Committees of the Chinese People's Political Consultative Conference.

description.zh-cn: 在2011台北小巨蛋个人演唱会上与周华健同台演出。
description.en: Performed on the same stage with Wakin Chau at her 2011 solo concert at the Taipei Arena.

description.zh-cn: 2007年，宋祖英接受杨澜《天下女人》节目的访问。
description.en: In 2007, Song Zuying was interviewed by Yang Lan on the program 'Her Village'.

description.zh-cn: 孔祥熙于1907年在耶鲁大学取得矿物学硕士学位。
description.en: H. H. Kung obtained a Master's degree in Mineralogy from Yale University in 1907.

description.zh-cn: 孔祥熙曾先后担任行政院副院长（1933-1945）和院长（1938-1939）。
description.en: H. H. Kung served successively as Vice Premier (1933-1945) and Premier (1938-1939) of the Executive Yuan.

description.zh-cn: 孔祥熙宣布对中国银行实行管制，要求增发股票，将控制权交给政府。
description.en: H. H. Kung announced that the government would take control of the Bank of China, requiring it to issue additional shares to transfer control to the government.

description.zh-cn: 义和团运动期间，孔祥熙及其家人因运动导致的暴力而被迫依靠乡亲收容才得以脱险。
description.en: During the Boxer Rebellion, H. H. Kung and his family were forced to rely on fellow villagers for shelter to escape the violence caused by the movement.

description.zh-cn: 傅斯年在国民参政会上揭发孔祥熙贪污舞弊，不久后孔被免去财政部长职位。
description.en: Fu Ssu-nien exposed H. H. Kung's corruption at the People's Political Council, leading to Kung's dismissal from the post of Minister of Finance shortly thereafter.

description.zh-cn: 土木之变中明英宗被俘，为朱祁钰（时为郕王）继位成为景泰帝提供了直接契机。
description.en: The capture of Emperor Yingzong during the Tumu Crisis provided the direct opportunity for Zhu Qiyu (then Prince of Cheng) to ascend the throne as the Jingtai Emperor.

description.zh-cn: 在明英宗被俘后，联合其他大臣拥立郕王朱祁钰为皇帝。
description.en: After Emperor Yingzong was captured, he, along with other ministers, supported the enthronement of the Prince of Cheng, Zhu Qiyu, as emperor.

description.zh-cn: 在明英宗被俘后，首先任命朱祁钰为监国，为其后登基铺平了道路。
description.en: After Emperor Yingzong was captured, she first appointed Zhu Qiyu as regent, paving the way for his subsequent enthronement.

description.zh-cn: 景泰帝即位后，任命于谦为兵部尚书，领导京师保卫战。
description.en: After ascending the throne, the Jingtai Emperor appointed Yu Qian as the Minister of War to lead the Defense of Beijing.

description.zh-cn: 即位后，恢复了叔叔景泰帝的皇帝尊号，并上谥号“恭仁康定景皇帝”。
description.en: After ascending the throne, he restored his uncle the Jingtai Emperor's imperial title and gave him the posthumous name 'Gongren Kangding Jing Huangdi'.

description.zh-cn: 南明弘光帝为景泰帝追上庙号“代宗”和更长的谥号。
description.en: The Hongguang Emperor of the Southern Ming posthumously honored the Jingtai Emperor with the temple name 'Daizong' and a longer posthumous title.

description.zh-cn: 林立衡是林彪的女儿。
description.en: Lin Liheng is the daughter of Lin Biao.

description.zh-cn: 林立衡是叶群的女儿。
description.en: Lin Liheng is the daughter of Ye Qun.

description.zh-cn: 1962年进入清华大学电子工程系就读。
description.en: Enrolled in the Department of Electronic Engineering at Tsinghua University in 1962.

description.zh-cn: 从清华大学转学至北京大学中文系。
description.en: Transferred from Tsinghua University to the Department of Chinese at Peking University.

description.zh-cn: 林彪在九一三事件中因飞机坠毁而身亡。
description.en: Lin Biao was killed in the September 13 Incident due to a plane crash.

description.zh-cn: 九一三事件后，林立衡虽然告发有功，但仍需接受审查，期间曾试图自杀。
description.en: After the September 13 Incident, although Lin Liheng reported the escape plan, she was still subjected to investigation, during which she attempted suicide.

description.zh-cn: 在林立衡写信求助后，毛泽东于1974年7月31日批示解除了对她的审查。
description.en: After Lin Liheng wrote a letter asking for help, Mao Zedong issued an instruction on July 31, 1974, to lift the investigation against her.

description.zh-cn: 林立衡曾在位于郑州的汽车厂工作后，调至中国社会科学院工作。
description.en: After working in a car factory in Zhengzhou, Lin Liheng was transferred to work at the Chinese Academy of Social Sciences.

description.zh-cn: 毛岸英是杨开慧的长子。
description.en: Mao Anying is the eldest son of Yang Kaihui.

description.zh-cn: 毛岸英是毛泽东的长子。
description.en: Mao Anying is the eldest son of Mao Zedong.

description.zh-cn: 毛岸青是杨开慧的次子。
description.en: Mao Anqing is the second son of Yang Kaihui.

description.zh-cn: 毛岸青是毛泽东的次子。
description.en: Mao Anqing is the second son of Mao Zedong.

description.zh-cn: 毛岸龙是杨开慧的幼子。
description.en: Mao Anlong is the youngest son of Yang Kaihui.

description.zh-cn: 毛岸龙是毛泽东的幼子。
description.en: Mao Anlong is the youngest son of Mao Zedong.

description.zh-cn: 1928年，毛泽东在井冈山与贺子珍结婚。
description.en: In 1928, Mao Zedong married He Zizhen in the Jinggang Mountains.

description.zh-cn: 据传闻，蔡元培曾向何键发电报，要求保释杨开慧，但未成功。
description.en: According to rumors, Cai Yuanpei sent a telegram to He Jian requesting the release of Yang Kaihui, but was unsuccessful.

description.zh-cn: 苗华于1969年12月参军，2025年10月17日被开除军籍。
description.en: Miao Hua joined the army in December 1969 and was expelled from the military on October 17, 2025.

description.zh-cn: 苗华于1973年9月入党，2025年10月17日被开除党籍。
description.en: Miao Hua joined the Party in September 1973 and was expelled on October 17, 2025.

description.zh-cn: 苗华接替张阳担任中央军事委员会政治工作部主任。
description.en: Miao Hua succeeded Zhang Yang as Director of the Political Work Department of the Central Military Commission.

description.zh-cn: 中共中央研究决定对涉嫌严重违纪的苗华停职检查。
description.en: The Central Committee of the Communist Party of China decided to suspend Miao Hua from his duties for investigation into suspected serious violations of discipline.

description.zh-cn: 正式免除苗华的中华人民共和国中央军事委员会委员职务。
description.en: Formally removed Miao Hua from his position as a member of the Central Military Commission of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 开除苗华党籍。
description.en: Expelled Miao Hua from the party.

description.zh-cn: 开除苗华军籍。
description.en: Expelled Miao Hua from the military.

description.zh-cn: 郝明珠是习仲勋的第一任妻子，两人于1935年结婚，1944年初冬离婚。
description.en: Hao Mingzhu was Xi Zhongxun's first wife; they married in 1935 and divorced in the early winter of 1944.

description.zh-cn: 1948年8月21日，王光美与刘少奇于西柏坡结婚。
description.en: On August 21, 1948, Wang Guangmei married Liu Shaoqi in Xibaipo.

description.zh-cn: 1948年加入中国共产党。
description.en: Joined the Communist Party of China in 1948.

description.zh-cn: 外国媒体多以“第一夫人”称呼王光美，引起毛泽东夫人江青不满。
description.en: Foreign media often referred to Wang Guangmei as the 'First Lady', which caused dissatisfaction for Mao Zedong's wife, Jiang Qing.

description.zh-cn: 在文化大革命中，王光美遭到批斗并被投入秦城监狱，直至1978年12月恢复人身自由。
description.en: During the Cultural Revolution, Wang Guangmei was subjected to struggle sessions and imprisoned in Qincheng Prison until her personal freedom was restored in December 1978.

description.zh-cn: 1966年6月，出任清华大学工作组顾问的王光美严厉打击蒯大富，在清华掀起“反蒯运动”。
description.en: In June 1966, as an advisor to the work group at Tsinghua University, Wang Guangmei severely cracked down on Kuai Dafu, launching the 'Anti-Kuai Movement' at Tsinghua.

description.zh-cn: 策划“智擒王光美”事件，将王光美扣押，并于同年4月10日组织了对她的批斗大会。
description.en: Orchestrated the 'deceitful capture of Wang Guangmei' event, detaining her, and organized a struggle session against her on April 10 of the same year.

description.zh-cn: 在文化大革命中与江青等人力主处死王光美。
description.en: During the Cultural Revolution, along with Jiang Qing and others, strongly advocated for the execution of Wang Guangmei.

description.zh-cn: 在林彪、江青等人力主处死王光美时，批示“刀下留人”，使其幸免于死。
description.en: When Lin Biao, Jiang Qing, and others strongly advocated for Wang Guangmei's execution, Mao Zedong intervened with the instruction 'spare her from the blade', saving her life.

description.zh-cn: 张自忠改投冯玉祥的部队，并在其麾下任职多年。
description.en: Zhang Zizhong joined Feng Yuxiang's troops and served under his command for many years.

description.zh-cn: 因战事不利，张自忠恐为其直属长官石友三所害，遂率部脱离。
description.en: Due to unfavorable battle conditions, Zhang Zizhong feared he would be harmed by his direct superior Shi Yousan and thus led his troops to leave.

description.zh-cn: 张自忠在宋哲元担任军长的第二十九军中任师长。
description.en: Zhang Zizhong served as a division commander in the 29th Army, which was commanded by Song Zheyuan.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国民政部追认张自忠为革命烈士。
description.en: The Ministry of Civil Affairs of the People's Republic of China posthumously recognized Zhang Zizhong as a revolutionary martyr.

description.zh-cn: 在延安各界举行的追悼大会上，毛泽东为张自忠送上“尽忠报国”的挽词。
description.en: At a memorial service held in Yan'an, Mao Zedong sent a eulogy for Zhang Zizhong with the words 'Loyally serving the country'.

description.zh-cn: 在纪念抗战胜利69周年座谈会上，习近平将张自忠列为中国人民不畏强暴、以身殉国的杰出代表。
description.en: At a symposium commemorating the 69th anniversary of the victory of the War of Resistance Against Japanese Aggression, Xi Jinping listed Zhang Zizhong as an outstanding representative of the Chinese people who defied brute force and sacrificed their lives for the country.

description.zh-cn: 嘉仁于1912年7月30日继位为大正天皇。
description.en: Yoshihito succeeded to the throne as Emperor Taishō on July 30, 1912.

description.zh-cn: 大正天皇驾崩后，皇太子裕仁继位成为昭和天皇。
description.en: After the death of Emperor Taishō, Crown Prince Hirohito succeeded him as Emperor Shōwa.

description.zh-cn: 1907年，朝鲜统监伊藤博文说服当时为皇太子的嘉仁访问韩国。
description.en: In 1907, Resident-General of Korea Itō Hirobumi persuaded then-Crown Prince Yoshihito to visit Korea.

description.zh-cn: 大正天皇在位期间，日本逼迫袁世凯领导的中国北洋政府签署“二十一条”及“中日民四条约”。
description.en: During Emperor Taishō's reign, Japan forced the Beiyang Government of China, led by Yuan Shikai, to sign the 'Twenty-One Demands' and the 'Sino-Japanese Treaty of 1915'.

description.zh-cn: 允礽是康熙帝的第二子。
description.en: Yunreng was the second son of the Kangxi Emperor.

description.zh-cn: 允礽是雍正帝（胤禛）的异母兄。
description.en: Yunreng was the elder half-brother of the Yongzheng Emperor (Yinzhen).

description.zh-cn: 册封年仅一周岁的允礽为皇太子，并亲自教导，寄予厚望。
description.en: Appointed the one-year-old Yunreng as Crown Prince, personally tutored him, and had high expectations for him.

description.zh-cn: 奉康熙帝之命担任允礽的老师。
description.en: Was appointed by the Kangxi Emperor to be a tutor to Yunreng.

description.zh-cn: 因允礽在康熙帝亲征噶尔丹期间患病时“侍疾无忧色”，父子情份产生裂痕。
description.en: Because Yunreng showed 'no sign of worry while attending to the sick emperor' during Kangxi's campaign against Galdan, a rift formed in their father-son relationship.

position.en: Prince Limi of the First Rank (posthumous)

description.zh-cn: 允礽死后被追封为和硕理密亲王。
description.en: Yunreng was posthumously created Prince Limi of the First Rank after his death.

description.zh-cn: 因避雍正帝（胤禛）的名讳，允礽的名字由“胤礽”被改为“允礽”。
description.en: To avoid the naming taboo of the Yongzheng Emperor (Yinzhen), Yunreng's name was changed from 'Yinreng' to 'Yunreng'.

description.zh-cn: 作为维新派的主要发起者和领袖，康有为策划并主导了整个戊戌变法的进程。
description.en: As the main initiator and leader of the reformist faction, Kang Youwei planned and directed the entire process of the Hundred Days' Reform.

description.zh-cn: 在戊戌政变后，下令革职并通缉康有为。
description.en: After the Wuxu Coup, she ordered Kang Youwei to be dismissed from his post and be arrested.

description.zh-cn: 文化大革命期间，康有为被视为“中国历史上最大的保皇派”，其墓地被红卫兵掘开，遗骸被掘墓鞭打并游街示众。
description.en: During the Cultural Revolution, Kang Youwei was labeled 'the biggest royalist in Chinese history'. His tomb was desecrated by Red Guards, and his remains were exhumed, beaten, and paraded through the streets.

description.zh-cn: 1966年8月，红卫兵掘开康有为墓，将其遗骸损毁。
description.en: In August 1966, Red Guards excavated Kang Youwei's tomb and destroyed his remains.

description.zh-cn: 刘永清与胡锦涛于1970年2月结婚，两人是清华大学的同班同学。
description.en: Liu Yongqing married Hu Jintao in February 1970; they were classmates at Tsinghua University.

description.zh-cn: 胡海青是刘永清的女儿。
description.en: Hu Haiqing is the daughter of Liu Yongqing.

description.zh-cn: 胡海青是胡锦涛的女儿。
description.en: Hu Haiqing is the daughter of Hu Jintao.

description.zh-cn: 刘永清于1959年考入清华大学水利系，1965年毕业。
description.en: Liu Yongqing was admitted to the Department of Hydraulic Engineering at Tsinghua University in 1959 and graduated in 1965.

description.zh-cn: 刘永清接替王冶坪（江泽民夫人）成为中华人民共和国第一配偶。
description.en: Liu Yongqing succeeded Wang Yeping (wife of Jiang Zemin) as the First Spouse of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 彭丽媛（习近平夫人）接替刘永清成为中华人民共和国第一配偶。
description.en: Peng Liyuan (wife of Xi Jinping) succeeded Liu Yongqing as the First Spouse of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 文化大革命期间，刘永清于1969年3月被下放到宁夏青铜峡五七干校。
description.en: During the Cultural Revolution, Liu Yongqing was sent to the May Seventh Cadre School in Qingtongxia, Ningxia, in March 1969.

description.zh-cn: 胡海峰现任中华人民共和国民政部副部长。
description.en: Hu Haifeng currently serves as Vice Minister of the Ministry of Civil Affairs of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 胡海青的丈夫是茅道林。
description.en: Hu Haiqing's husband is Mao Daolin.

description.zh-cn: 1998年6月25日，刘永清以胡锦涛夫人身份首次亮相，迎接时任美国总统比尔·克林顿。
description.en: On June 25, 1998, Liu Yongqing made her first public appearance as Hu Jintao's wife to welcome then-U.S. President Bill Clinton.

description.zh-cn: 龚正担任上海市市长期间，李强任市委书记。
description.en: While Gong Zheng served as Mayor of Shanghai, Li Qiang was the Municipal Party Secretary.

description.zh-cn: 龚正担任上海市市长期间，陈吉宁任市委书记。
description.en: While Gong Zheng serves as Mayor of Shanghai, Chen Jining is the Municipal Party Secretary.

description.zh-cn: 刘鹤是第十九届中共中央政治局委员。
description.en: Liu He was a member of the 19th Politburo of the CPC Central Committee.

description.zh-cn: 在在景山学校完成小学、初中与高中学业。
description.en: Completed primary, junior high, and senior high school education at Beijing Jingshan School.

description.zh-cn: 与许其亮一同担任中共中央军事委员会副主席和中华人民共和国中央军事委员会副主席。
description.en: Served alongside Xu Qiliang as Vice Chairman of the CCP Central Military Commission and the PRC Central Military Commission.

description.zh-cn: 与何卫东一同担任中共中央军事委员会副主席和中华人民共和国中央军事委员会副主席。
description.en: Has been serving alongside He Weidong as Vice Chairman of the CCP Central Military Commission and the PRC Central Military Commission.

description.zh-cn: 张又侠接替范长龙出任中央军事委员会副主席。
description.en: Zhang Youxia succeeded Fan Changlong as Vice Chairman of the Central Military Commission.

description.zh-cn: 张又侠接替常万全出任中国人民解放军总装备部部长。
description.en: Zhang Youxia succeeded Chang Wanquan as Minister of the PLA General Armament Department.

description.zh-cn: 张又侠卸任中央军委装备发展部部长后，该职务由李尚福接任。
description.en: After Zhang Youxia stepped down as Minister of the Equipment Development Department of the CMC, he was succeeded by Li Shangfu.

description.zh-cn: 2012年，时任沈阳军区司令员的张又侠陪同国防部长梁光烈访问美国。
description.en: In 2012, Zhang Youxia, then Commander of the Shenyang Military Region, accompanied Minister of National Defense Liang Guanglie on a visit to the United States.

description.zh-cn: 作为连长参加1979年中越战争，并因表现出色获得晋升。
description.en: Participated in the 1979 Sino-Vietnamese War as a company commander and was promoted for his outstanding performance.

description.zh-cn: 李宗仁与白崇禧、黄绍竑合作，统一广西全省，是新桂系的核心领导人物。
description.en: Li Zongren cooperated with Bai Chongxi and Huang Shaohong to unify the entire province of Guangxi; they were the core leaders of the New Guangxi clique.

description.zh-cn: 国民党在第二次国共内战中的失败，导致李宗仁作为代总统的政府垮台，并最终迫使他流亡美国。
description.en: The KMT's defeat in the Second Chinese Civil War led to the collapse of the government with Li Zongren as acting president, ultimately forcing him into exile in the United States.

description.zh-cn: 周恩来促成并具体安排了李宗仁于1965年从海外返回中国大陆，并在“文化大革命”期间对他予以保护。
description.en: Zhou Enlai facilitated and specifically arranged for Li Zongren's return from overseas to mainland China in 1965, and provided him with protection during the Cultural Revolution.

description.zh-cn: 李宗仁是新桂系军阀集团的首领。
description.en: Li Zongren was the leader of the New Guangxi clique warlord group.

description.zh-cn: 习近平在2002年至2007年任中共浙江省委书记期间，黄坤明先后主政湖州、嘉兴，是其下属。黄坤明被认为是习近平的重要亲信之一。
description.en: While Xi Jinping was the Party Secretary of Zhejiang from 2002 to 2007, Huang Kunming served as the head of Huzhou and Jiaxing, making him a subordinate. Huang is considered a key confidant of Xi.

description.zh-cn: 习近平出任中共中央总书记后不久，将黄坤明上调至中共中央宣传部任职。
description.en: Shortly after Xi Jinping became General Secretary of the CPC Central Committee, he promoted Huang Kunming to a position in the Central Propaganda Department.

description.zh-cn: 1999年，黄坤明与时任三明市市长蔡奇一同被调往浙江省任职。
description.en: In 1999, Huang Kunming, along with Cai Qi, who was then the mayor of Sanming, were both transferred to Zhejiang Province.

description.zh-cn: 黄坤明接替李希出任中共广东省委书记。
description.en: Huang Kunming succeeded Li Xi as the Party Secretary of Guangdong.

description.zh-cn: 在刘奇葆担任中共中央宣传部部长期间，黄坤明担任其副手。
description.en: While Liu Qibao was the Minister of the Central Propaganda Department, Huang Kunming served as his deputy.

description.zh-cn: 黄坤明接替刘奇葆出任中共中央宣传部部长。
description.en: Huang Kunming succeeded Liu Qibao as the Minister of the Central Propaganda Department.

description.zh-cn: 据《南华早报》原主编王向伟撰文称，黄坤明曾于2022年底向习近平反映尽快结束清零政策的紧迫性，从而间接推动了该政策的终结。
description.en: According to an article by Wang Xiangwei, former editor-in-chief of the South China Morning Post, Huang Kunming reported the urgency of ending the zero-COVID policy to Xi Jinping at the end of 2022, thereby indirectly contributing to its termination.

description.zh-cn: 1988年至1993年就读于清华大学热能工程系空调专业。
description.en: Studied in the Air Conditioning major of the Department of Thermal Engineering at Tsinghua University from 1988 to 1993.

description.zh-cn: 胡锦涛曾坚决反对女儿胡海清出国留学，并在其擅自前往比利时后，勒令其回国。
description.en: Hu Jintao strongly opposed his daughter Hu Haiqing's plan to study abroad and ordered her to return to China after she went to Belgium without his permission.

description.zh-cn: 移居美国后，胡海清与丈夫茅道临拒绝了父亲胡锦涛多次要求他们回国的请求。
description.en: After moving to the United States, Hu Haiqing and her husband Mao Daolin refused her father Hu Jintao's repeated requests for them to return to China.

description.zh-cn: 移居美国后，茅道临与妻子胡海清拒绝了岳父胡锦涛多次要求他们回国的请求。
description.en: After moving to the United States, Mao Daolin and his wife Hu Haiqing refused his father-in-law Hu Jintao's repeated requests for them to return to China.

description.zh-cn: 尉健行将金铮反映的关于胡海清承包医院一事转告了胡锦涛。
description.en: Wei Jianxing relayed the information from Jin Zheng about Hu Haiqing's contracting of the hospital to Hu Jintao.

description.zh-cn: 梁思成与林徽因于1928年结婚，直至1955年林徽因逝世。
description.en: Liang Sicheng married Lin Huiyin in 1928, and they remained married until her death in 1955.

description.zh-cn: 梁思成被作为“反动学术权威”受到批判、抄家，并在贫病交加中去世。
description.en: Liang Sicheng was criticized and his home was ransacked as a 'reactionary academic authority', and he died in poverty and illness.

description.zh-cn: 抗日战争爆发后，梁思成为躲避战乱，被迫离开北平，携全家前往西南地区。
description.en: After the outbreak of the Second Sino-Japanese War, Liang Sicheng was forced to leave Beiping and flee to the southwest with his family to escape the war.

position.en: Head of the Department of Architecture at Northeastern University

description.zh-cn: 梁思成在东北大学任教时，张学良时任该校校长。
description.en: When Liang Sicheng taught at Northeastern University, Zhang Xueliang was the president of the university.

position.zh-cn: 晋军军官、第二战区北路军总司令
position.en: Jin Army Officer, Commander of the Northern Route Army of the Second War Area

description.zh-cn: 傅作义毕业后加入阎锡山领导的晋军，长期在其麾下任职，直至1938年12月出任第八战区副司令长官后摆脱其控制。
description.en: After graduation, Fu Zuoyi joined the Jin Army led by Yan Xishan and served under him for a long time, until he broke free from his control after being appointed Deputy Commander of the Eighth War Area in December 1938.

description.zh-cn: 傅作义仿照中国共产党领导的八路军的建军经验，在其部队中成立政治工作机构，并制定类似《三大纪律八项注意》的纪律。
description.en: Fu Zuoyi modeled the army-building experience of the Eighth Route Army led by the Communist Party of China, establishing political work agencies in his troops and formulating disciplines similar to the 'Three Main Rules of Discipline and Eight Points for Attention'.

description.zh-cn: 傅冬是傅作义的长女。
description.en: Fu Dong is Fu Zuoyi's eldest daughter.

description.zh-cn: 傅冬作为中共地下党员，在其父傅作义身边工作，不断进行劝说，为促成北平和平解放起了重要作用。
description.en: As an underground member of the CCP, Fu Dong worked alongside her father Fu Zuoyi and continuously persuaded him, playing a crucial role in bringing about the peaceful liberation of Beiping.

position.zh-cn: 水利部/水利电力部部长
position.en: Minister of Water Resources / Minister of Water Resources and Electric Power

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国成立后，傅作义长期担任水利部及后来的水利电力部部长，是时任国务院总理周恩来的下属。
description.en: After the founding of the People's Republic of China, Fu Zuoyi served for a long time as the Minister of Water Resources and later the Minister of Water Resources and Electric Power, subordinate to then-Premier Zhou Enlai.

description.zh-cn: 文化大革命爆发之初，周恩来将傅作义列入应予保护的干部名单中，对其进行保护。
description.en: At the beginning of the Cultural Revolution, Zhou Enlai included Fu Zuoyi in a list of cadres to be protected, thereby protecting him.

description.zh-cn: 在第二次国共内战期间，傅作义作为国民党高级将领，与毛泽东领导的共产党军队为敌，并曾发表致毛泽东的公开电进行谴责。
description.en: During the Second Chinese Civil War, Fu Zuoyi, as a high-ranking Nationalist general, was an enemy of the Communist forces led by Mao Zedong and once issued a public telegram condemning him.

description.zh-cn: 宋子文是孔祥熙的妻弟。
description.en: T. V. Soong was H. H. Kung's brother-in-law.

description.zh-cn: 1915年于哈佛大学经济学毕业。
description.en: Graduated from Harvard University with a degree in economics in 1915.

description.zh-cn: 在哥伦比亚大学研究所就读。
description.en: Attended graduate school at Columbia University.

description.zh-cn: 宋子文曾多次担任行政院副院长、代理院长及院长职务。
description.en: T. V. Soong served multiple times as Vice Premier, Acting Premier, and Premier of the Executive Yuan.

description.zh-cn: 1935年4月起，宋子文接任中国银行董事长。
description.en: From April 1935, T. V. Soong took over as the Chairman of the Bank of China.

description.zh-cn: 宋子文与张学良是好友，曾在西安事变中出面调解。
description.en: T. V. Soong and Zhang Xueliang were friends, and Soong mediated during the Xi'an Incident.

description.zh-cn: 1945年，宋子文赴苏联同斯大林会谈，并签订《中苏友好同盟条约》。
description.en: In 1945, T. V. Soong went to the Soviet Union to meet with Stalin and sign the Sino-Soviet Treaty of Friendship and Alliance.

description.zh-cn: 据称杜鲁门曾大骂宋家为“贼”，但此说法的真实性存疑。
description.en: Truman allegedly called the Soong family 'thieves,' although the authenticity of this claim is disputed.

description.zh-cn: 宋子文与时任美国总统罗斯福会谈，罗斯福表示愿意向中国提供援助。
description.en: T. V. Soong met with then-U.S. President Roosevelt, who expressed willingness to provide aid to China.

description.zh-cn: 太平公主是唐高宗李治的女儿。
description.en: Princess Taiping was the daughter of Emperor Gaozong of Tang (Li Zhi).

description.zh-cn: 太平公主是武则天的女儿。
description.en: Princess Taiping was the daughter of Wu Zetian.

description.zh-cn: 太平公主是唐中宗李显的妹妹。
description.en: Princess Taiping was the younger sister of Emperor Zhongzong of Tang (Li Xian).

description.zh-cn: 太平公主是李弘的妹妹。
description.en: Princess Taiping was the younger sister of Li Hong.

description.zh-cn: 太平公主与上官婉儿一同草拟中宗遗诏，在上官婉儿被杀后，太平公主十分哀伤，并出资厚葬及搜集其文集。
description.en: Princess Taiping and Shangguan Wan'er jointly drafted Emperor Zhongzong's final edict. After Shangguan Wan'er's execution, Princess Taiping was deeply saddened, funded her grand burial, and collected her literary works.

description.zh-cn: 汉景帝刘启是汉文帝刘恒的长子。
description.en: Emperor Jing (Liu Qi) was the eldest son of Emperor Wen (Liu Heng).

description.zh-cn: 平定七国之乱后，周亚夫因与汉景帝意见不合而遭猜忌，后被以谋反罪下狱，绝食而死。
description.en: After suppressing the Rebellion of the Seven States, Zhou Yafu was suspected by Emperor Jing due to disagreements, later imprisoned on charges of treason, and died on a hunger strike.

description.zh-cn: 汉武帝刘彻是汉景帝的儿子。
description.en: Emperor Wu (Liu Che) was the son of Emperor Jing.

description.zh-cn: 周亚夫在汉景帝时期先后担任太尉（前154-前149）和丞相（前150-前147）。
description.en: Zhou Yafu served Emperor Jing successively as Grand Marshal (154-149 BCE) and Chancellor (150-147 BCE).

description.zh-cn: 艾未未是诗人艾青的儿子。
description.en: Ai Weiwei is the son of the poet Ai Qing.

description.zh-cn: 艾未未于1957年5月18日出生于北京。
description.en: Ai Weiwei was born in Beijing on May 18, 1957.

description.zh-cn: 艾未未于1978年入读北京电影学院动画系。
description.en: Ai Weiwei enrolled in the Animation Department of the Beijing Film Academy in 1978.

description.zh-cn: 中国当局于2011年4月3日将艾未未秘密关押81天，释放后发起“发课税案”对其进行打压，并扣押其护照直至2015年7月。
description.en: Chinese authorities secretly detained Ai Weiwei for 81 days starting April 3, 2011. After his release, they launched the 'Fake Tax Case' to suppress him and confiscated his passport until July 2015.

description.zh-cn: 据报道，时任北京市公安局局长傅政华主导了对艾未未的审讯和迫害。
description.en: According to reports, Fu Zhenghua, then director of the Beijing Municipal Public Security Bureau, led the interrogation and persecution of Ai Weiwei.

description.zh-cn: 浦志强作为发课公司的代理律师，在“发课税案”中为艾未未方提供法律辩护。
description.en: As the legal counsel for Fake Ltd., Pu Zhiqiang provided legal defense for Ai Weiwei's side in the 'Fake Tax Case'.

description.zh-cn: 胤祥是清圣祖康熙帝的第十三子。
description.en: Yinxiang was the 13th son of the Kangxi Emperor of Qing.

description.zh-cn: 胤祥（皇十三子）与雍正帝（皇四子胤禛）是康熙帝的儿子，为异母兄弟。
description.en: Yinxiang (the 13th prince) and the Yongzheng Emperor (the 4th prince Yinzhen) were sons of the Kangxi Emperor, making them half-brothers.

description.zh-cn: 雍正帝即位后，极大地提拔和重用胤祥，任命其为总理事务大臣，封为和硕怡亲王，并担任首席军机大臣等要职，赐予世袭罔替的铁帽子王爵位，是雍正朝的核心支柱。
description.en: After ascending the throne, the Yongzheng Emperor greatly promoted and relied on Yinxiang, appointing him Grand Minister of State Affairs, creating him Prince Yi of the First Rank, and having him serve as the first Chief Grand Council Minister. He was granted the hereditary 'iron-cap' princely rank and was a core pillar of the Yongzheng administration.

description.zh-cn: 康熙四十七年（1708年）废太子事件后，康熙帝在上谕中提及“十三阿哥，朕另有处置”，将其与罪臣之子并列，显示了康熙晚年对胤祥的打压。
description.en: After the incident of deposing the crown prince in 1708 (the 47th year of the Kangxi reign), the Kangxi Emperor mentioned in an edict, 'As for the 13th Prince, I have other arrangements,' listing him alongside sons of convicted officials, indicating his suppression of Yinxiang in his later years.

position.zh-cn: 皇子、和硕怡亲王、总理事务大臣、首席军机大臣
position.en: Imperial Prince, Prince Yi of the First Rank, Grand Minister of State Affairs, Chief Grand Council Minister

description.zh-cn: 胤祥是清朝皇子，在雍正朝担任核心大臣。
description.en: Yinxiang was a Qing dynasty imperial prince and served as a core minister during the Yongzheng era.

description.zh-cn: 胤祥因对雍正朝的巨大贡献，获雍正帝赐予其爵位世袭罔替的恩典，成为清朝第九位铁帽子王。
description.en: Due to his immense contributions to the Yongzheng court, Yinxiang was granted the privilege of a perpetually hereditary peerage by the Yongzheng Emperor, becoming the ninth 'iron-cap' prince of the Qing dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 孙策是孙坚的长子。
description.en: Sun Ce is the eldest son of Sun Jian.

description.zh-cn: 孙权是孙策的二弟。
description.en: Sun Quan is Sun Ce's younger brother.

description.zh-cn: 周瑜在攻克皖城后娶小桥为妻。
description.en: Zhou Yu married Xiao Qiao after conquering Wan Castle.

description.zh-cn: 孙策在父亲孙坚死后，为讨回旧部曾一度在袁术麾下效力。
description.en: After his father Sun Jian's death, Sun Ce briefly served under Yuan Shu to reclaim his father's former troops.

description.zh-cn: 袁术僭越称帝后，孙策与其断绝关系，并参与了对袁术的讨伐。
description.en: After Yuan Shu declared himself emperor, Sun Ce broke ties with him and participated in the campaign against him.

position.en: General Who Attacks Rebels, Marquis of Wu

description.zh-cn: 因孙策讨伐袁术有功，曹操表奏朝廷授予孙策讨逆将军官职并加封为吴侯。
description.en: Due to Sun Ce's merits in the campaign against Yuan Shu, Cao Cao petitioned the court to grant Sun Ce the title of 'General Who Attacks Rebels' and ennoble him as the Marquis of Wu.

description.zh-cn: 太史慈原为刘繇部下，在神亭岭与孙策交战。后被孙策俘获，孙策亲自为其松绑并委以重任，太史慈遂归顺。
description.en: Tai Shi Ci initially served Liu Yao and fought Sun Ce at Shenting Ridge. He was later captured by Sun Ce, who personally untied him and entrusted him with important tasks, leading to Tai Shi Ci's allegiance.

description.zh-cn: 孙权称帝后，追谥其兄孙策为长沙桓王。
description.en: After ascending the throne, Sun Quan posthumously honored his elder brother Sun Ce as Prince Huan of Changsha.

description.zh-cn: 在担任中央外事工作委员会办公室主任期间，向中共中央总书记习近平汇报工作。
description.en: As Director of the Office of the Central Foreign Affairs Commission, he reported to CCP General Secretary Xi Jinping.

description.zh-cn: 在担任国务委员期间，向时任国务院总理李克强汇报工作。
description.en: As a State Councilor, he reported to then-Premier of the State Council Li Keqiang.

description.zh-cn: 在担任外交部长期间，向时任国务院总理温家宝汇报工作。
description.en: As Minister of Foreign Affairs, he reported to then-Premier of the State Council Wen Jiabao.

description.zh-cn: 受文化大革命的影响，杨洁篪于1968年被迫中止学业。
description.en: Affected by the Cultural Revolution, Yang Jiechi was forced to drop out of school in 1968.

description.zh-cn: 1972年尼克松访华后，周恩来指示加速培养外语人才，杨洁篪因此被选中派到国外留学。
description.en: After Nixon's visit to China in 1972, Zhou Enlai instructed to accelerate the training of foreign language talents, which led to Yang Jiechi being selected to study abroad.

description.zh-cn: 根据1971年毛泽东的指示精神，中国选拔了一批学生到国外留学，杨洁篪是其中之一。
description.en: Following Mao Zedong's instructions in 1971, China selected a group of students to study abroad, and Yang Jiechi was among them.

description.zh-cn: 为杨洁篪取了“老虎杨”（Tiger Yang）的绰号。
description.en: Gave Yang Jiechi the nickname 'Tiger Yang'.

description.zh-cn: 1977年，乔治·H·W·布什访问中国时，杨洁篪担任其全程陪同翻译。
description.en: In 1977, when George H. W. Bush visited China, Yang Jiechi served as his full-time accompanying interpreter.

description.zh-cn: 在华兴会中，宋教仁担任副会长，会长为黄兴。
description.en: In the Huaxinghui, Song Jiaoren served as Vice President under President Huang Xing.

description.zh-cn: 宋教仁支持孙中山成立中国同盟会，并担任司法部检事长。
description.en: Song Jiaoren supported Sun Yat-sen in establishing the Tongmenghui and served as the Procurator of its Judicial Department.

description.zh-cn: 1903年8月，宋教仁与黄兴在武昌相识，从此成为挚友。
description.en: In August 1903, Song Jiaoren and Huang Xing met in Wuchang and became close friends thereafter.

description.zh-cn: 宋教仁倡导的责任内阁制威胁到袁世凯的统治地位。时人普遍认为，袁世凯授意或幕后策划了对国民党领袖宋教仁的暗杀，以阻止其组阁。
description.en: The cabinet responsibility system advocated by Song Jiaoren threatened Yuan Shikai's ruling position. It was widely believed at the time that Yuan Shikai ordered or masterminded the assassination of Kuomintang leader Song Jiaoren to prevent him from forming a cabinet.

description.zh-cn: 在1958年的军委扩大会议上，彭德怀等人将刘伯承作为军事教条主义的代表进行批判。
description.en: At the enlarged meeting of the Military Commission in 1958, Peng Dehuai and others criticized Liu Bocheng as a representative of military dogmatism.

description.zh-cn: 在抗日战争期间，刘伯承担任八路军129师师长，领导开辟晋冀鲁豫边区，并指挥了百团大战等多项重要战役。
description.en: During the Second Sino-Japanese War, Liu Bocheng served as the commander of the 129th Division of the Eighth Route Army, led the establishment of the Shanxi-Hebei-Shandong-Henan border region, and commanded many important campaigns, including the Hundred Regiments Offensive.

description.zh-cn: 在第二次国共内战期间，刘伯承担任晋冀鲁豫军区、中原军区及第二野战军司令员，指挥了上党战役、淮海战役、渡江战役等一系列决定性战役。
description.en: During the second Chinese Civil War, Liu Bocheng served as commander of the Shanxi-Hebei-Shandong-Henan Military Region, Central Plains Military Region, and Second Field Army, commanding a series of decisive campaigns including the Shangdang Campaign, Huaihai Campaign, and Yangtze River Crossing Campaign.

description.zh-cn: 刘伯承参加了长征，期间担任中央革命军事委员会总参谋长等职，指挥了强渡乌江、金沙江等战斗。
description.en: Liu Bocheng participated in the Long March, during which he served as Chief of the General Staff of the Central Revolutionary Military Commission and commanded battles such as the forced crossings of the Wu and Jinsha rivers.

description.zh-cn: 倪震是亦舒的侄子。
description.en: Joe Nieh is Yi Shu's nephew.

description.zh-cn: 周慧敏是亦舒的侄媳。
description.en: Vivian Chow is Yi Shu's niece-in-law.

description.zh-cn: 于1993年移民加拿大。
description.en: Immigrated to Canada in 1993.

description.zh-cn: 亦舒的科幻作品不时会看到兄长倪匡作品的角色客串出现。
description.en: Characters from her elder brother Ni Kuang's works occasionally make guest appearances in Yi Shu's science fiction works.

description.zh-cn: 袁隆平在1960年目睹大饥荒的惨状后，深受刺激，决意研究提高粮食产量。
description.en: After witnessing the devastating effects of the Great Famine in 1960, Yuan Longping was deeply moved and resolved to research ways to increase grain production.

description.zh-cn: 在文革期间，袁隆平遭到红卫兵和群众批判，其实验稻田的育种甚至被恶意拔除。
description.en: During the Cultural Revolution, Yuan Longping was criticized by Red Guards and the masses, and his experimental rice paddies were even maliciously uprooted.

description.zh-cn: 在第一次和第二次鸦片战争中，清朝与大英帝国是主要交战方。
description.en: The Qing dynasty and the British Empire were the main belligerents in the First and Second Opium Wars.

description.zh-cn: 《南京条约》使中国丧失了领土主权（割让香港岛），并被迫开放通商口岸和支付巨额赔款，损害了清朝的国家利益。
description.en: The Treaty of Nanking led to China's loss of territorial sovereignty (cession of Hong Kong Island) and forced the opening of treaty ports and payment of large indemnities, harming the national interests of the Qing dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 南昌起义后，中国共产党开始建立自己的正式武装部队，即中国工农红军。
description.en: After the Nanchang Uprising, the Chinese Communist Party began to establish its own formal armed forces, the Chinese Workers' and Peasants' Red Army.

description.zh-cn: 苏军在1946年撤离东北前，将缴获的日本关东军武器移交给林彪的东北野战军，为中共抢占东北提供了便利。
description.en: Before withdrawing from Northeast China in 1946, the Soviet Army handed over captured weapons from the Japanese Kwantung Army to Lin Biao's Northeast Field Army, facilitating the CCP's occupation of the region.

description.zh-cn: 苏联政府正式照会中国外交部，决定召回全部在华工作的1390名苏联专家，并终止了数百份经济和科技合作合同，使中苏关系走向破裂。
description.en: The Soviet government officially notified the Chinese Ministry of Foreign Affairs of its decision to recall all 1390 Soviet experts working in China and terminated hundreds of economic and technological cooperation contracts, leading to the rupture of Sino-Soviet relations.

description.zh-cn: 文化大革命期间，毛泽东号召“反苏修”，中苏两国关系彻底冻结，冲突升级。
description.en: During the Cultural Revolution, Mao Zedong called for "opposing Soviet revisionism," which completely froze Sino-Soviet relations and escalated the conflict.

description.zh-cn: 在苏联考虑对中国进行核打击时，时任美国总统尼克松及其政府进行了干预，向苏联表明美国不会容忍此类行为，从而阻止了潜在的核攻击。
description.en: When the Soviet Union considered a nuclear strike against China, then-U.S. President Nixon and his administration intervened, indicating to the Soviets that the U.S. would not tolerate such an action, thereby preventing a potential nuclear attack.

description.zh-cn: 在中共早期，斯大林不信任毛泽东，支持“二十八个半布尔什维克”等苏联路线的领导人，并将毛泽东排除在中央委员会之外。
description.en: In the early days of the CCP, Stalin distrusted Mao Zedong, supported leaders who followed the Soviet line, such as the "28 Bolsheviks," and excluded Mao from the Central Committee.

description.zh-cn: 改革开放带来的思想解放、对西方民主观念的接触以及对政治体制改革的讨论，为八六学潮的发生提供了重要的社会和思想背景。
description.en: The intellectual liberation, exposure to Western democratic concepts, and discussions on political system reform brought by the Reform and Opening-up provided a significant social and ideological background for the 1986 student demonstrations.

description.zh-cn: 时任中国科学技术大学副校长方励之在校内的竞选演讲中，宣扬民主需要靠自己争取，其言论和公开支持极大地鼓舞了学生，推动了学潮的发生和发展。
description.en: In his campaign speech at the university, then-Vice President Fang Lizhi advocated that democracy must be fought for, which greatly inspired the students and propelled the outbreak and development of the demonstrations.

description.zh-cn: 八六学潮为1989年的六四事件埋下伏笔，部分学潮的参与者后来也成为六四事件的发起人和组织者。
description.en: The 1986 student demonstrations set the stage for the 1989 Tiananmen Square protests, and some of its participants later became initiators and organizers of the 1989 events.

description.zh-cn: 邓小平在1980年代实际主导最高决策，决定并推动了废除干部领导职务终身制这项重要的政治制度改革。
description.en: Deng Xiaoping, as the paramount leader in the 1980s, decided on and promoted the abolition of the lifelong tenure system for leading cadres, an important political system reform.

description.zh-cn: 中央顾问委员会作为一项过渡性制度安排，通过安置老干部，为废除领导职务终身制铺平了道路。
description.en: As a transitional institutional arrangement, the Central Advisory Commission paved the way for the abolition of the lifelong tenure system by accommodating veteran cadres.

description.zh-cn: 胡锦涛在中共十八大上卸任所有职务，实现“裸退”，被习近平称赞为“高风亮节”，此举被视为进一步完善了废除干部领导职务终身制的制度。
description.en: Hu Jintao stepped down from all positions at the 18th CPC National Congress, achieving a 'naked retirement,' which was praised by Xi Jinping as a 'noble act' and seen as a further step in perfecting the system of abolishing lifelong tenure for cadres.

position.zh-cn: 中共中央总书记、中共中央军委主席
position.en: General Secretary of the CPC Central Committee, Chairman of the CPC Central Military Commission

description.zh-cn: 在中共十八大上，习近平接替胡锦涛，成为中国共产党的主要领导人。
description.en: At the 18th CPC National Congress, Xi Jinping succeeded Hu Jintao to become the primary leader of the Communist Party of China.

description.zh-cn: 取消国家主席任期限制的修宪被普遍认为是习近平为了谋求长期执政而推动的举动。
description.en: The constitutional amendment to remove the presidential term limit is widely seen as a move pushed by Xi Jinping to secure long-term rule.

description.zh-cn: 该修正案取消了国家主席的任期限制，此举被外界解读为对邓小平时代确立的废除领导干部职务终身制原则的逆转，有媒体认为干部领导职务终身制已经复辟。
description.en: This amendment removed the term limit for the President, a move interpreted by outsiders as a reversal of the principle of abolishing lifelong tenure established during the Deng Xiaoping era, with some media suggesting the lifelong system has been restored.

description.zh-cn: 江泽民在主政期间延续了废除干部领导职务终身制的政策。
description.en: During his tenure, Jiang Zemin continued the policy of abolishing the lifelong tenure system for leading cadres.

description.zh-cn: 鲁迅在观看日俄战争中中国人作俄军间谍被日军处决的幻灯片后，认识到改变国民精神的重要性，从而决定弃医从文。
description.en: After watching a slide show depicting a Chinese person being executed by the Japanese army as a Russian spy during the war, Lu Xun realized the importance of changing the national spirit and decided to abandon medicine for literature.

description.zh-cn: 担任日俄战争时期大日本帝国的国家元首和名义上的最高统帅。
description.en: Served as the head of state and nominal commander-in-chief of the Empire of Japan during the Russo-Japanese War.

description.zh-cn: 担任日俄战争时期俄罗斯帝国的国家元首和最高统帅。
description.en: Served as the head of state and commander-in-chief of the Russian Empire during the Russo-Japanese War.

description.zh-cn: 清零政策是为应对2019冠状病毒病疫情而采取的一种防疫策略。
description.en: The zero-COVID policy was an epidemic prevention strategy adopted in response to the COVID-19 pandemic.

description.zh-cn: 公开表示中国的清零政策不可持续。
description.en: Publicly stated that China's zero-COVID policy was unsustainable.

description.zh-cn: 公开表示不认为中国大陆推行的清零政策可以持久进行。
description.en: Publicly stated that he did not believe the zero-COVID policy pursued by mainland China was sustainable.

description.zh-cn: 公开承认变种病毒毒力减弱，表示中国疫情处于“新形势新任务”，提早宣布了清零政策开始松动。
description.en: Publicly acknowledged the weakening virulence of the virus variant, stating that China's epidemic was in a 'new situation with new tasks', thus pre-announcing the loosening of the zero-COVID policy.

description.zh-cn: 据路透社报道，在执行宽松防疫措施后，习近平希望放缓开放，但李强反驳了习近平的要求，并继续推动放宽政策。
description.en: According to Reuters, after implementing relaxed epidemic measures, Xi Jinping wished to slow down the reopening, but Li Qiang rebutted his request and continued to push for policy relaxation.

description.zh-cn: 据媒体人士王向伟透露，时任中共广东省委书记黄坤明曾向习近平反映尽快结束清零政策的紧迫性，间接推动了政策终结。
description.en: According to media personality Wang Xiangwei, Huang Kunming, then Party Secretary of Guangdong, reported to Xi Jinping on the urgency of ending the zero-COVID policy, indirectly contributing to its termination.

description.zh-cn: 在回应谭德塞对清零政策的批评时，时任外交部发言人赵立坚警告对方“不要发表不负责任的言论”。
description.en: In response to Tedros's criticism of the zero-COVID policy, then-Foreign Ministry spokesman Zhao Lijian warned him 'not to make irresponsible remarks'.

description.zh-cn: 越南在2021年底放弃了清零政策。
description.en: Vietnam abandoned the zero-COVID policy in late 2021.

description.zh-cn: 慈禧太后因仇视外国势力，从默许纵容转向公开支持义和团，并最终决定向十一国宣战，将义和团运动推向高潮。
description.en: Driven by her hostility towards foreign powers, Empress Dowager Cixi's stance shifted from tacit approval to open support for the Boxers, eventually deciding to declare war on eleven nations, thus pushing the Boxer Rebellion to its climax.

description.zh-cn: 义和团运动的失败直接导致清政府被迫与十一国签订《辛丑条约》，承担巨额赔款及丧失多项主权。
description.en: The failure of the Boxer Rebellion directly led to the Qing government being forced to sign the Boxer Protocol with eleven nations, incurring massive indemnities and the loss of various sovereign rights.

description.zh-cn: 甲午战争战败后，西方列强在中国划分势力范围，加剧了社会矛盾和排外情绪，为义和团运动的兴起提供了背景。
description.en: After the defeat in the First Sino-Japanese War, Western powers carved out spheres of influence in China, exacerbating social tensions and anti-foreign sentiment, which provided the backdrop for the rise of the Boxer Rebellion.

description.zh-cn: 八国联军于1900年8月14日攻入并占领北京。
description.en: The Eight-Nation Alliance attacked and occupied Beijing on August 14, 1900.

description.zh-cn: 八国联军于1900年7月14日攻克天津城。
description.en: The Eight-Nation Alliance captured the city of Tianjin on July 14, 1900.

description.zh-cn: 事件后，邓小平被错误地认定为幕后总指挥，导致其被撤销党内外一切职务。
事件后，中共中央政治局通过决议，任命华国锋为中共中央第一副主席和国务院总理，巩固了其作为毛泽东接班人的地位。
中共中央政治局将事件定性为“反革命政治事件”，并出动民兵、公安和卫戍部队进行暴力镇压。
四五天安门事件是文化大革命后期社会矛盾激化的产物，群众借悼念周恩来表达对文革和“四人帮”的不满。
陈云在中央工作会议上率先提出为天安门事件平反，对最终平反起到了关键的推动作用。
经中共中央政治局常委会批准，北京市委正式宣布为四五天安门事件平反，称其是完全革命的行动。
作为毛泽东的联络员，毛远新向毛泽东汇报天安门广场的情况，并传达其指示。
姚文元为《人民日报》撰写了题为《天安门广场的反革命政治事件》的文章，将事件定性为反革命。
中国政府在事件发酵后采取了信息封锁措施，包括在江油街头部署信号干扰车以及在社交媒体上进行广泛审查，以阻止相关信息的传播。
description.en: After the incident escalated, the Chinese government implemented information blockade measures, including deploying signal jamming vehicles on the streets of Jiangyou and conducting widespread censorship on social media to prevent the dissemination of related information.

description.zh-cn: 为响应中国的审查指令，该人工智能模型被设置为不提供有关江油抗议事件的任何信息，从而阻止了用户通过此渠道了解事件真相。
description.en: In response to China's censorship directives, this AI model was configured to not provide any information about the Jiangyou protests, thereby preventing users from learning about the event through this channel.

description.zh-cn: 作为江油事件前发生的一起类似的大规模民众抗议事件，蒲城事件为公众在面对官方处理校园相关问题不当时采取集体行动提供了参照，影响了江油事件的抗议模式。
description.en: As a similar large-scale public protest that occurred before the Jiangyou incident, the Pucheng incident provided a reference for collective public action in response to official mishandling of school-related issues, influencing the protest pattern in the Jiangyou event.

position.zh-cn: 台北市市长办公室主任
position.en: Director of the Taipei City Mayor's Office

description.zh-cn: 在柯文哲担任台北市长期间，李文宗担任其办公室主任。
description.en: Li Wen-tsung served as the Director of the Mayor's Office under Taipei Mayor Ko Wen-je.

description.zh-cn: 杨坚篡夺北周政权，建立隋朝，改元开皇。
description.en: Yang Jian usurped the Northern Zhou regime, established the Sui dynasty, and changed the era name to Kaihuang.

description.zh-cn: 杨坚逼迫北周静帝禅位，取代北周，并屠杀了北周宇文皇族。
description.en: Yang Jian forced Emperor Jing of Northern Zhou to abdicate, replaced the Northern Zhou, and massacred the Yuwen imperial family of Northern Zhou.

description.zh-cn: 隋文帝杨坚在废黜杨勇后，册立善于伪装的次子杨广（即隋炀帝）为太子。
description.en: After deposing Yang Yong, Emperor Wen of Sui installed his second son Yang Guang (later Emperor Yang), who was skilled at dissimulation, as the crown prince.

description.zh-cn: 有说法称隋文帝杨坚是被其子太子杨广所谋杀。据传，杨广在仁寿宫发动兵变，导致其父突然去世，随后杨广即位。
description.en: It is said that Emperor Wen of Sui was murdered by his son, Crown Prince Yang Guang. Allegedly, Yang Guang launched a coup at Renshou Palace, leading to his father's sudden death, after which Yang Guang ascended the throne.

description.zh-cn: 罗瑞卿接替黄克诚担任中国人民解放军总参谋长。
description.en: Luo Ruiqing succeeded Huang Kecheng as the Chief of the General Staff of the PLA.

description.zh-cn: 罗瑞卿被免去总参谋长职务后，由杨成武代理。
description.en: After Luo Ruiqing was dismissed from his post as Chief of the General Staff, Yang Chengwu served as the acting chief.

description.zh-cn: 谢富治接替罗瑞卿担任中华人民共和国公安部部长。
description.en: Xie Fuzhi succeeded Luo Ruiqing as the Minister of Public Security of the PRC.

description.zh-cn: 文化大革命期间，因罗瑞卿事件而被批判，后跳楼负重伤，并被撤销全部职务及监护。
description.en: During the Cultural Revolution, he was criticized due to the Luo Ruiqing Incident, suffered severe injuries from a suicide attempt by jumping from a building, was dismissed from all his posts, and placed under surveillance.

description.zh-cn: 中央军委内部日渐分裂，林彪与罗瑞卿分属不同派别，最终在1965年12月的上海会议上，林彪等人对罗瑞卿进行突然袭击，导致罗瑞卿事件。
description.en: The Central Military Commission gradually split, with Lin Biao and Luo Ruiqing in opposing factions. This culminated in the Shanghai Conference of December 1965, where Lin Biao and others launched a surprise attack on Luo Ruiqing, leading to the Luo Ruiqing Incident.

description.zh-cn: 在1965年12月的上海会议上，叶群与林彪等人一同对罗瑞卿进行突然袭击，导致罗瑞卿事件。
description.en: At the Shanghai Conference in December 1965, Ye Qun, along with Lin Biao and others, launched a surprise attack on Luo Ruiqing, leading to the Luo Ruiqing Incident.

description.zh-cn: 在1965年12月的上海会议上，吴法宪与林彪等人一同对罗瑞卿进行突然袭击，导致罗瑞卿事件。
description.en: At the Shanghai Conference in December 1965, Wu Faxian, along with Lin Biao and others, launched a surprise attack on Luo Ruiqing, leading to the Luo Ruiqing Incident.

description.zh-cn: 在1965年12月的上海会议上，李作鹏与林彪等人一同对罗瑞卿进行突然袭击，导致罗瑞卿事件。
description.en: At the Shanghai Conference in December 1965, Li Zuopeng, along with Lin Biao and others, launched a surprise attack on Luo Ruiqing, leading to the Luo Ruiqing Incident.

description.zh-cn: 在罗瑞卿事件前，中央军委内部分裂为两派，贺龙、罗瑞卿为首的一派与林彪等人对立。
description.en: Before the Luo Ruiqing Incident, the Central Military Commission was split into two factions, with one led by He Long and Luo Ruiqing in opposition to Lin Biao and others.

description.zh-cn: 在罗瑞卿事件前，中央军委内部分裂为两派，叶剑英与林彪等人为一派，与贺龙、罗瑞卿一派对立。
description.en: Before the Luo Ruiqing Incident, the Central Military Commission was split into two factions, with Ye Jianying, Lin Biao, and others in one faction opposing the faction led by He Long and Luo Ruiqing.

description.zh-cn: 在罗瑞卿事件前，中央军委内部分裂为两派，聂荣臻与林彪等人为一派，与贺龙、罗瑞卿一派对立。
description.en: Before the Luo Ruiqing Incident, the Central Military Commission was split into two factions, with Nie Rongzhen, Lin Biao, and others in one faction opposing the faction led by He Long and Luo Ruiqing.

description.zh-cn: 在罗瑞卿事件前，中央军委内部分裂为两派，杨成武与林彪等人为一派，与贺龙、罗瑞卿一派对立。
description.en: Before the Luo Ruiqing Incident, the Central Military Commission was split into two factions, with Yang Chengwu, Lin Biao, and others in one faction opposing the faction led by He Long and Luo Ruiqing.

description.zh-cn: 毛泽东首肯了林彪等人对罗瑞卿的攻击，导致罗瑞卿事件的发生。
description.en: Mao Zedong approved the attack on Luo Ruiqing by Lin Biao and others, which led to the Luo Ruiqing Incident.

description.zh-cn: 毛泽东表示其是“听了林彪一面之辞，错整了罗瑞卿”，为罗瑞卿的平反奠定了基础。
description.en: Mao Zedong stated that he had 'wrongly purged Luo Ruiqing based on Lin Biao's one-sided account,' laying the groundwork for Luo's rehabilitation.

description.zh-cn: 刘少奇主持召开中共中央政治局扩大会议，批判“彭真、罗瑞卿、陆定一、杨尚昆的‘反党错误’”，并决定停止和撤销罗瑞卿的全部职务。
description.en: Liu Shaoqi presided over an enlarged meeting of the Politburo of the CPC Central Committee, criticizing the 'anti-Party errors' of Peng Zhen, Luo Ruiqing, Lu Dingyi, and Yang Shangkun, and decided to suspend and dismiss Luo Ruiqing from all his posts.

description.zh-cn: 刘少奇主持召开中共中央政治局扩大会议，批判“彭真、罗瑞卿、陆定一、杨尚昆的‘反党错误’”。
description.en: Liu Shaoqi presided over an enlarged meeting of the Politburo of the CPC Central Committee, criticizing the 'anti-Party errors' of Peng Zhen, Luo Ruiqing, Lu Dingyi, and Yang Shangkun.

description.zh-cn: 刘少奇主持召开中共中央政治局扩大会议，批判“彭真、罗瑞卿、陆定一、杨尚昆的‘反党错误’”。
description.en: Liu Shaoqi presided over an enlarged meeting of the Politburo of the CPC Central Committee, criticizing the 'anti-Party errors' of Peng Zhen, Luo Ruiqing, Lu Dingyi, and Yang Shangkun.

description.zh-cn: 罗瑞卿逝世后，邓小平前往机场迎灵，并于8月12日的追悼会上致悼词。
description.en: After Luo Ruiqing's death, Deng Xiaoping went to the airport to receive his remains and delivered the eulogy at the memorial service on August 12.

description.zh-cn: 因叶剑英就罗瑞卿跳楼一事作诗表达同情，周恩来严厉批判其“完全站到罗瑞卿一边”。
